File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/0x/0x-jumpstart-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: 0x
title: 0x JumpStart Program
meta_title: Accelerate Your Web3 Startup with 0x JumpStart Program
intro: >-
  Fuel your startup journey with free API credits, technical mentorship, and
  ecosystem integration through the 0x JumpStart Program, designed to reduce
  costs and accelerate time to market.
description: >-
  0x JumpStart Program provides critical infrastructure and growth support for
  Web3 and crypto startups through API credits, mentorship, and ecosystem
  integration. The program offers two tiers: Start Tier and Scale Tier. The
  Start Tier provides 2M API calls per month (valued at $1,000) with 20 requests
  per second capacity, monthly mentorship sessions, and access to a vibrant
  community. The Scale Tier offers 10M API calls per month (valued at $5,000), a
  higher request capacity of 40 requests per second, and customized solutions
  for advanced needs, along with enhanced access to the partner ecosystem
  (including Coinbase Wallet, Matcha, and Zerion). The process involves
  application submission, technical interviews, tailored offers, hands-on
  onboarding, and ongoing monthly syncs, ensuring startups receive personalized
  support to drive sustainable growth.
status: Active
tags:
  - crypto
  - blockchain
  - web3
  - api
  - finance
url: https://0x.org/jumpstart
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 1000
max_value: 5000
community_notes:
  - title: Coinbase Endorsement
    body: >-
      0x is recognized for its extensive and reliable DEX API services, aiding
      Coinbase Wallet in launching innovative DEX features.
    source_url: https://www.coinbase.com
  - title: Zerion Endorsement
    body: >-
      Zerion values 0x for its dedicated support as a partner, leveraging its
      swap API to optimize trading routes.
    source_url: https://www.zerion.io
tiers:
  - name: Start Tier
    intro: >-
      Receive 2M API calls/month (valued at $1,000) with 20 requests per second,
      monthly mentorship sessions, and community access.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://0x.org/jumpstart
    benefits:
      - 2M API calls/month
      - 20 requests per second capacity
      - Access to 0x DEX liquidity aggregator across 12+ chains
      - Monthly 1:1 mentorship sessions
      - Access to a vibrant community
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Self-funded or Pre-Series B
      - Live, fully functional company website
      - Founded within the past 3 years
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply now
        description: >-
          Submit your application to join the Start Tier of the 0x JumpStart
          Program.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://0x.org/jumpstart
  - name: Scale Tier
    intro: >-
      Receive 10M API calls/month (valued at $5,000) with 40 requests per
      second, customized solutions, and enhanced ecosystem integration.
    max_value: 5000
    url: https://0x.org/jumpstart
    benefits:
      - 10M API calls/month
      - 40 requests per second capacity
      - Customized solutions for advanced needs
      - Access to partner network (Coinbase Wallet, Matcha, Zerion)
      - Access to a vibrant community
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Self-funded or Pre-Series B
      - Founded within the past 3 years
      - Must be part of the 0x partner ecosystem
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply now
        description: >-
          Submit your application to join the Scale Tier of the 0x JumpStart
          Program.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://0x.org/jumpstart
faq:
  - question: What is 0x JumpStart?
    answer: >-
      0x JumpStart is a flagship program offering API credits, technical
      mentorship, and ecosystem integration to support emerging Web3 and crypto
      startups.
  - question: Who can join 0x JumpStart?
    answer: >-
      The program is open to global Web3 and crypto startups that are
      self-funded or in a pre-Series B stage, have a live website, and are
      founded within the past 3 years. The Scale Tier additionally requires
      affiliation with the 0x partner ecosystem.
  - question: What benefits does the program offer?
    answer: >-
      Participants receive API credits, monthly mentorship, technical
      onboarding, and access to a vibrant community and partner network, along
      with tailored solutions to accelerate growth.
  - question: How does the application process work?
    answer: >-
      Applicants must submit an application, complete a technical interview,
      receive a tailored offer, and undergo hands-on onboarding with ongoing
      monthly mentorship sessions.
  - question: How is success measured in the program?
    answer: >-
      Success is tracked through API utilization, startup growth, and market
      impact, with periodic evaluations to adjust support as needed.
  - question: How does monetization work post-integration?
    answer: >-
      Startups retain 100% of swap fees generated through their implementation,
      providing a built-in monetization model.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/airbyte/airbyte-y-combinator-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: airbyte
title: Airbyte Y Combinator Startup Program
meta_title: YC Startup Credits and Resources
intro: >-
  Airbyte offers Y Combinator startups up to $75,000 in Airbyte Cloud credits
  along with free educational resources, workshops, swag, and priority support
  to accelerate data integration workflows.
description: >-
  The Airbyte Y Combinator Startup Program is designed to empower YC startups by
  providing $75,000 in Airbyte Cloud credits for seamless data integration
  across 550+ connectors. Participants receive free access to the Airbyte
  learning platform, guaranteed enrollment in hands-on workshops, exclusive
  Airbyte swag, and priority support. To qualify, companies must be current or
  alumni of Y Combinator, have raised less than $5M in total funding, and comply
  with Airbyte Cloud's standard Terms of Service. Existing Airbyte customers are
  not eligible.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - data
  - education
  - dev tools
url: https://airbyte.com/company/ycombinator-startup-promotion
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 75000
max_value: 75000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Airbyte YC Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Designed exclusively for YC startups, this tier offers a fixed $75,000 in
      Airbyte Cloud credits along with essential learning resources, workshop
      access, swag, and priority support.
    max_value: 75000
    url: https://airbyte.com/company/ycombinator-startup-promotion
    benefits:
      - $75,000 in Airbyte Cloud credits
      - Free access to the Airbyte learning platform
      - Guaranteed spot in upcoming Airbyte workshops
      - Exclusive Airbyte swag
      - Priority support with fast response times
    benefits_level: 2
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - Must be enrolled in a current or previous Y Combinator batch
      - Total funding raised must be under $5M
      - Must accept Airbyte Cloud’s standard Terms of Service
      - Existing Airbyte customers are not eligible
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit YC Enrollment Proof
        description: >-
          Provide documentation verifying enrollment in a current or past Y
          Combinator batch.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://airbyte.com/company/ycombinator-startup-promotion
      - name: Complete Onboarding
        description: Finish Airbyte Cloud onboarding and accept the Terms of Service.
        action: Accept Terms
        action_url: >-
          https://airbyte.com/terms?__hstc=128150995.2d74a93459380ae5afb86ba39ca9b66b.1670318411557.1670318411557.1670318411557.1
faq:
  - question: What is the Airbyte YC Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      It provides eligible YC startups with $75,000 in Airbyte Cloud credits,
      free access to learning resources, guaranteed workshop enrollment,
      exclusive swag, and priority support to enhance data integration
      workflows.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Companies currently or previously part of Y Combinator, with less than $5M
      in total funding and not existing Airbyte customers, are eligible.
  - question: How do I apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Submit proof of YC enrollment via the promotion page and complete Airbyte
      Cloud onboarding by accepting the Terms of Service.

provider_slug: "airtable"
title: "Airtable for Startups"
intro: "Get $500 in free Airtable credit along with exclusive startup-focused content and educational materials."
description: "This program provides startups with an opportunity to leverage Airtable’s platform through a one-time credit of $500. Applicants must first create an Airtable account, then submit an application providing basic personal and company information, including the specific workspace ID where credits will be applied. Airtable typically reviews applications within 3–5 days."
status: "Active"
url: "https://airtable.com/signup"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 500
max_value: 500
tags:
  - collaboration
  - productivity
  - low-code
  - workflow
  - database

tiers:
  - name: "Airtable for Startups"
    intro: "One-time credit for early-stage teams"
    max_value: 500
    url: "https://airtable.com/signup"
    benefits:
      - "$500 in Airtable credit"
      - "Exclusive startup content"
      - "Educational materials"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - "Must be a startup"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create an Airtable Account"
        description: "Sign up for Airtable if you do not already have an account"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://airtable.com/signup"
      - name: "Complete Application Form"
        description: "Fill in your personal and company details, including workspace ID"
        action: "Apply"
        action_url: "https://airtable.com/startups"

faq: []
success_stories: []
community_notes: []

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/aiven/aiven-cluster-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: aiven
title: Aiven Cluster Startup Program
meta_title: Cloud Credits and Technical Support for Startups
intro: >-
  The Aiven Cluster Startup Program offers up to $100,000 in credits to help
  startups build scalable data infrastructure using Aiven's fully managed
  services, expert technical support, and a vibrant community.
description: >-
  Aiven's Cluster Startup Program provides eligible early-stage startups with
  between $12,000 and $100,000 in cloud credits over a 12-month period. In
  addition to credits, the program includes 24/7 expert technical support,
  access to private community channels (such as the Cluster Slack and Aiven
  Community Forums), promotional opportunities via the Aiven blog and social
  media, and virtual events and workshops on data infrastructure and scaling.
  Startups must be 7 years old or younger, have raised funds between pre-seed
  and Series B, and apply using a business email address. Priority is given to
  those referred by approved investors and accelerators.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - data
  - open source
url: https://aiven.io/cluster
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 12000
max_value: 100000
community_notes:
  - title: Doccla Testimonial
    body: >-
      The credits we got by joining the Aiven Cluster program helped us to get
      started very quickly.
    source_url: https://aiven.io/cluster#doccla
  - title: workOrb Testimonial
    body: >-
      Aiven has been a great partner, providing performant scalable vector and
      hybrid search powered by OpenSearch.
    source_url: https://aiven.io/cluster#workorb
  - title: 4 Screen Testimonial
    body: >-
      Joining the Aiven Cluster program gives you room to explore different
      technologies without committing yourself to any plans or buying it right
      away.
    source_url: https://aiven.io/cluster#4screen
tiers:
  - name: Cluster Startup Credits
    intro: >-
      Unlock between $12,000 and $100,000 in credits for Aiven managed data
      services over 12 months, along with technical support and community
      benefits.
    max_value: 100000
    url: https://aiven.io/cluster
    benefits:
      - Up to $100,000 in cloud credits for Aiven services
      - 24/7 expert technical support
      - Access to private Slack community and forums
      - Promotional opportunities via Aiven blog and social media
      - Virtual workshops on data infrastructure and scaling
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Startup must be 7 years old or younger
      - Must have raised funds between pre-seed and Series B
      - Application must be submitted with a business email address
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Complete the online application form with your startup details and a
          verified business email.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://aiven.io/cluster
faq:
  - question: Can non-partnered startups apply?
    answer: >-
      Yes – the program offers a $12K credit tier available even for startups
      without a partner affiliation.
  - question: What services do credits cover?
    answer: >-
      Credits can be used for all Aiven-managed open-source technologies
      including databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL), analytics (ClickHouse, Flink),
      search (OpenSearch), and event streaming (Apache Kafka).
  - question: How long does credit approval take?
    answer: >-
      The review process typically takes 2-4 weeks after a complete application
      is submitted.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/akamai/free-trial-100.yaml
================
provider_slug: "akamai"
title: "Akamai $100 Free Trial & Business Credits"
meta_title: "Instant Access with $100 Credit or Up to $5,000 for Businesses"
intro: "Sign up for a new Akamai Connected Cloud account and receive $100 in free credits. A valid payment method is required to verify your identity, but you won't be billed unless you exceed the trial credit. Business customers can apply for up to $5,000 in credits."
description: "This free trial provides $100 in credits for new customers interested in trying Akamai's core cloud services. The trial excludes GPU plans but can be used on many other offerings such as compute instances, Object Storage, Block Storage, and NodeBalancers. Credits expire 60 days from activation. Business customers can apply for up to $5,000 in credits with flexible payment options."
status: "Active"
tags: ["cloud"]
url: "https://www.akamai.com"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 5000
tiers:
  - name: "Free Trial Tier"
    intro: "Instant access to $100 credit for new customers."
    max_value: 100
    url: "https://www.akamai.com"
    benefits:
      - "$100 in free credits"
      - "60-day credit validity"
      - "Access to most Akamai Compute offerings (GPU plans excluded)"
      - "24/7 support via phone and email"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - "60 days"
    eligibility:
      - "New customers only"
      - "Valid payment method required"
    effort:
      - "Account creation with Google, GitHub, or email"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create an Account"
        description: "Use Google, GitHub, or a valid email to sign up."
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://www.linode.com/lp/free-credit-100-5000/"
  - name: "Business Credits Tier"
    intro: "Apply for up to $5,000 in credits for business customers."
    max_value: 5000
    url: "https://www.akamai.com/lp/free-credit-100-5000/"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $5,000 in business credits"
      - "Deploy what you need when you need it"
      - "Flexible payment options"
      - "24/7 support via phone and email"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "Varies based on approval"
    eligibility:
      - "Available to new and existing business customers"
      - "No credit card or pre-authorization required"
    effort:
      - "Business application process"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Apply for Business Credits"
        description: "Fill out the business application form to request up to $5,000 in credits."
        action: "Apply for Credits"
        action_url: "https://www.akamai.com/lp/free-credit-100-5000/"
faq:
  - question: "How do I sign up for the free trial?"
    answer: "Use Google or GitHub single sign-on, or provide your email to create a new account. A valid payment method is required for identity verification. Promotional credits are available only to new customers who have not previously signed up for a free trial."
  - question: "What can I do with my free trial?"
    answer: "Once you complete the sign-up process, you can use your credit towards many Compute plans (GPU plans are excluded), Object Storage, Block Storage, or NodeBalancers offerings. If you exceed the allotted credit amount within the 60-day trial period, the overage will be charged at standard rates."
  - question: "What forms of payment do you accept?"
    answer: "Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, and Google Pay with an associated credit card are all accepted. Additional options like wire transfer, purchase orders, and ACH are available upon request. Note that a temporary pre-authorization request may be sent to your bank, which will be immediately released but may take a few days to clear."
  - question: "What happens after my trial period ends?"
    answer: "You must spend your service credits during the trial period. Unused service credits will automatically expire, and you will be charged standard rates for any service over the allotted credit amount."
  - question: "How do I apply for business credits?"
    answer: "Business customers can apply for up to $5,000 in credits through the business application process. No credit card or pre-authorization is required, and you can pay via wire transfer, purchase order, ACH, and more."

================
File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/akamai/rise.yaml
================
provider_slug: "akamai"
title: "Akamai Cloud Rise Startup Program"
meta_title: "Startup Cloud Credit Program"
intro: "Get up to $120,000 in cloud infrastructure credits for virtual machines, GPU instances, and storage, plus expert support to help your startup scale affordably."
description: "Rise is a three-year startup program from Akamai (formerly Linode) that provides between $500 and $120,000 in cloud credits during the first year, along with guidance from solutions engineers, community networking, and dedicated account management. In the second and third years, participants continue to receive discounted cloud services, ensuring affordable scalability for early-stage businesses."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "cloud"
  - "hosting"
  - "gpu"
  - "enterprise"
  - "edge computing"
url: "https://www.linode.com/linode-for-startups/"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 500
max_value: 120000

community_notes:
  - title: "Linode Rebrand to Akamai"
    body: "In February 2022, Linode was acquired and rebranded under Akamai, integrating Linode's developer-friendly infrastructure with Akamai's edge platform."
    source_url: "https://www.akamai.com/blog/news/linode-rebrand"

tiers:
  - name: "Rise Membership"
    intro: "Qualify for anywhere from $500 to $120,000 of credits in your first year, then enjoy discounts in years two and three."
    max_value: 120000
    url: "https://www.linode.com/linode-for-startups/"
    benefits:
      - "Infrastructure credits up to $120,000 during the first year"
      - "24/7 priority customer support"
      - "One-on-one cloud consulting and migration assistance"
      - "Dedicated account manager and solution engineers"
      - "Access to a community of startups, alumni, and experts"
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - "3 years total"
    eligibility:
      - "Established less than 7 years"
      - "Has a company website and corporate email"
      - "At least one: paid employees (beyond founders), active non-friends/family users, or generating revenue"
      - "Plans to use Akamai as a primary infrastructure provider"
      - "Current business has not previously been a part of Rise"
    effort:
      - "Online application and account creation"
      - "Brief interview with the program team"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create Akamai (Linode) Account"
        description: "Use your corporate email and valid credit card. Be sure to designate the account as commercial by including a corporate entity in the Company field."
        action: "Register"
        action_url: "https://www.linode.com/signup"
      - name: "Review Qualifications & Apply"
        description: "Confirm your business meets the Rise Membership Qualifications, then submit the application."
        action: "Apply"
        action_url: "https://www.linode.com/rise"
      - name: "Interview with Rise Team"
        description: "If your application is accepted for review, a program representative will schedule an interview."
      - name: "Receive Credits & Next Steps"
        description: "Upon acceptance, credits are added to your account, and your program coordinator will help you get started."

faq:
  - question: "What is Rise?"
    answer: "Rise is an early-stage program offering $500–$120,000 in credits during the first year to help startups build and scale on affordable cloud infrastructure."
  - question: "Who is eligible for Rise? How do you determine eligibility?"
    answer: "Eligible companies are less than seven years old, have a corporate email and functional website, and demonstrate a plan for growth using Akamai as a primary provider. Company size, revenue, and usage plans are also taken into consideration."
  - question: "I am an existing customer. Do I qualify for Rise?"
    answer: "Existing customers may be eligible if they plan to expand their workloads on Akamai. The Rise team will review your existing usage and future goals."
  - question: "What happens if I go over the monthly credit?"
    answer: "You will be charged for any usage that exceeds the monthly credit limit."
  - question: "Do I need to have a Linode account to sign up for Rise?"
    answer: "Yes. You must create or have a corporate Linode account with a valid credit card and matching corporate email domain before applying."
  - question: "Will there be any help with migrating my workload from other cloud providers?"
    answer: "Absolutely. Akamai's technical experts provide guidance and planning to ensure your migration process is smooth and efficient."
  - question: "What types of companies are a good fit for Rise?"
    answer: "Any startup can apply, with a focus on SaaS, media, and gaming. Managed hosting providers, MSPs, system integrators, and other resellers are not eligible and should explore Akamai's partner programs instead."
  - question: "What happens to my credits after the first year?"
    answer: "Credits do not roll over. Rise is a three-year program, and after the first year, discounted cloud services are offered for the remaining duration."
  - question: "Are there any limitations on how I use the Rise credits?"
    answer: "Yes. Credits cannot be applied to bandwidth overages, and standard account usage policies apply."
  - question: "Are there additional benefits beyond cloud credits?"
    answer: "Yes. Participants receive priority support, a dedicated account manager, and access to a global community of startups and alumni."

success_stories:
  - title: "Macrometa"
    summary: "Macrometa received hands-on support from the Akamai (Linode) team, enabling a solid infrastructure foundation for market launch."
    link: "#"
  - title: "SimSage"
    summary: "SimSage migrated its entire infrastructure to Linode, seamlessly leveraging Linux environments and reducing hosting costs."
    link: "#"
  - title: "Curriki"
    summary: "Curriki built an open-source digital learning tool on Linode's cloud, matching or surpassing commercial offerings for online education."
    link: "#"

provider_slug: alchemy
title: Alchemy for Startups
meta_title: Alchemy Startup Program - Accelerate Web3 Innovation
intro: >-
  Get 3 months FREE credits for startups switching from other infrastructure
  providers, along with dedicated technical support, discount opportunities, and
  access to a vast partner network.
description: >-
  Alchemy for Startups provides critical infrastructure and support for web3
  developers. The program offers 3 months free credits for teams transitioning
  from other platforms, annual plan discounts, and custom credit packages
  through partnerships such as Google Cloud. Additional benefits include 24/7
  engineering support via Telegram, priority debugging sessions, early access to
  innovative APIs and SDKs, and exclusive co-marketing opportunities with a
  network of over 14,000 enterprise contacts. Open to pre-seed through Series A
  projects, the program is designed to reduce infrastructure costs and
  accelerate blockchain innovation.
status: Active
tags:
  - web3
  - blockchain
url: https://alchemyapi.typeform.com/to/Ll9GdIEa

    body: >-

      engineers, according to industry leaders.
    source_url: https://www.alchemy.com/case-studies
tiers:
  - name: Switch & Save Offer
    intro: >-
      For startups currently paying for infrastructure elsewhere, receive 3
      months of free credits to jumpstart development.
    max_value: 100

    benefits:
      - 3 months free credits
      - Quick eligibility check
      - Immediate activation upon application
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 3 months
    eligibility:
      - Startups paying for infrastructure with other providers
    effort_level: 1

        description: Submit your application to claim 3 months of free credits.
        action: Apply now
        action_url: https://bit.ly/3DH098s
faq:
  - question: Who can join the Alchemy Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      The program is designed for web3 startups from pre-seed to Series A,
      whether they are affiliated with a registered partner or just starting
      out.
  - question: What are the benefits of the program?
    answer: >-
      Qualified startups receive free credits, 24/7 technical support, annual
      plan discounts, co-marketing opportunities, and access to extensive
      educational and technical resources.
  - question: How do I apply?
    answer: >-
      Applications can be completed in less than 10 minutes via the online form,
      followed by an onboarding call with the team.
  - question: How do I get approved for credits?
    answer: >-
      Applicants provide details about their project and any partner
      affiliations, then undergo a brief technical review before benefits are
      activated.
  - question: Are current Alchemy customers eligible?
    answer: >-
      Current customers affiliated with a partner can access the benefits,
      though those who have already received credits are not eligible for
      additional credits.
  - question: How can I use my credits?
    answer: >-
      Credits can be applied towards annual plans and used to offset
      infrastructure costs.

draft: false
provider_slug: algolia
title: Algolia Startup Program
meta_title: Algolia Startup Program - Accelerate Your Growth with Search Technology
intro: >-
  The Algolia Startup Program helps startups differentiate and scale by offering
  $10,000 in platform credits valid for 12 months alongside world-class support
  and a range of additional perks.
description: >-
  The Algolia Startup Program provides emerging companies with powerful search
  infrastructure to enhance user experiences and reduce initial costs. Startups
  receive $10,000 in Algolia credits valid for 12 months, access to partner SaaS
  credits, comprehensive educational resources through Algolia Academy, and
  opportunities for increased visibility via marketing materials. The program is
  exclusively for new Algolia customers, specifically those that are less than 3
  years old and have raised under $5M in funding. Upon credit consumption,
  startups automatically transition to a pay-as-you-go plan or may opt for
  committed plans with a 20% discount.
status: Active
tags:
  - search
  - api
  - dev tools
  - saas
url: https://www.algolia.com/startup-program/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 10000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Algolia Startup Credits
    intro: >-
      Eligible startups receive $10,000 in Algolia credits valid for 12 months,
      along with world-class technical support and additional perks.
    max_value: 10000
    url: https://www.algolia.com/startup-program/
    benefits:
      - $10,000 in Algolia credits valid for 12 months
      - World-class technical support
      - Access to partner SaaS credits (e.g., Segment, Notion)
      - Full access to Algolia Academy resources
      - Opportunity to be featured in Algolia's marketing materials
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Less than 3 years old
      - Less than $5M in funding
      - New Algolia customers only
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application Email
        description: >-
          Send an email to startups@algolia.com with your company details and
          product description to apply for the program.
        action: Email Now
        action_url: mailto:startups@algolia.com
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for the Algolia startup program?
    answer: >-
      Startups that are less than three years old and have raised less than $5M
      in funding are eligible for the program.
  - question: What do we get if we get approved in the program?
    answer: >-
      If approved, startups receive $10,000 in Algolia credits that can be used
      in the first 12 months.
  - question: >-
      I am not able to use all my credits in the 12 months, can I use them
      later?
    answer: All unused credits will expire after 12 months.
  - question: What happens if I end up using all the credits before 12 months?
    answer: >-
      Once the $10,000 credits are exhausted, startups will be automatically
      moved to a pay-as-you-go plan, with an option to contact the sales team
      for committed plans with a 20% discount.
  - question: >-
      I am already a paying Algolia customer, can I still apply and get
      approved?
    answer: >-
      No, the program is only for new and free users; paying customers are not
      eligible.
  - question: I am a free user of Algolia, can I apply and get approved?
    answer: >-
      Yes, free users who meet the eligibility criteria can apply and get
      approved.
  - question: Can I redeem more than one code?
    answer: >-
      No, startups that have used any other coupon code in the past are not
      eligible for the Algolia Startup Program.
  - question: Can I transfer my Algolia credits?
    answer: >-
      No, the credits are non-transferable and any unused credits will expire
      after 12 months.
  - question: What if I still have questions which are not answered here?
    answer: Send an email to startups@algolia.com for further inquiries.

provider_slug: alibabacloud
title: Alibaba Cloud Startup Catalyst Program
meta_title: Cloud Credits, Technical Support & Market Entry for Startups
intro: >-
  The Alibaba Cloud Startup Catalyst Program provides comprehensive support for
  startups to build and scale their cloud infrastructure, offering up to
  $120,000 in cloud credits along with technical, educational, and networking
  benefits.
description: >-
  This program offers startups up to $120,000 in cloud credits to deploy
  scalable infrastructure. It includes a 3-month Global Technology Services
  package at the price of 1 month, dedicated cloud architect guidance, a 1-year
  Alibaba Cloud Academy membership with hands-on labs and certification
  opportunities, and exposure through featured placement on Alibaba Cloud
  Marketplace. Additional benefits include invitations to regional demo days,
  investor pitch sessions, and co-marketing campaigns to aid market entry,
  especially into China. Eligibility requires startups founded within the last
  10 years, funded with a functioning website and company email, a working
  prototype (ideation-stage excluded), and a scalable business model with
  international growth potential. A non-refundable registration fee of $64.20
  (GST included) applies for shortlisted applicants.

      participating startups.

      required for shortlisted applicants after the pitch.

provider_slug: amplitude
title: Amplitude for Startups
meta_title: Free Analytics & Web Insights for Startups
intro: >-
  Offers free access to the Amplitude Growth plan for 12 months, enabling
  startups to leverage advanced analytics, experimentation, session replay, and
  a Customer Data Platform (CDP) with a generous data limit of 200,000 MTUs.
description: >-
  Amplitude for Startups provides early-stage companies with a suite of advanced
  analytics tools for one year, including Analytics, Feature and Web
  Experimentation, Session Replay, and CDP. Delivered through three tracks – the
  Startup Scholarship for startups with less than $10M in funding and under 20
  employees; the Tech for Black Founders Scholarship for eligible U.S.-based
  startups with less than $30M funding and fewer than 150 employees; and the
  Portfolio Company Discount for select portfolio companies – it offers premium
  support, scalable data limits (~100M events/month), and access to the
  Amplitude Cohort of over 2,400 peers. After the free period, participants can
  transition to a paid Growth plan with continued competitive discounts.

faq:

    answer: >-
      Participants can access technical support, implementation assistance, and
      feature guidance via the Customer Help Center, and join the Amplitude
      Cohort for non-technical queries.
  - question: What is the approval timeline for the scholarships?
    answer: >-
      Applications are reviewed within two business days, with over 96% approval
      rate for scholarship applicants.
  - question: What are the data limits for the Growth plan?
    answer: >-
      The Growth plan includes a data limit of 200,000 monthly tracked users or
      around 100 million events per month.
  - question: What options are available after the free period?
    answer: >-
      After the initial 12-month period, startups can continue with the Growth
      plan on a paid basis, upgrade to the Plus plan, or switch to the free
      Starter plan.

provider_slug: ansys
title: Ansys Startup Program
meta_title: Discounted Engineering Software for Eligible Startups
intro: >-
  The Ansys Startup Program provides early-stage companies with discounted
  access to world-class multiphysics simulation tools, enabling them to
  accelerate product development and reduce prototyping costs.
description: >-
  Ansys Startup Program offers early-stage startups full access to an
  industry-leading multiphysics simulation suite, including tools for
  structures, fluids, electromagnetics, and semiconductor design. The program
  enables companies to decrease design timelines, reduce development costs, and
  improve product performance through advanced virtual testing that can cut
  physical prototyping expenses by up to 85%. Eligibility requires that
  companies be privately held for less than 10 years, generate less than $5M in
  annual revenue, and operate in physical product development. Participants are
  expected to provide customer testimonials, case studies, and quarterly social
  media updates featuring Ansys partnership branding. With tailored software
  bundles and dedicated technical support via the Ansys Learning Hub, the
  initiative has empowered over 1,500 startups across 57 countries since 2016.
status: Active
tags:
  - simulation
  - engineering
  - manufacturing
  - 3d
url: https://www.ansys.com/startup-program
value_type: discount
currency: USD
min_value: 0
max_value: 50
community_notes:
  - title: Proven Impact
    body: >-
      Startups in the program have achieved an average 6:1 ROI and significant
      cost savings by reducing prototyping expenses by up to 85%.
    source_url: https://www.ansys.com/startup-program
tiers:
  - name: Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Eligible early-stage startups receive discounted pricing on bundled
      simulation software to accelerate product development and reduce
      prototyping costs.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://www.ansys.com/startup-program
    benefits:
      - Full access to Ansys multiphysics simulation suite
      - >-
        Specialized software bundles for structures, electromagnetics, and
        semiconductor design
      - Dedicated technical support and access to Ansys Learning Hub
      - Potential cost savings up to 85% on physical prototyping
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - Ongoing as long as eligibility is maintained
    eligibility:
      - Privately held and less than 10 years old
      - Annual revenue under $5M
      - Focused on physical product development
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the online application form with your company or school
          details and product interest.
        action: Contact Us
        action_url: https://www.ansys.com/startup-program
faq:
  - question: What does the Ansys Startup Program offer?
    answer: >-
      It provides discounted access to a full suite of multiphysics simulation
      tools, technical support, and specialized software bundles to help
      startups accelerate product development and reduce prototyping costs.
  - question: Who is eligible for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be privately held for less than 10 years, generate under $5M
      in annual revenue, and be involved in physical product development.
  - question: What commitments are required from participants?
    answer: >-
      Participants are expected to provide customer testimonials, case studies,
      quarterly social media updates (#ANSYSstartups), and display Ansys
      partnership branding, with exceptions available for stealth-mode
      companies.

draft: false
provider_slug: apollo
title: Apollo for Startups
meta_title: Apollo for Startups - Accelerate Your Growth
intro: >-
  Join Apollo for Startups to access discounted sales intelligence tools,
  exclusive B2B data, and tailored growth resources designed for emerging
  companies.
description: >-
  Apollo for Startups provides emerging companies with discounted access to
  Apollo's advanced sales and marketing platform, including a 50% discount on
  annual Basic/Professional plans for first-year subscribers. Participants gain
  access to over 210M B2B contacts with 65+ filters, automated email campaigns,
  CRM integrations, and robust analytics. The program also offers educational
  webinars, Apollo Academy training, and dedicated support from a partnership
  manager. Eligibility requires new Apollo customers with a valid corporate
  email, affiliation with Apollo’s partner network, and 20 or fewer employees,
  with the discount applicable to the first 5 user seats.
status: Active
tags:
  - sales
  - marketing
  - b2b
url: https://apollo.io/startups
value_type: discount
min_value: 50
max_value: 50
community_notes:
  - title: Startup Community Impact
    body: >-
      Over 3,000 startups leverage Apollo for rapid growth and efficient
      customer acquisition through exclusive resources and unmatched B2B data
      access.
    source_url: https://apollo.io/startups
tiers:
  - name: Apollo for Startups
    intro: >-
      Receive a 50% discount on annual Basic/Professional plans and gain access
      to Apollo's comprehensive suite of go-to-market tools.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://apollo.io/startups
    benefits:
      - 50% discount on annual Basic/Professional plans
      - Access to 210M+ B2B contacts and 65+ filters
      - Educational webinars and Apollo Academy training
      - Dedicated partnership manager support
      - Exclusive access to a SaaS tool marketplace
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Startups with 20 or fewer employees
      - New Apollo customers with a valid corporate email
      - >-
        Affiliated with Apollo’s partner network (VCs, accelerators, or startup
        communities)
      - Discount applies to first 5 user seats
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Verify Eligibility
        description: >-
          Ensure your startup meets the criteria including employee count, valid
          corporate domain, and approved partner affiliation.
        action: Learn More
        action_url: https://apollo.io/startups
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Apply via Apollo's startup portal to claim your discount and access
          growth resources.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://apollo.io/startups
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for the exclusive discount?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups must be new Apollo customers with a valid corporate
      email, have 20 or fewer employees, and be affiliated with an approved
      startup ecosystem partner.
  - question: What if my startup is not affiliated with a startup ecosystem partner?
    answer: >-
      Startups not currently affiliated can join a waitlist or encourage their
      accelerator, VC, or community to become an Apollo partner.
  - question: How can my startup community access this discount?
    answer: >-
      Startup communities can apply to become an Apollo partner, enabling them
      to extend the exclusive discount to their members.
  - question: Who can I contact for further assistance?
    answer: >-
      For additional support or inquiries, startups can reach out to Apollo's
      team at startups@apollo.io.

provider_slug: appwrite
title: Appwrite Startups Program
meta_title: Build Your Startup with Appwrite - $20,000 Cloud Credits & Scale
intro: >-

  backend solution, offering $20,000 in cloud credits for Appwrite Scale for 12
  months along with priority support.
description: >-
  The Appwrite Startups Program offers early-stage companies a comprehensive
  backend solution with financial and technical support to accelerate growth.
  Participants gain full access to the Appwrite Scale plan, which includes
  unlimited team members, advanced compliance measures, and dedicated support
  channels. The program provides $20,000 in cloud credits for 12 months to
  reduce upfront infrastructure costs, along with priority email support and
  access to a vibrant open source community. Eligible startups include those
  established within the last decade with a functional website and a team of two
  or more members. After applying via the program page, selected startups will
  receive a redemption code and detailed onboarding instructions. Additional
  support such as migration tools and custom plans are available for projects
  with greater needs.

      databases, as that's already taken care of.
    source_url: https://appwrite.io/startups

      Appwrite comes with built-in security features like authentication,
      database security, and more, reducing the time and effort you need to
      spend on securing your application.
    source_url: https://appwrite.io/startups

      - Up to $20,000 cloud credits for 12 months

      - 12 months

          onboarding instructions.
faq:
  - question: How do I apply?
    answer: >-
      Submit the application form on the program page with your full name,
      email, company name, and website.
  - question: What happens after I apply?
    answer: >-
      The Appwrite team evaluates your application. If selected, you will
      receive an email with a special code to redeem your cloud credits and
      detailed onboarding instructions.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Eligible applicants are early-stage startups established within the last
      decade with a functional website and a team of two or more. Pro and Free
      plan users can apply, while existing Scale users cannot.
  - question: What if we need more resources than what is offered?
    answer: >-
      If additional resources are required, Appwrite can discuss tailored
      solutions to meet your specific needs.
  - question: What happens after the 12 months run out?
    answer: >-
      Approximately one month before the term ends, Appwrite will reevaluate
      your usage and provide a fitting plan based on your needs.
  - question: What kind of support is provided?
    answer: >-
      Participants receive priority email support, access to a private Discord
      channel with direct engineering access, and a dedicated program manager.

  and robust investor relations support that can boost team efficiency by up to
  45%. Supported by a network of partners including 500 Global, Brex, and
  others, startups receive discounted access to Asana's Advanced plan—enabling
  seamless project management and smart workflow automation.

  - collaboration

      featuring centralized project management, workflow automation, and
      enhanced reporting.
    max_value: 100

    benefits:
      - 12-month free Advanced plan access
      - Centralized project and task management
      - Workflow automation with custom templates
      - Real-time reporting and goal tracking
      - Enhanced investor relations dashboards

      - 12 months

      - Pre-Series E funding stage

          Advanced plan access.

          Fill out the startup application form to qualify for the discounted
          Advanced plan access.

faq:
  - question: Which Asana plans are eligible for the startup discount?
    answer: >-
      Only startups on the Asana Advanced plan are eligible for the discount
      offer.
  - question: How long does the discount period last?
    answer: >-
      The program provides free Advanced plan access for 12 months, beginning on
      the date of redemption.
  - question: What are the eligibility criteria for the program?
    answer: >-
      The discount is intended for startups with less than 500 employees and a
      pre-Series E funding stage. Companies exceeding these criteria are not
      eligible.
  - question: How can I apply for the discount?
    answer: >-
      Startups can either redeem an existing discount code at asa.na/offer or
      submit an application via the provided form.

provider_slug: assemblyai
title: AssemblyAI Startup Program
meta_title: Build Voice-Powered AI with AssemblyAI
intro: >-
  The AssemblyAI Startup Program provides early-stage startups with up to
  $150,000 in free API credits to build voice-powered applications using
  industry-leading speech-to-text technology.
description: >-
  Designed for early-stage startups, the AssemblyAI Startup Program enables
  innovators to create powerful voice-enabled AI applications. The program
  offers up to $150,000 in free API credits, granting full access to
  AssemblyAI’s latest features such as real-time transcription, speaker
  diarization, sentiment analysis, and large language model integrations for
  summarization and Q&A generation. In addition, participants receive 24/7 Slack
  technical support, one-to-one sessions with solutions architects, exclusive
  co-marketing opportunities, and invitations to events like hackathons and
  founder dinners. Eligible startups—from bootstrapped to Series B—that leverage
  voice data in industries such as brand safety, telehealth, and conversation
  intelligence can apply. Credits are valid for 12 months post-approval, with
  additional conditions for premium feature usage.
status: Active
tags:
  - ai
  - speech
  - api
  - saas

      conversation intelligence capabilities.

      CallRail doubled conversation intelligence adoption through AssemblyAI’s
      real-time transcription services.
    source_url: https://www.assemblyai.com/startup-program

      community networking.
    max_value: 150000

        Access to advanced features including real-time transcription, speaker
        diarization, and sentiment analysis
      - 24/7 Slack support and 1:1 sessions with solutions architects
      - Exclusive co-marketing opportunities and event invitations
      - Networking with a global community of AI innovators
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Bootstrapped to Series B startups
      - >-
        Must leverage voice data in domains like brand safety, telehealth, and
        conversation intelligence
      - Ability to integrate AssemblyAI’s API

          funding details.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.assemblyai.com/startup-program
faq:

    answer: >-
      Applicants should complete the online application form via AssemblyAI’s
      startup portal and provide the required company and funding details.
  - question: What are the eligibility requirements?
    answer: >-
      The program is open to early-stage startups from bootstrapped to Series B
      that leverage voice data in areas such as brand safety, telehealth,
      conversation intelligence, and more.
  - question: Will my AssemblyAI credits expire?
    answer: Yes, the credits are valid for 12 months post-approval.
  - question: Can existing AssemblyAI customers apply?
    answer: >-
      The program is specifically designed for early-stage startups; existing
      customers who do not fit the startup criteria may not be eligible.
  - question: Are there any usage limits or additional costs?
    answer: >-
      While the program provides up to $150,000 in free credits, additional
      costs may apply for premium features like PII redaction and summarization.
  - question: What technical support is provided?
    answer: >-
      Participants receive 24/7 Slack support along with 1:1 sessions with
      AssemblyAI’s solutions architects.

provider_slug: atlassian
title: Atlassian for Startups
meta_title: Premium Atlassian Tools for Startups
intro: >-
  Early-stage companies receive premium access to Atlassian's suite of tools at
  no cost for 12 months for up to 50 users, enabling them to plan, track, and
  collaborate seamlessly.
description: >-
  The Atlassian for Startups program offers eligible startups free premium
  access to Atlassian's cloud products including Jira, Jira Product Discovery,
  Confluence, Loom, Compass, and Bitbucket. Startups benefit from pre-built
  templates, AI-powered features, and integrated collaboration tools to
  kickstart projects and scale operations. Eligibility requires that the startup
  is not an existing Atlassian paid customer, is VC-backed or affiliated with an
  accelerator/incubator, and has raised no more than US$10 million in external
  funding. After the 12-month period, startups can renew, cancel, or downgrade
  their plans.
status: Active
tags:
  - collaboration
  - productivity
  - dev tools
  - project management
url: https://www.atlassian.com/software/startups

currency: USD
max_value: 100

    body: >-
      The offer provides premium access to Atlassian products worth over
      $15,000, available free for 12 months for up to 50 users.
    source_url: https://www.atlassian.com/software/startups

    intro: >-
      Receive free premium access to Atlassian products for 12 months for up to
      50 users.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://www.atlassian.com/software/startups
    benefits:
      - >-
        Kickstart your project with pre-built templates for business planning
        and competitive analysis.
      - >-
        Capture, prioritize, and align ideas with Jira Product Discovery and
        Confluence.
      - >-
        Collaborate effectively with AI-powered tools and integrated video
        messaging (Loom).
      - Manage code repositories and automate CI/CD with Bitbucket.
      - Monitor software health and enhance developer experience with Compass.
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Not an existing Atlassian paid customer
      - VC-backed or affiliated with an accelerator/incubator
      - Have raised no more than US$10 million in external funding
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply Online
        description: >-
          Visit the Atlassian for Startups website to check eligibility and
          apply.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.atlassian.com/software/startups
faq:
  - question: How long does the Atlassian for Startups program last?
    answer: >-
      The free access lasts for 12 months, after which startups can choose to
      renew, cancel, or downgrade to free plans.
  - question: What if my team exceeds 50 users?
    answer: >-
      If more than 50 users require access, startups must upgrade to a paid
      version for additional seats.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Eligibility requires that the startup is not an existing Atlassian paid
      customer, is VC-backed or affiliated with an accelerator/incubator, and
      has raised no more than US$10 million in external funding.
  - question: What happens after the 12-month period?
    answer: >-
      After 12 months, startups can renew the free offer, opt for standard
      pricing, or switch to a lower-tier free plan.

draft: false
provider_slug: auth0
title: Auth0 Startup Program
meta_title: ""
intro: >-
  Provides a robust one-year free access to the B2B Professional Plan with
  advanced security measures and extensive integrations, enabling eligible
  startups to build enterprise-grade authentication systems without upfront
  costs.
description: >-
  Auth0's Startup Program offers startups the opportunity to leverage the full
  B2B Professional Plan for 12 months, featuring 100,000 monthly active users,
  enterprise multi-factor authentication, breached password detection, and over
  50 integrations. It supports growth with pre-built login flows, customizable
  interfaces, and priority email support, saving an estimated $9,000 per year in
  infrastructure costs. After the program, accounts downgrade to a Free Plan
  with limited features.
status: Active
tags:
  - cybersecurity
  - api
  - saas
  - dev tools
  - compliance
url: https://auth0.com/startup-program
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 0
max_value: 9000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Startup Program Tier
    intro: >-
      Provides one-year free access to the B2B Professional Plan with full
      features including 100,000 MAUs, advanced security, and extensive
      integrations.
    max_value: 9000
    url: https://auth0.com/startup-program
    benefits:
      - 100,000 monthly active users
      - Enterprise MFA and advanced security features
      - 50+ social/identity provider integrations
      - Unlimited organizations and admins
      - Priority email support during the free year
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Venture-backed with ≤$5M total funding
      - Annual recurring revenue < $1M
      - Incorporated ≤2 years ago
      - Not an existing Auth0 or Okta paying customer
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Apply through Auth0’s portal with required funding and revenue
          documentation.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://auth0.com/startup-program/apply
  - name: Free Tier
    intro: >-
      For startups not qualifying for the Startup Program, provides a free tier
      with 25,000 monthly active users and basic authentication features.
    max_value: 0
    url: https://auth0.com/startup-program
    benefits:
      - 25,000 monthly active users
      - Basic authentication features
      - Standard support
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - Ongoing
    eligibility:
      - Does not meet Startup Program eligibility criteria
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: Create an Auth0 account to access the free tier.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://auth0.com/signup
faq:
  - question: What happens after the 1-year period?
    answer: >-
      Accounts automatically downgrade to the Free Plan (limited to 25k MAUs and
      basic features). Paid plans from $35/month retain premium features.
  - question: Can I extend the free period?
    answer: >-
      No, there are no extensions. Companies must upgrade to a paid or free tier
      after 12 months.
  - question: How does program acceptance work?
    answer: >-
      Applications are reviewed within 5-7 business days, with onboarding
      support provided to approved companies.
  - question: Is technical help included?
    answer: >-
      Technical support is limited to email during the free year;
      enterprise-level support is available with paid plans.
  - question: What if my startup grows mid-program?
    answer: >-
      If your growth leads to exceeding the eligibility thresholds, an early
      re-evaluation may occur.

draft: false
provider_slug: autodesk
title: Autodesk Fusion for Startups
meta_title: Autodesk Fusion for Startups - Discounted Cloud-Based Design Solutions
intro: >-
  Autodesk Fusion for Startups offers integrated cloud-based CAD, CAM, CAE, and
  PCB software to accelerate innovation by providing entrepreneurs free access
  to advanced design and engineering tools.
description: >-
  Autodesk Fusion for Startups provides entrepreneurs and early-stage companies
  with access to advanced product development tools under tailored licensing
  terms. The program integrates CAD, CAM, CAE, and PCB design within a cloud
  platform that streamlines product development from concept to manufacturing.
  It offers advanced manufacturing capabilities including 5-axis machining,
  additive manufacturing, and AI-powered CNC programming, as well as
  cost-efficient access with a 3-year subscription at $150 per user (for up to
  10 users) compared to the standard $680 per year commercial pricing.
  Participants benefit from real-time project collaboration tools and are
  required to undergo annual recertification along with mandatory participation
  in customer success stories, transitioning to commercial subscriptions upon
  program completion.
status: Active
tags:
  - manufacturing
  - engineering
  - design
  - 3d
url: https://www.autodesk.com/fusion-for-startups
value_type: discount
max_value: 100
community_notes:
  - title: Key Limitations
    body: >-
      The program is non-renewable with a 3-year term, imposes commercial
      restrictions if eligibility criteria are exceeded, and limits
      installations to 3 devices per license with single concurrent use.
    source_url: https://www.autodesk.com/fusion-for-startups
tiers:
  - name: Startup License
    intro: >-
      Access advanced Autodesk Fusion tools at a discounted rate designed for
      early-stage companies.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://www.autodesk.com/fusion-for-startups
    benefits:
      - Integrated cloud platform with CAD, CAM, CAE, and PCB design
      - >-
        Advanced manufacturing capabilities including 5-axis machining and
        additive manufacturing
      - AI-powered CNC programming workflows
      - Cost-efficient 3-year subscription at $150/user for up to 10 users
      - Real-time project collaboration with version control
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 3 years
    eligibility:
      - Business age of ≤3 years
      - Annual gross revenue below $100k
      - Team size of ≤10 employees
      - Must design or manufacture physical products
      - Requires active website or social media presence
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply for the Program
        description: >-
          Visit the Autodesk Fusion for Startups page and complete the online
          application form.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.autodesk.com/fusion-for-startups
faq:
  - question: What does the Autodesk Fusion for Startups program include?
    answer: >-
      It offers a 3-year discounted subscription to advanced cloud-based CAD,
      CAM, CAE, and PCB software along with advanced manufacturing capabilities
      and collaboration tools.
  - question: Who is eligible for the program?
    answer: >-
      The program is designed for early-stage companies that are 3 years old or
      less, with annual gross revenue under $100k, a team of 10 or fewer
      employees, and a focus on designing or manufacturing physical products
      with an active digital presence.
  - question: What happens after the 3-year term?
    answer: >-
      After the 3-year term, participants must purchase commercial subscriptions
      at prevailing rates and undergo annual recertification to maintain
      eligibility.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/aws/aws-activate.yaml
================
provider_slug: "aws"
title: "AWS Activate"
meta_title: "Get AWS Activate Credits - AWS Startups"
intro: "Apply for up to $100,000 in AWS Activate credits and unlock access to our partners' tools and services."
description: "AWS helps startups bring their ideas to life through AWS Activate. As you build and scale your business, Activate Credits grow with you to support your changing needs. If you're an AWS Activate member, you may be eligible for up to $100,000 in credits to help offset your AWS bill."
status: "Active"
tags: ["cloud"]
url: "https://aws.amazon.com/startups/credits"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 1000
max_value: 100000

tiers:
  - name: "Activate Founders"
    intro: "Start here if your startup is not yet associated with an Activate Provider"
    max_value: 1000
    url: "https://aws.amazon.com/startups/credits"
    benefits:
      - "$1,000 USD AWS Activate Credits"
      - "Eligible for usage on hundreds of AWS services"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - "New to AWS Activate Credits"
      - "Self-funded or pre-Series B (most recent funding round must be within the last 12 months, if applicable)"
      - "Have a fully-functioning company website"
      - "Founded in the past 10 years"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create AWS Builder ID"
        description: "Create an AWS Builder ID to access AWS services and apply for Activate"
        action: "Create Builder ID"
        action_url: "https://us-east-1.signin.aws/platform/login?workflowStateHandle=1ca962ab-8ba6-48ac-926f-cb961b6b037a"
      - name: "Complete Founders Application"
        description: "Fill out and submit the Activate Founders package application"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://aws.amazon.com/startups/credits"

  - name: "Activate Portfolio"
    intro: "Start here if your startup is associated with an Activate Provider"
    max_value: 100000
    url: "https://aws.amazon.com/startups/credits"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $100,000 USD AWS Activate Credits"
      - "Eligible for usage on hundreds of AWS services"
    benefits_level: 3
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - "Have not previously received AWS Activate Credits of equal or greater value"
      - "Self-funded or pre-Series B (most recent funding round must be within the last 12 months, if applicable)"
      - "Have a fully-functioning company website"
      - "Founded in the past 10 years"
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Obtain Organization ID"
        description: "Contact your Activate Provider to request a valid Organization ID"
        action: "Request Org ID"
        action_url: "https://aws.amazon.com/activate/portfolio-detail/"
      - name: "Complete Portfolio Application"
        description: "Fill out and submit the Activate Portfolio package application using your Org ID"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://aws.amazon.com/startups/credits"

faq:
  - question: "What can I use AWS Activate Credits for?"
    answer: "AWS offers over 200 services worldwide. You can use Activate Credits toward eligible AWS services and support, including infrastructure, machine learning, analytics, and more. For a full list of eligible services, see the AWS Billing and Cost Management console after receiving your approval email. Additional details are in the AWS Activate Terms & Conditions."
  - question: "What is not covered by AWS Activate Credits?"
    answer: "AWS Activate Credits cannot be applied to certain AWS Support tiers, AWS Marketplace products (except specific models on Amazon Bedrock), AWS Professional Services, or other ineligible fees. For comprehensive details on what's excluded, review the AWS Promotional Credit Terms & Conditions and the AWS Activate Terms & Conditions."
  - question: "How do I use my AWS Activate Credits?"
    answer: "Once approved, your credits are automatically applied to offset eligible AWS services and support costs. You can track credit usage and expiration dates within the AWS Activate Console or AWS Billing and Cost Management Console."
  - question: "What is an organization ID?"
    answer: "An organization ID is a numeric code associated with your Activate Provider. It's required if you're applying for the Activate Portfolio package. If you are not affiliated with a provider, you can apply for the Activate Founders package without an organization ID."
  - question: "What is an Activate Provider?"
    answer: "Activate Providers are accelerators, venture capital firms, and other startup enablers that collaborate with AWS. They issue organization IDs to qualifying startups, enabling them to apply for and receive AWS Activate Credits."
  - question: "Where can I find details about my credits including usage and expiration dates?"
    answer: "You can view your AWS Activate Credits balance, expiration date, and usage within both the AWS Billing and Cost Management Console and the AWS Activate Console. Email notifications will also be sent prior to expiration or when approaching full usage."
  - question: "How are my credits applied to Reserved Instances or Saving Plans?"
    answer: "Activate Credits apply to usage-based fees for Reserved Instances and Savings Plans. However, the upfront costs for RIs or Savings Plans are not covered by AWS Activate Credits."

================

Participants must have a valid AWS account with complete billing information, no linked accounts, and must not have previously received more than $300 of AWS promotional credit. Credits expire 6 months from issuance. For more details and to apply, complete the official application form."

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/azure/azure-200.yaml
================
provider_slug: "azure"
title: "Azure $200 Trial"
meta_title: "Free Tier and $200 Credits for New Azure Customers"
intro: "Azure’s free account offers new users $200 in credits to explore and build on the platform within 30 days, plus 12 months of free use of 20+ popular services."
description: "Designed for proof of concept and early exploration, Azure’s free account provides new users with $200 in credits for 30 days, along with 12 months of free usage for more than 20 popular Azure services and ongoing free usage of 65+ always-free services. There is no upfront commitment or risk, and users can continue with pay-as-you-go pricing once the initial 30-day credit expires or is fully consumed."
status: "Active"
tags: ["cloud", "free trial"]
url: "https://azure.microsoft.com/free"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 200

tiers:
  - name: "Azure Free Account"
    intro: "For new Azure customers seeking to experiment, prototype, or learn on the Azure platform with minimal risk."
    max_value: 200
    url: "https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/purchase-options/azure-account"
    benefits:
      - "$200 in Azure credit for 30 days"
      - "12 months of free use of 20+ popular services"
      - "65+ services always free"
      - "No upfront commitment—cancel anytime"
      - "Spending protection to avoid charges"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration: ["30 days for $200 credit", "12 months for select services"]
    eligibility:
      - "Must be a new Azure customer"
      - "Credit card verification required"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Sign Up for Free Azure Account"
        description: "Provide personal and payment verification details to activate the free account."
        action: "Register"
        action_url: "https://azure.microsoft.com/free"

faq:
  - question: "Do I need a credit card to sign up?"
    answer: "Yes, Microsoft uses a credit card or debit card for identity verification, but you won’t be charged unless you manually upgrade."
  - question: "What happens after my 30-day, $200 credit expires?"
    answer: "Once your 30-day period or $200 credit is used up, you can move to pay-as-you-go pricing to continue using Azure services."
  - question: "Are there any long-term contracts or commitments?"
    answer: "No. You can cancel anytime without penalty or continue using Azure as you grow."

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/azure/microsoft-for-startups.yaml
================
provider_slug: "azure"
title: "Microsoft for Startups (Founders Hub)"
meta_title: "Up to $150,000 Azure Credits and AI Enablement for Startups"
intro: "Build your AI-enabled startup with up to $150,000 in Azure credits, expert 1:1 guidance, and a network of business and technical resources through Microsoft for Startups."
description: >
  Microsoft for Startups (Founders Hub) helps companies build and scale on Azure 
  with credits ranging from $1,000 to $150,000 USD across four levels. The program 
  provides development tools like GitHub Enterprise and Visual Studio, unlimited 
  1:1 technical advisory, and AI capabilities including Azure OpenAI Service. 
  Eligible startups must be privately held, for-profit, building software products, 
  pre-Series D, and have used less than $10,000 in prior Azure credits. Credits 
  expire after 12 months or when consumed. The program aims to accelerate startup 
  innovation while reducing costs through Azure's enterprise infrastructure.
status: "Active"
tags: ["cloud", "ai"]
url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 150000

community_notes:
  - title: "Reddit Discussion - Microsoft Startups $150k Funding"
    body: >
      Reddit discussion confirms Microsoft for Startups eligibility: pre-Series D, 
      software-focused startups with under $10k prior Azure usage. Four credit 
      tiers available ($1k-$150k), valid for 12 months. Upgrade to next tier 
      possible at 50% usage. Program includes technical support, Office 365, 
      and GitHub Enterprise benefits. Most report easy approval process.
    source_url: "https://www.reddit.com/r/AZURE/comments/1e2fiz9/microsoft_startups_150k_funding_everything_you/"

tiers:
  - name: "Level 1 (L1)"
    intro: "Entry-level tier granting $1,000 in Azure credits to help founders launch quickly."
    max_value: 1000
    url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
    benefits:
      - "$1,000 Azure credits for up to 12 months"
      - "Unlimited 1:1 sessions with Azure engineers and mentors"
      - "Free access to Microsoft Teams, GitHub Enterprise, and more"
      - "No external funding requirements"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - "Up to 12 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Privately held, for-profit, software-based product"
      - "No prior usage of more than $10k in Azure credits"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Sign up on Founders Hub"
        description: "Create a Microsoft for Startups account, provide basic startup details, and register an FEIN if applicable."
        action: "Apply"
        action_url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
  - name: "Level 2 (L2)"
    intro: "For early-stage startups that have begun validating their idea and have used part of L1."
    max_value: 5000
    url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
    benefits:
      - "$5,000 Azure credits for up to 12 months"
      - "Technical support and best practices for AI integration"
      - "Broadening access to partner offers (e.g., LinkedIn Premium, Stripe Atlas)"
      - "Continued advisory from Azure engineers"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "Up to 12 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Has already enrolled in L1"
      - "Has used ~50% of L1 credits"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Request Level 2 Upgrade"
        description: "Demonstrate ongoing project progress and usage of L1 credits. Provide any requested business verification."
        action: "Apply for L2"
        action_url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
  - name: "Level 3 (L3)"
    intro: "For startups with product traction seeking more substantial Azure credits."
    max_value: 25000
    url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
    benefits:
      - "$25,000 Azure credits for up to 12 months"
      - "Deeper engagement with Microsoft’s AI and cloud experts"
      - "Demo opportunities and co-selling support"
      - "Potential GPU VM access, subject to quota"
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - "Up to 12 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Has substantially used L2 credits"
      - "Able to demonstrate a functional MVP or solution demo"
    effort: []
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Request Level 3 Upgrade"
        description: "Submit a short demo of your solution, discuss resource needs, and pass business verification."
        action: "Apply for L3"
        action_url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
  - name: "Level 4 (L4)"
    intro: "For scaling AI startups looking for enterprise-grade support with up to $150k in credits."
    max_value: 150000
    url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"
    benefits:
      - "$150,000 Azure credits for up to 12 months"
      - "Priority access to advanced AI models"
      - "Comprehensive technical and business advisory"
      - "Co-selling, marketplace exposure, and deeper partnership opportunities"
    benefits_level: 4
    duration:
      - "Up to 12 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Has reached usage milestones in L3"
      - "Able to show a legitimate business with scaling customer demand"
    effort_level: 4
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Request Level 4 Upgrade"
        description: "Demonstrate higher usage of Azure resources and a strong go-to-market trajectory. Provide updated business verification if requested."
        action: "Apply for L4"
        action_url: "https://foundershub.startups.microsoft.com/"

faq:
  - question: "What are the general requirements for Microsoft for Startups Founders Hub?"
    answer: "Applicants must be privately held, for-profit, building a software-based product or service, and have not reached Series D funding or used more than $10k in Azure credits previously."
  - question: "Do I need external funding or a specific stage to qualify?"
    answer: "No. Microsoft for Startups accepts startups at all stages, even if they have no external funding. You simply move through levels as your usage and business grow."
  - question: "How long do the credits last?"
    answer: "Azure credits expire 12 months after you are granted a tier’s credits or once you fully consume them, whichever comes first. Upgrading tiers typically resets the 12-month clock."
  - question: "Can I use the credits for GPU-based AI workloads?"
    answer: "Yes. GPU quotas may require a separate request or approval, especially for high-demand regions, but many participants have successfully obtained them through support tickets."
  - question: "Are there vendor lock-in penalties or fees for the program?"
    answer: "No. There are no fees or explicit lock-in requirements. However, once your sponsorship credits expire, you become responsible for any ongoing usage costs."

provider_slug: blockpi
title: BlockPI Web3 Startup Program

  designed to lower entry barriers and fuel growth. It offers up to $1000 in API
  credits, dedicated technical support via Telegram, and access to marketing and
  network opportunities.
description: >-
  The BlockPI Web3 Startup Program provides comprehensive support for blockchain
  projects through financial credits, technical assistance, and ecosystem
  partnerships. Benefits include API service credits, priority access to new
  features, marketing enablement, and network access to prominent venture
  capital firms and blockchain partners. The program is open to developers with
  funding, hackathon winners, grant recipients, projects building non-profit
  tools or public goods, and Exchange Launchpad/IEO/IDO initiatives.
  Applications are reviewed within 5 business days and accepted credits are
  valid for 12 months. Special features include enterprise-grade services,
  archive node access, customizable API endpoints, MEV protection, and
  transaction bundling without equity or KYC requirements.

      Protocol, and LucidBlue Ventures.

      marketing enablement, and network access.

          successful applicants.

      It is a comprehensive support program for blockchain startups offering up
      to $1000 in API credits, dedicated technical support, marketing
      enablement, and network access.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?

      Eligibility includes developers who have received funding, won hackathons,
      or obtained grants; projects building non-profit tools or public goods;
      Exchange Launchpad/IEO/IDO projects; and startups with a verifiable demo

provider_slug: brevo
title: Brevo Startup Program

  to unlock their full growth potential. The program partners with global VC firms,
  boutique accelerators, and other startup supporters to drive success for innovative businesses.
description: >-
  Brevo's Startups & VCs Program provides tailored marketing and CRM solutions
  to help emerging businesses scale efficiently. The program offers
  cost-effective access to enterprise tools including exclusive discounts on
  Brevo's marketing suite, multi-platform integration for email, SMS, sales
  pipeline management, and customer data. With over 150 pre-built integrations,
  API access for custom workflows, and priority onboarding with a dedicated
  support team, participating organizations receive strategic guidance to
  optimize their CRM and marketing operations. Partners include venture capital firms, 
  startup accelerators, incubators, and angel investor networks, with custom discount 
  tiers based on funding stage to maximize growth potential.

      competitors.

      first round of funding, along with comprehensive platform access.
    max_value: 75
    url: https://www.brevo.com/startups
    benefits:
      - Up to 75% off in first year, 50% off in second year
      - 150+ pre-built integrations
      - Access to Brevo Academy for accelerated growth
      - Dedicated customer support team
      - Complete marketing, sales, and conversation tools
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 2 years

      - Completed first round of funding
    effort_level: 3
