        description: >-
          Verify that you are a current participant or alumni of one of Brevo's partners.
        action: Check Eligibility
        action_url: https://www.brevo.com/startups
      - name: Apply for the Program
        description: >-
          Complete the application process with proof of your funding status.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.brevo.com/startups
  - name: Advanced Funding Tier
    intro: >-
      This tier caters to startups with significant funding of over $4 million,
      offering tailored discounts and enterprise-level solutions.
    max_value: 40
    url: https://www.brevo.com/startups
    benefits:
      - Up to 40% off in first year, 20% off in second year
      - Access to BrevoPlus enterprise solutions
      - Custom dashboards and multi-account solutions
      - Robust data privacy and dedicated support
      - Unified customer data and custom events tracking
    benefits_level: 4
    duration:
      - 2 years

      - Current participant or alumni of Brevo's partners
      - Over $4 million in funding

          Confirm your status as a participant or alumni of one of Brevo's partners.
        action: Verify Status

        description: >-
          Provide documentation confirming your company has received over $4 million in funding.
        action: Submit Application
        action_url: https://www.brevo.com/startups
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      The program is open to startups that are current participants or alumni of Brevo's
      partners, including venture capital firms, startup accelerators, incubators, and angel 
      investor networks. Startups must also meet funding criteria - either having completed a
      first round of funding or having received over $4 million in funding.
  - question: What tools are included in the program?
    answer: >-
      The program includes access to Brevo's comprehensive suite of tools including a Marketing
      Platform (email, SMS, landing pages, ads), Sales Platform (deal tracking, pipeline management),
      Conversations tools (live chat, chatbot, WhatsApp), Messaging API for transactional messages,
      and for qualifying startups, access to BrevoPlus enterprise solutions.
  - question: How long do the discounts last?
    answer: >-
      Discounts are structured over a two-year period. For startups with first round funding,
      this includes up to 75% off in the first year and 50% off in the second year. For startups
      with over $4 million in funding, discounts are up to 40% off in the first year and 20% off
      in the second year.

  billing platform to streamline quote-to-cash operations.
description: >-
  Cacheflow's Startup Accelerator Plan provides early-stage SaaS companies with
  a full suite of tools to close deals faster and manage revenue operations
  efficiently. At a 50% discount, the plan reduces the monthly subscription from
  $1,998 to $999 and includes 5 sales admin seats (with additional seats
  available at $99 per user), CRM integrations with HubSpot, Salesforce, and
  Close, unlimited quotes, subscriptions, billing, invoicing and usage-based
  billing, along with automated workflows for e-signatures, payments, and
  contract management. Implementation takes less than 5 hours and the system can
  be live within 1-2 days.

      solution designed for early-stage startups.
    max_value: 50

      - 5 included sales admin seats (additional seats at $99/user)
      - CRM integrations with HubSpot, Salesforce, and Close

      - Automated workflows for e-signature, payments, and contract management

        action: Claim Offer

faq:

      Cacheflow integrates natively with HubSpot, Salesforce, and Close, with
      additional connectivity available via Zapier and APIs.
  - question: Can Cacheflow manage subscriptions?
    answer: >-
      Yes, Cacheflow can manage SaaS subscriptions directly or integrate with
      third-party subscription management tools.
  - question: Is Cacheflow a CPQ?
    answer: >-
      Cacheflow is a CPQ alternative offering similar outcomes with a simpler,
      more efficient platform, faster deployment, and a better buyer experience.

      integrations and proposal branding.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/circleci/circleci-open-source-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: circleci
title: CircleCI Open Source Program
meta_title: CircleCI Open Source Free CI/CD for Open Source Projects
intro: >-
  Build open source projects for free with CircleCI's robust CI/CD platform,
  offering generous monthly credits and enterprise-grade features.
description: >-
  CircleCI supports open source projects with one of the most robust free CI/CD
  plans available. It provides up to 400,000 monthly credits for Linux, Docker,
  and Arm builds (equivalent to ~80,000 build minutes on a small Docker
  instance), and 30,000 credits for macOS and Windows builds. The program
  includes features like Docker layer caching, SSH debugging, flaky test
  detection, and advanced orchestration capabilities to accelerate build and
  test pipelines. Eligible projects hosted on GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket can
  access essential CI/CD tools at no cost.
status: Active
tags:
  - open source
  - ci/cd
  - devops
  - dev tools
url: https://circleci.com/open-source
value_type: discount
max_value: 100
community_notes:
  - title: Community Impact
    body: >-
      Over 3.6 million monthly open source builds highlight the program's
      extensive adoption and reliability.
    source_url: https://circleci.com/blog
  - title: Trusted by Leading Projects
    body: >-
      Renowned projects like Pandas, React, and Apollo GraphQL rely on CircleCI
      for their build and test workflows.
    source_url: https://circleci.com/customers
tiers:
  - name: Linux, Docker, & Arm Builds
    intro: >-
      For open source projects leveraging Linux, Docker, or Arm environments;
      receive up to 400,000 monthly credits, enabling approximately 80,000 build
      minutes on a small Docker instance.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://circleci.com/open-source
    benefits:
      - 400,000 monthly credits for Linux, Docker, and Arm builds
      - 30x concurrent build capacity
      - >-
        Enterprise-grade CI/CD features including Docker layer caching, SSH
        debugging, and flaky test detection
      - Access to various resource classes and self-hosted runners
      - Monthly credit refresh with no rollover
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Monthly
    eligibility:
      - Public repository on GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket
      - Meets open source licensing criteria
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: >-
          Register on CircleCI to activate the open source plan and start
          building.
        action: Get Started
        action_url: https://circleci.com/open-source
  - name: macOS & Windows Builds
    intro: >-
      Designed for open source projects requiring macOS or Windows environments;
      receive up to 30,000 monthly credits with essential CI/CD functionalities.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://circleci.com/open-source
    benefits:
      - 30,000 monthly credits for macOS and Windows builds
      - Essential CI/CD features with enterprise support
      - 5x concurrent build capacity
      - Access to private repositories under the free plan
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Monthly
    eligibility:
      - Public repository on GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket
      - Meets open source licensing criteria
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: >-
          Register on CircleCI's platform to access macOS and Windows build
          credits.
        action: Get Started
        action_url: https://circleci.com/open-source
faq:
  - question: How are credits converted to build minutes?
    answer: >-
      On a Linux Medium resource class, 1 credit is approximately 0.2 minutes,
      so 400,000 credits equate to about 80,000 build minutes on a small Docker
      instance.
  - question: Do credits roll over to the next month?
    answer: >-
      No, credits on the free plan expire at the end of each month and do not
      roll over.
  - question: Can I use macOS and Windows builds for my open source project?
    answer: >-
      Yes, open source projects can access up to 30,000 monthly credits for
      macOS and Windows builds with essential CI/CD functionalities.
  - question: What support options are available?
    answer: >-
      CircleCI offers community forums, detailed open source documentation, and
      optional direct assistance from their Developer Relations team for larger
      projects.

provider_slug: civo
title: Civo Free Trial $250
meta_title: Civo Free Trial $250
intro: >-
  Get $250 free Civo credit for 1 month to explore managed Kubernetes, cloud
  services, and more. Enjoy blazing fast cluster deployment, expert mentorship,
  and free educational resources designed for tech startups.
description: >-
  Civo offers a comprehensive Startup Program designed to support tech startups
  developing cloud-native applications. The program provides $250 in free credit
  valid for 1 month, along with access to managed Kubernetes with sub-90 second
  deployment, mentorship from cloud native experts, and extensive educational
  resources via Civo Academy. Eligible startups must sign up for a Civo account
  and add a valid credit/debit card within 3 months. The free credit expires at
  the end of the month following issuance, allowing startups to experience
  enterprise-grade infrastructure with transparent pricing starting at
  $5.43/month.
status: Active
tags:
  - kubernetes
  - cloud
  - devops
  - enterprise
  - hosting
url: https://www.civo.com/signup
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 250
max_value: 250
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Startup Credit Tier
    intro: >-
      Receive $250 free Civo credit valid for 1 month to explore managed
      Kubernetes and a range of cloud services.
    max_value: 250
    url: https://www.civo.com/signup
    benefits:
      - $250 free credit for 1 month
      - Managed Kubernetes with sub-90 second deployment
      - Access to cloud native expert mentorship
      - Free Kubernetes courses via Civo Academy
      - Transparent pricing starting at $5.43/month
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 1 month
    eligibility:
      - Tech startups developing cloud-native applications
      - Must sign up for a Civo account
      - Add a valid credit/debit card within 3 months of signup
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up for Civo
        description: >-
          Create a Civo account by providing your personal details and agreeing
          to the terms and offer conditions.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://www.civo.com/signup
faq:
  - question: How do I claim the $250 credit?
    answer: >-
      Add a payment card within 21 days of signup. The credit is applied to your
      usage first, with any remaining charges billed to your card.
  - question: Can I extend my credit validity?
    answer: >-
      No – unused credit expires at the end of the month following issuance. It
      is recommended to monitor your usage and set billing alerts.
  - question: What payment methods are accepted?
    answer: >-
      Visa, MasterCard, and American Express are accepted. Prepaid or virtual
      cards are not supported.
  - question: How quickly can my resources scale?
    answer: >-
      Civo's managed Kubernetes clusters launch in under 90 seconds, and nodes
      can be resized within 60 seconds.
  - question: Is data transfer limited?
    answer: No – Civo offers unlimited free egress and ingress.

  to an Enterprise workspace featuring unlimited storage, custom roles, advanced
  automation, and premium features. Dedicated onboarding support helps teams set
  up their workspace and learn the tools needed to scale efficiently. Overall,
  this initiative delivers a total value of $3,300 by combining credits with
  additional implementation services, positioning ClickUp as a strategic growth
  partner.

      Provides $3,000 in ClickUp credits, an Enterprise workspace, and
      onboarding resources to accelerate your team's productivity.
    max_value: 3000

      - Enterprise workspace with unlimited storage and custom roles

        Access to premium features such as AI tools, time tracking, and advanced
        automation
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Affiliated with an approved accelerator, incubator, or VC firm
      - Incorporated less than 5 years ago
      - Raised no more than Series B funding
      - New to ClickUp or on the Free Forever Plan

faq:

    answer: >-
      Approved startups can apply their ClickUp credits to any paid plan,
      including Unlimited, Business, or Enterprise tiers; the credits roll over
      for 12 months.
  - question: What are the eligibility requirements?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be affiliated with an approved accelerator, incubator, or VC
      firm, be incorporated for less than 5 years, have raised no more than
      Series B funding, and be new to ClickUp or on the Free Forever Plan.
  - question: What features are available with the Enterprise workspace?
    answer: >-
      The Enterprise workspace offers unlimited storage, custom roles, advanced
      automation, AI-powered tools, detailed time tracking, and dedicated
      onboarding support to ensure teams maximize productivity.

provider_slug: cloudflare
title: Cloudflare for Startups

intro: >-

  build scalable Internet and SaaS applications without the burden of high
  costs.
description: >-
  Cloudflare's Startup Program offers substantial resources including up to
  $250,000 in Flex Usage credits on advanced services such as Workers, Pages,
  Queues, D1, and R2 storage (capped at $10,000). This enables startups to
  leverage Cloudflare's global network, zero egress fees, and performance and
  security tools. Participants also gain exclusive perks like early access to
  beta products, priority email support, and the Workers Launchpad Funding
  Program which connects them with funding opportunities through VC
  partnerships. Eligibility requires building software/SaaS products, being
  founded within the last 5 years, and having a valid website and email address.

faq:
  - question: What happens if my credits are not used within one year?
    answer: >-
      A representative will help transition out of the program if credits remain
      unused after 1 year.
  - question: What happens if my credits are exhausted before one year?
    answer: >-
      A representative will assist in deciding the next plan in case credits are
      used up early.
  - question: Are credits transferable or refundable?
    answer: >-
      Credits are non-transferable, non-refundable, and cannot be redeemed for
      cash.
  - question: How do I apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Create a free Cloudflare account, complete the application form, and check
      your inbox for account activation.

  priority technical support, exclusive support add-ons, and personalized

    answer: >-
      It offers startups Cloudways platform credits up to $50,000, hosting
      discounts ranging from 15% to 20% off monthly invoices, 24/7 priority
      technical support, exclusive support add-ons, and tailored mentorship
      through distinct Build, Grow, and Expand tiers.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups must have a business website with a domain email and an
      active Cloudways trial account. Eligibility criteria vary by tier: less
      than $1M in funding for Build, Series-A funding or product-market fit for
      Grow, and Series-B funding or a market expansion strategy for Expand.
      Agencies are not eligible.
  - question: How can startups join the Cloudways Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      Startups can join the waitlist by submitting their details on the
      Cloudways Startup Program page, after which Cloudways will review
      eligibility and onboard approved candidates.

draft: false
provider_slug: cloudzy
title: Sunrise Startup Program
meta_title: Sunrise Startup Program – Cloud Credits & DevOps Support
intro: >-
  Cloudzy's Sunrise startup program empowers early-stage startups with up to
  $8,000 in cloud VPS credits in the first year, a 30% rebate on VPS purchases
  in the second year, 24 hours of free DevOps consulting, and round-the-clock
  customer support.
description: >-
  Sunrise by Cloudzy is designed to help seed and early-stage startups
  accelerate their growth by providing a comprehensive cloud infrastructure
  package. The program offers $8,000 in cloud VPS credits distributed on a
  monthly basis in the first year (approximately $660 per month), a 30% rebate
  on cloud VPS purchases in the second year, 24 hours of free DevOps consulting
  to optimize infrastructure setup and deployment, and free 24/7/365
  business-level customer support. Eligibility criteria include having a company
  website, being founded within the last 5 years, and demonstrating affiliation
  with an accelerator, incubator, or VC firm. Bootstrapped startups may also
  apply with a defined business plan or pitch deck.
status: Active
tags:
  - hosting
  - devops
  - cloud
url: https://cloudzy.com/startup-program
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 8000
max_value: 10000
community_notes:
  - title: Why Startups Love Sunrise
    body: >-
      Startups appreciate Sunrise for offering scalable cloud credits,
      dependable DevOps consulting, and comprehensive support that drives growth
      and operational efficiency.
    source_url: https://cloudzy.com/startup-program
tiers:
  - name: Sunrise Tier
    intro: >-
      Provides a comprehensive package including $8,000 in first-year cloud VPS
      credits, a 30% rebate for second-year VPS purchases, 24 hours of free
      DevOps consulting, and round-the-clock support.
    max_value: 10000
    url: https://cloudzy.com/startup-program
    benefits:
      - $8,000 One-Year Cloud VPS Credit
      - 30% Rebate on Cloud VPS Purchases in the Second Year
      - 24 Hours of Free DevOps Consulting
      - Free 24/7/365 Business Level Customer Support
      - Save up to 20% on every Cloud VPS plan starting at $3.96
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "Year 1: $8,000 credit & consulting"
      - "Year 2: 30% rebate on VPS purchases"
    eligibility:
      - Must have a company website and a domain-associated email
      - Founded within the last 5 years
      - Verification of affiliation with an accelerator, incubator, or VC firm
      - Bootstrapped startups should have a defined business plan or pitch deck
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply to Sunrise
        description: >-
          Visit Cloudzy's startup program page and complete the application
          form.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://cloudzy.com/startup-program/apply
      - name: Application Review
        description: Cloudzy reviews the submitted application to verify eligibility.
      - name: Results Notification
        description: >-
          Selected startups receive notification and details of their credit
          allocation.
      - name: Issue Credits
        description: Approved applicants begin receiving monthly cloud VPS credits.
faq:
  - question: What is The SUNRISE (Cloudzy startup program), and who is it designed for?
    answer: >-
      It is designed to support seed and early-stage startups by providing cloud
      VPS credits, expert DevOps consulting, and comprehensive support, enabling
      them to succeed in their cloud journey.
  - question: What do I get with the $8,000 cloud VPS credit in the first year?
    answer: >-
      Startups receive up to $8,000 in credit distributed monthly (approximately
      $660 per month), which can be used to create and manage Cloud VPS
      instances.
  - question: How does the 30% rebate for Cloud VPS purchases in the second year work?
    answer: >-
      In the second year, eligible startups receive a 30% rebate on the total
      amount spent on cloud VPS, helping lower ongoing operational costs.
  - question: What is included in the 24 Hours Free DevOps Consulting Services?
    answer: >-
      It includes expert guidance on infrastructure setup, migration, CI/CD
      deployment, automation, monitoring, and best practices to ensure an
      efficient and secure cloud environment.
  - question: How can I apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Applicants can visit Cloudzy's startup program page, complete the
      application form, and await further review and notification regarding
      their eligibility and credit allocation.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/cockroachdb/cockroachdb-cloud-free-trial.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: cockroachdb
title: CockroachDB Cloud Free Trial
meta_title: CockroachDB Cloud Free Trial Credits
intro: >-
  New organizations receive $400 in free credits to trial CockroachDB Cloud,
  available across all cluster plans.
description: >-
  CockroachDB Cloud offers a $400 free trial credit for new organizations to
  explore its fully managed, distributed SQL database service. The credits are
  automatically applied to the first $400 of costs for any cluster, whether
  using Standard, Advanced, or Basic plans. Users receive email notifications
  about usage milestones, and a 30-day grace period is provided after the trial
  ends to prevent data loss. A payment method must be added before the trial
  concludes to ensure continuous service. Tools are available for cost
  estimation and transitioning to monthly billing.
status: Active
tags:
  - free trial
  - cloud
  - database
url: https://www.cockroachlabs.com/product/cockroachdb-cloud/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 400
max_value: 400
community_notes:
  - title: Free Trial Documentation
    body: >-
      Detailed documentation outlines the free trial credit usage, notification
      schedule, and grace period guidelines for CockroachDB Cloud.
    source_url: https://www.cockroachlabs.com/docs/cockroachcloud/free-trial
tiers:
  - name: Free Trial
    intro: >-
      Receive $400 in free credits for new organization accounts to explore
      CockroachDB Cloud across all cluster plans.
    max_value: 400
    url: https://www.cockroachlabs.com/product/cockroachdb-cloud/
    benefits:
      - $400 free credits applied to any cluster
      - Applicable to Standard, Advanced, and Basic plans
      - >-
        Automatic email notifications for credit consumption and trial
        milestones
      - 30-day grace period with throttled performance post-trial
      - Cost estimation tools available
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Until $400 credits are consumed
      - 30-day grace period
    eligibility:
      - Only first organization per user
      - Not applicable to invited users
      - Invoice-billed organizations are ineligible
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: >-
          Register for a CockroachDB Cloud account to automatically receive the
          free trial credits.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://www.cockroachlabs.com/product/cockroachdb-cloud/
faq:
  - question: How long do the free trial credits last?
    answer: >-
      The duration depends on cluster size; larger clusters may consume the $400
      credits in about 10 days, while smaller clusters can last up to 30 days.
  - question: Can invited users receive free trial credits?
    answer: >-
      Only the first organization created by a user qualifies for the free
      trial; invited users share the existing organization's credits.
  - question: What happens after the free trial ends?
    answer: >-
      Once the free credits are used up or expire, monthly billing begins
      immediately, and a 30-day grace period is provided to add a payment method
      before clusters are deleted.

================

  - title: Testimonial from Kerry Wang
    body: >-
      Coda scales with our team and reinforces the culture we want by delivering
      reliable performance that grows with us.
    source_url: https://coda.io
tiers:
  - name: 6-month Free Team Plan
    intro: >-
      Provides startups with a free Team plan for 6 months, normally priced at
      $36/user/month, featuring unlimited AI capabilities and premium features
      to streamline operations.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://coda.io/startups
    benefits:
      - 6-month free access to the Team plan
      - Unlimited AI capabilities
      - Access to over 50,000 pre-built templates
      - Integration with various tools via Packs and Zapier
      - All-in-one customizable workspace
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Startups less than 5 years old
      - Less than $10M in funding
      - Business domain email required
      - A live website must be maintained
      - No prior Coda subscriptions in the last 30 days
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: >-
          Register using a partner-specific link to initiate the application
          process.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://coda.io/startups
      - name: Complete Application
        description: Fill out the form with company details and eligibility proof.
        action: Submit
        action_url: https://coda.io/startups
      - name: Activation
        description: >-
          Wait up to 14 days for the free plan benefits to be activated on your
          dashboard.
        action: Wait
        action_url: https://coda.io/startups
faq:
  - question: What is the Coda Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      It offers startups a 6-month free Team plan with unlimited AI
      capabilities, premium templates, and robust integrations to streamline
      operations.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Startups less than 5 years old, with less than $10M in funding, using a
      business domain email, maintaining a live website, and with no recent Coda
      subscriptions are eligible.
  - question: How long does the activation process take?
    answer: >-
      The free plan benefits are activated within 14 days after completing the
      application process.

draft: false
provider_slug: complycube
title: ComplyCube Startup Program
meta_title: ComplyCube Startup Program - Verification & Compliance Tools
intro: >-
  ComplyCube's Startup Program offers early-stage and growing businesses free
  KYC API, AML tools, identity verification checks, and other resources to
  streamline customer onboarding and compliance.
description: >-
  The program provides startups with robust identity verification and compliance
  tools, including an initial allocation of 1,000 verification credits valid for
  12 months. Participants can also qualify for up to $50,000 in additional
  credits with VC/accelerator backing, receive expert technical and compliance
  guidance, and benefit from preferential rates on premium services once credits
  expire. It is designed to support companies that are compliant by design, with
  global coverage and enterprise-grade security.
status: Active
tags:
  - compliance
  - kyc
  - cybersecurity
  - api
  - saas
url: https://complycube.com/startup
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 1000
max_value: 50000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Basic Tier
    intro: >-
      For early-stage startups, offering an initial 1,000 verification credits
      valid for 12 months along with core AML/KYC tools and basic technical
      support.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://complycube.com/startup
    benefits:
      - 1,000 free verification credits valid for 12 months
      - Access to ComplyCube's award-winning verification platform
      - Expert technical advice on AML/KYC implementation
      - Global coverage in over 220 countries
      - Standard integration support
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Incorporated within the last 3 years
      - Total funding ≤ $5M
      - Publicly available company website
      - Committed to a FATF-aligned AML/KYC framework
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Fill out the application form on ComplyCube's website.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://complycube.com/startup
  - name: Enhanced Tier
    intro: >-
      For startups with VC/accelerator backing and strong ID verification
      capabilities, offering up to $50,000 in additional credits and premium
      support.
    max_value: 50000
    url: https://complycube.com/startup
    benefits:
      - Up to $50,000 in additional verification credits
      - Exclusive preview access to unreleased features
      - Complimentary AML/KYC training and consultancy
      - Priority technical support with dedicated account management
      - 30% discount on Premium Plan services post credits
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - VC/accelerator backing required
      - Demonstrated ID verification implementation
      - Meets standard eligibility criteria
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Enhanced Application
        description: >-
          Provide proof of funding and demonstrate your ID verification
          capabilities via the application form.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://complycube.com/startup
faq:
  - question: What are the eligibility requirements?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be incorporated within the last 3 years, have raised no more
      than $5M in total funding, operate a public company website, and be
      committed to a FATF-aligned, risk-based AML/KYC framework. Exclusions
      include educational institutions, government bodies, non-profits,
      consultancies, agencies, and crypto-mining companies.
  - question: What does the ComplyCube Startup Program offer?
    answer: >-
      The program provides free access to ComplyCube’s verification platform
      with an initial allocation of 1,000 credits, opportunities for up to
      $50,000 in additional credits, comprehensive AML/KYC training, expert
      technical guidance, and preferential rates on premium services once
      credits are exhausted.
  - question: How long are the initial credits valid?
    answer: The initial 1,000 credits are valid for 12 months from issuance.
  - question: How do I apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Submit the online application form on ComplyCube's website with your
      company details and compliance commitments to get started.
  - question: Who can I contact for more information?
    answer: For any additional questions, please email startups@complycube.com.

provider_slug: customerio
title: Customer.io Startup Program
meta_title: Customer.io Startup Program - Marketing Automation for Startups
intro: >-
  Get up to 12 months of access to Customer.io’s powerful customer engagement
  platform, designed to scale startup marketing efforts with essential
  automation and communication tools.
description: >-
  Customer.io's Startup Program empowers early-stage startups with subsidized
  access to a sophisticated customer engagement platform. The program offers two
  tailored plans – Startup Basic and Startup +Plus – providing options for free
  access or subsidized pricing at $100/month. Eligible startups must have raised
  less than $10M, use organically acquired contacts, and be new to Customer.io's
  paid services. Key features include multi-channel messaging (email, SMS, push
  notifications), behavioral tracking, segmentation, A/B testing, API access,
  and integrations. Additionally, startups benefit from a robust partner network
  offering extended credits, cross-platform discounts, and priority reviews,
  with partners like Y Combinator, Techstars, Mercury Banking, and AWS Activate.
  After the 12-month period, startups transition to paid plans.

draft: false
provider_slug: datastax
title: "DataStax Astra DB: $300 Free Trial"
meta_title: DataStax Astra DB - Cloud Native Generative AI Database
intro: >-
  A cloud-native vector database for building production-ready generative AI
  applications. It delivers high relevance vector search, fast responses, and a
  free tier offering $300/year in credits along with 40GB storage.
description: >-
  DataStax Astra DB is a cloud-native vector database designed to power
  generative AI applications. It combines real-time data processing with native
  vector search capabilities and seamless integration with Apache Cassandra. Key
  benefits include generative AI optimization with up to 20% higher relevance
  and 74x faster responses compared to competitors, an intuitive schema-less API
  that supports complex document filtering and hybrid searches, and native
  integrations with LangChain, LlamaIndex, Amazon Bedrock, and Google Vertex AI.
  With a free tier offering $300/year in credits and 40GB storage, it caters to
  startups and developers, while scalable Pay As You Go and Enterprise plans
  address production and large-scale deployment needs.
status: Active
tags:
  - ai
  - database
  - cloud
  - serverless
  - enterprise
url: https://www.datastax.com/products/astra
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 300
community_notes:
  - title: GigaOm Report
    body: >-
      Dec 2023 GigaOm Report found that Astra DB provides up to 20% higher
      relevance and 74x faster responses compared to Pinecone.
    source_url: https://www.gigaom.com/
  - title: Cost Efficiency
    body: >-
      Astra DB's serverless architecture can reduce operational costs by up to
      5× compared to traditional databases.
    source_url: https://www.datastax.com/products/astra
tiers:
  - name: Free
    intro: >-
      40 GB storage, $300/year credits, and basic support for startups and
      developers testing AI prototypes.
    max_value: 300
    url: https://www.datastax.com/products/astra
    benefits:
      - 40 GB storage
      - $300/year in credits
      - Basic support
      - No credit card required
      - Intuitive API access
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Startups
      - Developers testing AI prototypes
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: Register for a free account on DataStax Astra DB.
        action: Get Started
        action_url: https://www.datastax.com/products/astra
faq:
  - question: How does Astra DB improve RAG performance?
    answer: >-
      It uses hybrid search with server-side reranking via NVIDIA NeMo Retriever
      to reduce hallucinations by 45%.
  - question: Can it handle real-time analytics?
    answer: >-
      Yes, Astra DB integrates with Astra Streaming for fraud detection and IoT
      use cases.
  - question: What languages are supported?
    answer: Astra DB supports Python, Java, Node.js, REST, and GraphQL APIs.
  - question: Is data transfer between regions chargeable?
    answer: Yes, cross-region replication incurs metered egress fees.
  - question: How does pricing compare to Pinecone?
    answer: >-
      DataStax claims Astra DB delivers 74× faster responses and 20% higher
      relevance at a lower total cost of ownership.

provider_slug: deepgram
title: Deepgram $200 Free Credits
meta_title: Get Deepgram API $200 Free Credits
intro: >-

  free $200 credit and flexible plans to suit individual developers, growing
  businesses, and enterprises. Eligible startups can earn up to $100k in credits
  with 12-month validity.
description: >-
  Deepgram's pricing offers a range of plans including a Pay As You Go option
  with $200 free credit, a Growth Plan with prepaid credits at a discounted
  rate, and an Enterprise Plan with custom pricing and premium features such as
  custom-trained models and dedicated support. Additionally, their Startup
  Program allows eligible startups to access up to $100k in credits, ensuring
  cost efficiency and scalability across different user needs.
status: Active
tags:
  - api
  - speech
  - ai
  - free trial
  - enterprise

value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 200
max_value: 200
community_notes:
  - title: Transparent Billing
    body: >-
      Deepgram charges per second of audio processed, ensuring users pay only
      for actual usage with no expiration on credits.
    source_url: https://www.deepgram.com/pricing/
  - title: Competitive Rates
    body: >-
      Offering models like Nova-2 at $0.0043/min and discounted rates in the
      Growth Plan, Deepgram provides cost-effective solutions compared to
      competitors.
    source_url: https://www.deepgram.com/pricing/
  - title: Startup Program
    body: >-
      Eligible startups can receive up to $100k in credits with a 12-month
      validity upon maintaining monthly active usage.
    source_url: https://www.deepgram.com/pricing/
tiers:
  - name: $200 Free Credits
    intro: >-
      Starts with $200 free credit and then moves to pay-as-you-go billing. No
      minimums, expiration, or credit card required, with per-minute rates based
      on model selection.
    max_value: 200
    url: https://www.deepgram.com/pricing/
    benefits:
      - $200 free credit for immediate use
      - Flexible pay-as-you-go billing after free credits
      - >-
        Multiple pricing models: Nova-2 at $0.0043/min, Whisper Cloud at
        $0.0048/min, and Enhanced model at $0.0145/min
      - No expiration on credits
      - Supports up to 100 concurrent speech-to-text requests and 36+ languages
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - No expiration
    eligibility:
      - Open to all users
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Account
        description: >-
          Register for a Deepgram account to access the free $200 credit without
          a credit card.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://www.deepgram.com/pricing/
faq:
  - question: What is included in the Deepgram Pay As You Go Plan?
    answer: >-
      It offers a free $200 credit with pay-as-you-go billing thereafter. Rates
      vary by model, and users benefit from flexible, no-expiration credits
      without needing a credit card.
  - question: How does the Growth Plan differ from the Pay As You Go Plan?
    answer: >-
      The Growth Plan requires an annual commitment with prepaid credits,
      providing up to a 20% discount on standard rates along with higher usage
      limits compared to the Pay As You Go Plan.
  - question: Who is eligible for the Enterprise Plan?
    answer: >-
      The Enterprise Plan is designed for large organizations and high-volume
      users that require custom pricing, premium support, and advanced
      deployment options.
  - question: What are the benefits of the Deepgram Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups can receive up to $100k in credits with a 12-month
      validity, provided they maintain monthly active usage, allowing them to
      scale efficiently.

      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Must create a free Deepgram account
      - Talented AI builder or early-stage startup (<$10M raised)
      - In production or planning to launch within 6 months
      - Committed to active community engagement
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Deepgram Account
        description: Sign up for a free Deepgram account.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://deepgram.com/signup
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Complete the application form to join the program and receive your
          credits upon approval.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://deepgram.com/startup-program
faq:
  - question: What if I’m an existing Deepgram customer?
    answer: >-
      Applications from existing customers are evaluated on a case-by-case
      basis.
  - question: Can I add others to my project?
    answer: Yes, you can invite other users to collaborate on your project via email.
  - question: Do startup credits expire?
    answer: >-
      Credits require monthly transcription usage to remain active within the
      program.
  - question: Are there requirements to apply?
    answer: >-
      Applicants must create a free Deepgram account, be an early-stage startup
      or talented AI builder (<$10M raised), be in production or launching
      within 6 months, and commit to active community engagement.
  - question: What happens after I apply?
    answer: >-
      The community team will review applications and typically respond within
      one week.
  - question: How long until I receive my credits?
    answer: After acceptance, credits are credited to your account within 24-48 hours.

================

draft: false
provider_slug: devrev
title: DevRev for Startups Program
meta_title: DevRev for Startups - AI-Powered Platform for Early-Stage Companies
intro: >-
  DevRev for Startups provides 12 months of free Pro-tier access with up to $10K
  in credits for early-stage startups, along with follow-on discounts and
  enablement support. The program leverages an AI-native platform to enhance
  customer support, product development, and team collaboration.
description: >-
  DevRev’s Startup Program offers 12 months of free Pro-level access and up to
  $10,000 in credits for AI-powered tools, custom integrations, and advanced
  analytics. In addition, startups enjoy 50% off on follow-on commitments after
  credit expiry, and receive technical and business enablement through expert
  support, training modules, and learning guides. The program is designed for
  early-stage startups backed by accelerators or seed/Series A funding and aims
  to accelerate their AI-first journey by integrating cloud-based workflows and
  comprehensive ecosystem access.
status: Active
tags:
  - ai
  - agents
  - customer support
  - crm
  - workflow

value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 10000
community_notes:

      tailored support that stands out from other tools.
    source_url: https://devrev.ai/startups
  - title: Alok Mishra, Goodmeetings
    body: >-
      DevRev streamlines the tracking of customer tickets by integrating diverse
      tools like Jira and Zendesk into one cohesive platform.
    source_url: https://devrev.ai/startups
  - title: Dhruv Agrawal, COO & Co-founder, Shipsy
    body: >-
      DevRev ensures that all team members have clear visibility into customer
      feedback, eliminating silos and promoting collaboration.
    source_url: https://devrev.ai/startups
tiers:
  - name: Early Stage
    intro: >-
      Exclusive offer for early-stage startups providing 12 months free Pro-tier
      access with up to $10K in credits, plus follow-on discounts.
    max_value: 10000
    url: https://devrev.ai/startups/apply
    benefits:
      - 12 months free Pro-tier access
      - Up to $10K in credits for AI-powered tools and analytics
      - 50% off on follow-on commitments after credit expiry
      - Custom integrations tailored to startup needs
      - Access to technical experts, training modules, and learning guides
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Funded startups up to Series A or incubator/accelerator backed
      - Affiliation with DevRev’s VC ecosystem partners
      - Must be a new customer of DevRev
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the form on the DevRev startups portal to apply for the
          program.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://devrev.ai/startups/apply
faq:
  - question: How do credits work?
    answer: >-
      Credits cover Pro-tier usage for AI-powered tools (valued at $24.99 per
      user/month) and scale with your team's usage and integrations.
  - question: What happens after 12 months?
    answer: >-
      Once the 12-month credit period ends, startups transition to paying 50% of
      the standard rates for follow-on commitments without any tenure
      restrictions.
  - question: How to apply?
    answer: >-
      Applications can be submitted via the DevRev startups portal at
      https://devrev.ai/startups/apply, where startups can also schedule a demo
      with a specialist.
  - question: Are bootstrapped startups eligible?
    answer: >-
      The program is exclusively available to funded or accelerator-backed
      startups up to Series A and does not cater to bootstrapped companies.
  - question: What is the timeline for approval?
    answer: >-
      While a specific timeline is not provided, applicants can contact
      startups@devrev.ai for further updates on the review process.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/digitalocean/digitalocean-200.yaml
================
provider_slug: "digitalocean"
title: "DigitalOcean $200 Free Trial"
intro: "Start your free trial with a $200 credit for 60 days. A valid credit card is required, but you won’t be charged unless you exceed the free credit or continue after the trial."
description: "DigitalOcean’s trial offers new users $200 in credits, usable within 60 days, to explore and deploy various services including Droplets (virtual machines), Kubernetes clusters, managed databases, load balancers, storage solutions, and more. Users gain access to 3,000 tutorials, an active developer community forum, and 24/7 technical support."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "cloud"
  - "free trial"
url: "https://www.digitalocean.com"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 200

tiers:
  - name: "Free Trial"
    intro: "Try DigitalOcean with $200 credits for 60 days."
    max_value: 200
    url: "https://www.digitalocean.com"
    benefits:
      - "$200 credit for new customers"
      - "Round-the-clock technical support"
      - "Access to 3,000 developer tutorials"
      - "Container-based Kubernetes deployments"
      - "Simple monthly pricing with predictable costs"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - "60 days"
    eligibility:
      - "New customers only"
      - "Valid credit card required"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create DigitalOcean account"
        description: "Enter your email address and password, or sign up via Google/GitHub."
        action: "Sign up"
        action_url: "https://cloud.digitalocean.com/registrations/new"
      - name: "Add a valid credit card"
        description: "Required for identity verification. You won't be charged unless your usage exceeds $200 or continues after 60 days."
        action: "Verify payment method"
        action_url: "https://cloud.digitalocean.com/account/billing"

faq:
  - question: "How do I sign up for the free trial?"
    answer: "Sign up at DigitalOcean’s website using your email address. A valid credit card is required for identity verification, but you won’t be charged during the trial unless you exceed $200 in usage."
  - question: "Who is eligible for the free trial?"
    answer: "New customers who have never paid for DigitalOcean services and have not previously used the free trial are eligible."
  - question: "What can I use the free trial for?"
    answer: "Any DigitalOcean infrastructure services, including Droplets, Spaces object storage, Load Balancers, and Managed Databases."
  - question: "What are the terms of service for the free trial?"
    answer: "You must adhere to the DigitalOcean Terms of Service, which you agree to upon sign-up. Usage beyond $200 or after 60 days is charged at standard rates."
  - question: "Are there any limitations with the free trial?"
    answer: "The $200 credit must be used within 60 days. Going over $200 during that period or running services after the trial ends will incur charges."
  - question: "What forms of payment are accepted?"
    answer: "DigitalOcean accepts major credit cards, PayPal, and Google Pay. Additional options like wire transfer and purchase orders are available upon request."

provider_slug: "digitalocean"
title: "DigitalOcean Open Source Credits"
meta_title: "Credits for Projects | Open Source | DigitalOcean"
intro: "DigitalOcean offers grants of credits to open source projects to help with their development, infrastructure, and testing needs."
description: "A sponsorship program providing $60 to $20,000 annually in cloud credits for FOSS projects. Eligible applicants must use an OSI-approved license, demonstrate community engagement, and ideally have a formal Code of Conduct. Projects receive direct access to the DigitalOcean Open Source team, co-marketing opportunities, and more."
status: "Active"
url: "https://www.digitalocean.com/open-source/credits-for-projects"
tags:
  - "cloud"
  - "open source"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 60
max_value: 20000

      - "1 year"

      - "100+ stars on GitHub"

  - name: "Production"
    intro: "Tier for projects with 10,000+ GitHub stars"
    max_value: 20000
    url: "https://www.digitalocean.com/open-source/credits-for-projects"

      - "Up to $20,000/year in DigitalOcean credit"

faq:
  - question: "What are DigitalOcean Credits for Open Source?"
    answer: "DigitalOcean offers grants of credits to open source projects to help with their development, infrastructure, and testing needs."
  - question: "Why does DigitalOcean offer open source credits?"
    answer: "We want to give back to the open source ecosystem we participate in and depend on."
  - question: "What are the grants for and how long do they last?"
    answer: "Grants are for credit toward DigitalOcean services such as VMs, storage, databases, App Platform, etc. Each grant is based on the project’s needs, lasts one year, and can be renewed by reapplying."
  - question: "What open source projects are eligible to apply?"
    answer: "Any project with an OSI-approved license that meets the star criteria and demonstrates community engagement can apply."
  - question: "What if my project doesn't have an OSI-approved license?"
    answer: "You may not be ready for sponsorship. Explore available OSI-approved licenses to ensure your project qualifies."
  - question: "What if my project doesn't have a Code of Conduct?"
    answer: "We still consider projects without one, but highly encourage adopting a Code of Conduct to foster a healthy, inclusive community."
  - question: "How do I apply?"
    answer: "Fill out and submit the online application form. We typically review and notify applicants within 7-10 business days."
  - question: "When will I be notified of the decision on my application?"
    answer: "We strive to notify all applicants of our decision within 7-10 business days."
  - question: "Will I be notified when it's time to renew?"
    answer: "Yes. You will receive reminder emails starting 65 days before your current credit grant expires."
  - question: "Am I guaranteed renewal if I've received support in the past?"
    answer: "No. Each renewal is reviewed on a case-by-case basis; you must reapply to continue receiving credits."

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/digitalocean/hatch.yaml
================
provider_slug: "digitalocean"
title: "Hatch Startup Program"
meta_title: "Hatch | DigitalOcean for Startups"
intro: "Ready to build the future? Hatch from DigitalOcean provides a rock-solid cloud foundation for early-stage startups, including up to $100,000 in compute credits, free GPU usage, expert guidance, and more."
description: "DigitalOcean's Hatch program offers qualified startups up to $100,000 in compute credits, up to 3 months of free GPU usage, complimentary premium support, and access to DigitalOcean's marketplace of more than 600,000 customers. Hatch helps startups create, launch, and scale on DigitalOcean's cloud."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "cloud"
  - "gpu"
  - "ai"
url: "https://www.digitalocean.com/hatch"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 100000

tiers:
  - name: "Hatch Program"
    intro: "Exclusive benefits package to help startups experiment, develop, and scale for less"
    max_value: 100000
    url: "https://www.digitalocean.com/hatch"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $100,000 in compute credits"
      - "Up to 3 months of free GPU usage"
      - "Complimentary premium support"
      - "Access to DigitalOcean's marketplace of 600,000+ customers"
      - "Co-marketing support and partner opportunities at DigitalOcean events"
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - "12 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Affiliation with an approved accelerator, incubator, or VC"
      - "Raised Series A or earlier"
      - "No prior DigitalOcean promotional credits"
      - "Business website and matching domain email"
      - "Valid credit card on DO team account"
    effort:
      - "Short application form"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create DigitalOcean Team Account"
        description: "Must use a company domain email and a valid credit card"
        action: "Sign up"
        action_url: "https://cloud.digitalocean.com/registrations/new"
      - name: "Submit Hatch Application"
        description: "Complete the online application (affiliation details, team info)"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://www.digitalocean.com/hatch"

faq:
  - question: "What is Hatch?"
    answer: "Hatch helps developers create, launch, and scale their startups on DigitalOcean by providing up to $100,000 in compute credits, up to 3 months of free GPU usage, premium support, and access to DigitalOcean's marketplace and community."
  - question: "Why is DigitalOcean doing this?"
    answer: "They aim to empower the startup community by making cloud resources more accessible and cost-effective, with a special focus on helping teams working on next-generation AI and ML projects."
  - question: "Who is eligible for DigitalOcean Hatch, and how are participants selected?"
    answer: "Startups must be pre-Series B, have no prior DO credits, and be affiliated with an approved accelerator/incubator/VC. DigitalOcean prioritizes AI, ML, streaming, gaming, fintech, devtools, etc."
  - question: "How do I know if my accelerator or VC firm is a partner?"
    answer: "Check the partner list on the Hatch site or ask your program manager if they have a formal partnership with Hatch."
  - question: "My accelerator isn't listed. Can I still apply?"
    answer: "Yes. You can ask your accelerator or incubator to apply to become a Hatch partner."
  - question: "How can I get started if I'm not backed by a formal accelerator or VC?"
    answer: "Submit an application and select 'Other' when prompted for an affiliated partner organization."
  - question: "How many credits do I get?"
    answer: "Qualified startups can receive up to $100,000 in compute credits. The specific amount depends on your qualification and needs."
  - question: "I already used DigitalOcean promotional credits. Can I join Hatch?"
    answer: "No. Hatch is only for new startups without prior DO credit usage."
  - question: "I'm an existing DigitalOcean customer. Am I eligible?"
    answer: "No. Existing customers are not eligible for Hatch."
  - question: "How do the Hatch credits work?"
    answer: "You receive a fixed amount of credits each month for 12 months."
  - question: "Do Hatch credits cover GPU Droplet usage?"
    answer: "Yes. Qualified startups can receive up to 3 months of free GPU usage. Terms apply."
  - question: "Does DigitalOcean help with migrations from other clouds?"
    answer: "Yes. They offer migration assistance and credits to help you move your workloads."
  - question: "How do I receive access to Hatch perks?"
    answer: "Once accepted, you'll get a Welcome Kit containing instructions and partner discount information."
  - question: "What if I go over the monthly credit limit?"
    answer: "Any usage beyond the monthly allotment is billed to your payment method."
  - question: "Do I need a DigitalOcean account to sign up for Hatch?"
    answer: "Yes. You must create a new DO team account with a company-domain email and valid credit card."
  - question: "Can I transfer my Hatch credits?"
    answer: "No. Credits are non-transferable and must be used by your startup's account."
  - question: "Any limitations on using Hatch credits?"
    answer: "They can't be used on H100 GPU products, crypto-mining, or extremely high resource usage. See the Hatch TOS for details."
  - question: "How can I get help with extensions or more questions?"
    answer: "Email hatch@digitalocean.com, and the Hatch team will assist you."

success_stories:
  - image: "https://www.digitalocean.com/api/static-content/v1/images?src=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo-my_cast.8132c4df.svg"
    title: "MyCast"
    summary: "myCast helps fans cast actors for characters in their favorite stories, with community engagement features to comment, suggest, and vote."
    link: "https://www.digitalocean.com/customers/mycast"
  - image: "https://www.digitalocean.com/api/static-content/v1/images?src=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo-breach_bits.f19cd09f.svg"
    title: "BreachBits"
    summary: "BreachBits offers tools to show organizations what attackers see, think, and do, empowering teams to strengthen cybersecurity."
    link: "https://www.digitalocean.com/customers/breachbits"
  - image: "https://www.digitalocean.com/api/static-content/v1/images?src=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo-hack_the_box.5b57461f.svg"
    title: "Hack The Box"
    summary: "Hack The Box provides gamified cybersecurity training with realistic labs, helping IT security pros and hackers advance their skills."
    link: "https://www.digitalocean.com/customers/hack-the-box"

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-grants.yaml

draft: false
provider_slug: elevenlabs
title: ElevenLabs Grants
meta_title: ElevenLabs Grants - Build with Human-Like Voices
intro: >-
  Build human-like voices into your new product or startup with a 3-month grant
  offering Business-tier subscription access. Get 11 million text characters per
  month, high-scale capacity, and early access to innovative features.
description: >-
  The ElevenLabs Grants program provides comprehensive support for early-stage
  companies integrating AI voice technology. Participants receive 3 months free
  access to the Business-tier subscription, which includes 11,000,000 text
  characters per month (totaling 33,000,000 characters) and over 200 hours of
  AI-generated audio monthly. The program offers high-scale infrastructure,
  enterprise-level capacity, and early access to new features such as
  multilingual support and dubbing tools. It is designed for startups with ≤25
  employees in early stages (pre-seed to Series A) and welcomes global
  applicants. After the grant period, startups can migrate to an enterprise plan
  with special pricing, continue with standard paid plans, or cancel without
  penalty.
status: Active
tags:
  - ai
  - speech
  - agents
  - customer support
url: https://www.elevenlabs.io/grants
value_type: discount
max_value: 100
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: ElevenLabs Grants Tier
    intro: >-
      Receive 3 months free access to the Business-tier subscription with 11
      million text characters per month, high-scale capacity, and early access
      to new features.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://www.elevenlabs.io/grants
    benefits:
      - 3 months free Business-tier subscription
      - 11 million text characters per month
      - High-scale infrastructure for testing and launch
      - Early access to new features
      - Enterprise-level support
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 3 months
    eligibility:
      - Startups with ≤25 employees
      - Early-stage companies (pre-seed to Series A)
      - Projects integrating human-like AI voices
      - Global applicants accepted
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the online form with details about your product, team, and
          growth expectations.
        action: Apply now
        action_url: https://www.elevenlabs.io/grants
      - name: Notification of Acceptance
        description: Receive notification within one week if your application is approved.
      - name: Start Building
        description: >-
          Once approved, the grant credits are applied to your account to begin
          integrating ElevenLabs voice technology.
faq:
  - question: What are the eligibility requirements for grants?
    answer: >-
      Applicants must be startups with ≤25 employees, in early stages (pre-seed
      to Series A), and integrating human-like AI voices into their core product
      features.
  - question: What are ElevenLabs Grants?
    answer: >-
      They are non-cash credits offering 3 months free access to ElevenLabs'
      Business-tier subscription for building, testing, and launching
      voice-enabled products.
  - question: What are the specific requirements to qualify for the grants?
    answer: >-
      Startups must focus on integrating human-like AI voices, have a small team
      (≤25 employees), and be in an early stage of development. There are no
      geographic restrictions.
  - question: Is there any specific deadline to apply?
    answer: No, applications are accepted on a rolling basis with no fixed deadline.
  - question: What happens after the three month duration of my grant?
    answer: >-
      After 3 months, participants may transition to an enterprise plan with
      special pricing, continue with standard paid plans, or cancel without
      penalty.
  - question: How do I apply for the grants?
    answer: >-
      Submit an online application providing product details, team information,
      and growth expectations.
  - question: What happens if I get a grant?
    answer: >-
      If accepted, the grant credits are applied to your account and you receive
      technical onboarding support to integrate the service.
  - question: Can I organize a call to discuss my product or project?
    answer: >-
      Yes, you can request a call to discuss your product or project through
      ElevenLabs' support channels.
  - question: Do you sign NDAs before an application is submitted?
    answer: >-
      Typically, NDAs are not signed prior to the application submission
      process.
  - question: What happens if I need more text characters?
    answer: >-
      Additional usage beyond the grant allotment is available through standard
      paid plans or by transitioning to an enterprise plan.
  - question: >-
      Can I upgrade to another plan if I use more content than the grant
      includes?
    answer: >-
      Yes, startups have the option to upgrade to another plan after the grant
      period ends.
  - question: Why do you offer text character grants instead of cash grants?
    answer: >-
      The program is designed to provide direct access to ElevenLabs' platform,
      ensuring startups experience and integrate the technology firsthand.
  - question: Can I exchange or resell my text characters for cash?
    answer: >-
      No, the text character credits are non-transferable and cannot be
      exchanged or resold.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/formaloo/formaloo-for-startups.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: formaloo
title: Formaloo for Startups
meta_title: Empowering Early-Stage Startups with Formaloo Credits
intro: >-
  Formaloo offers $1,000 in platform credits to early-stage startups, enabling
  them to access advanced no-code features and premium tools for growth.
description: >-
  Formaloo's startup program provides eligible early-stage companies with a
  $1,000 credit to use towards its Pro or Team plans. The program unlocks
  premium features including advanced integrations (with Google Sheets, Zapier,
  and Slack), customizable templates for forms, CRMs, quizzes, and client
  portals, real-time analytics, collaborative workspaces, and access to
  relational databases and AI-powered tools. It is designed for startups that
  have raised no more than $5 million, launched less than 5 years ago, are
  independently owned with fewer than 50 employees, and are new to Formaloo’s
  Free plan. Startups can also benefit from priority approval if they work with
  Formaloo’s global partners.
status: Active
tags:
  - no-code
  - forms
  - workflow
  - docs
  - e-signature
url: https://formaloo.formaloo.me/startups-apply
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 1000
max_value: 1000
community_notes:
  - title: Official Startup Program Page
    body: >-
      Learn more about Formaloo's startup program, its eligibility requirements,
      and the application process by visiting the official page.
    source_url: https://formaloo.formaloo.me/startups-apply
tiers:
  - name: Formaloo for Startups
    intro: >-
      Provides eligible early-stage startups with a $1,000 platform credit along
      with access to premium no-code features.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://formaloo.formaloo.me/startups-apply
    benefits:
      - $1,000 platform credit
      - Advanced integrations with Google Sheets, Zapier, and Slack
      - Customizable templates for forms, CRMs, quizzes, and client portals
      - Real-time analytics and collaborative workspaces
      - Access to relational databases and AI-powered tools
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - One-time credit
    eligibility:
      - Raised no more than $5 million in total funding
      - Launched less than 5 years ago
      - Independently owned and operated
      - Fewer than 50 employees
      - New to Formaloo’s Free plan
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up for Free Plan
        description: Register on Formaloo’s Free plan to qualify for the startup program.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://formaloo.com
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Apply via Formaloo’s startup portal to receive the $1,000 credit.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://formaloo.formaloo.me/startups-apply
faq:
  - question: What are the eligibility requirements for Formaloo for Startups?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups must have raised no more than $5 million, launched less
      than 5 years ago, be independently owned with fewer than 50 employees, and
      be new to Formaloo’s Free plan.
  - question: How do startups apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups can sign up for Formaloo’s Free plan and then submit an
      application through the startup portal. Partner affiliation may also
      provide priority approval.

================

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/front/front-for-startups-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: front
title: Front for Startups Program
meta_title: Front for Startups - Free Access to the Growth Plan
intro: >-
  Qualifying startups receive 6 months of free access to Front's Growth plan for
  up to 15 users, along with an AI add-on offering up to 1,000 automated
  resolutions per month, delivering a combined value of up to $7,200.
description: >-
  The Front for Startups Program is designed to help early-stage companies scale
  their customer support operations without upfront costs. Through this program,
  new Front customers—who have fewer than 50 employees and have raised up to
  $10M in external funding—gain complimentary access to the Growth plan, which
  consolidates various communication channels (email, social media, SMS, voice)
  into a centralized platform. The program also provides AI-powered automation
  to streamline workflows and enhance response efficiency. After the 6-month
  free period, startups are prompted to upgrade to a paid plan to maintain
  service continuity.
status: Active
tags:
  - customer support
  - collaboration
  - productivity
  - email
url: https://front.com/startups
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 7200
community_notes:
  - title: New Customer Exclusive
    body: >-
      This offer is available exclusively for new Front customers who have not
      used the platform before.
    source_url: https://front.com/startups
  - title: Partnership Inquiries
    body: >-
      Startups whose Accelerator or VC is not listed should contact Front for
      potential partner inclusion.
    source_url: mailto:partners@front.com
tiers:
  - name: Front for Startups
    intro: >-
      Qualifying startups get free access to Front's Growth plan for 6 months,
      including up to 15 user licenses and an AI add-on with up to 1,000
      automated resolutions per month.
    max_value: 7200
    url: https://front.com/startups
    benefits:
      - Free access to the Growth plan (valued at up to $7,200)
      - Access to Front’s AI add-on for up to 1,000 resolutions per month
      - Centralized communication across email, social media, SMS, and voice
      - Enhanced efficiency with no-code automation workflows
      - Customer insights for improved support operations
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - New Front customers only
      - Less than 50 employees
      - Raised external funding up to $10M (Angel, Pre-Seed, Seed, or Series A)
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Review Eligibility
        description: >-
          Ensure that the startup is a new Front customer with fewer than 50
          employees and has raised up to $10M in external funding. Verify
          eligibility using documentation such as a Crunchbase profile or
          accelerator credentials.
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Complete the application by providing company details including work
          email, company size, industry, and funding received.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://front.com/startups
faq:
  - question: What does the Front for Startups Program cover?
    answer: >-
      It offers free access to Front's Growth plan for 6 months and an AI add-on
      with up to 1,000 resolutions per month, valued at up to $7,200.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Eligibility is limited to new Front customers with fewer than 50 employees
      who have raised up to $10M in external funding (Angel, Pre-Seed, Seed, or
      Series A).
  - question: How is eligibility verified?
    answer: >-
      Applicants must provide proof of funding through public profiles like
      Crunchbase or accelerator documentation.
  - question: What happens after the 6-month free period?
    answer: >-
      Startups will be prompted to upgrade to a paid Front plan to continue
      accessing the platform’s features.
  - question: What if my Accelerator/VC isn’t listed?
    answer: >-
      They should contact Front to inquire about potential partner program
      inclusion.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/ganttpro/ganttpro-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: ganttpro
title: GanttPRO Startup Program
meta_title: Scale Your Startup with GanttPRO Credits
intro: >-
  The GanttPRO Startup Program offers eligible startups up to $3,000 in credits
  for accessing its Business Plan and advanced project management tools,
  enabling seamless team collaboration and efficient planning.
description: >-
  GanttPRO's Startup Program provides up to $3,000 in credits which can cover 6
  months of the Business Plan subscription (valued at $19.99 per user per month
  for a team of 25). The program helps startups leverage advanced features such
  as workload management, risk and budget control, real-time collaboration, and
  secure cloud storage. Eligibility criteria include being incorporated within 3
  years, having a public website with a unique email domain, employing 30 or
  fewer team members, and having no prior paid subscription or discounts with
  GanttPRO. The application process involves verifying eligibility, submitting
  the startup application form, and receiving credit upon approval.
status: Active
tags:
  - project management
  - collaboration
  - productivity
url: https://www.ganttpro.com/startup-program/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 3000
community_notes:
  - title: Trusted by Leading Companies
    body: >-
      GanttPRO is used by industry leaders such as SONY, Salesforce,
      Booking.com, Vodafone, InVision, NASA, and Amway.
    source_url: https://www.ganttpro.com/
tiers:
  - name: GanttPRO Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Access up to $3,000 in credits for a 6-month subscription to GanttPRO's
      Business Plan, unlocking advanced project management features.
    max_value: 3000
    url: https://www.ganttpro.com/startup-program/
    benefits:
      - Up to 6 months of free access to the Business Plan
      - Advanced collaboration and task management tools
      - Risk management and budget control
      - Secure cloud storage with daily backups
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Incorporated 3 years or less
      - Public website with a unique email domain
      - 30 or fewer employees
      - No prior paid GanttPRO subscription
      - Not undergone recent funding rounds or change of control
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Verify Eligibility
        description: >-
          Confirm that your startup meets all eligibility criteria including
          incorporation date, team size, and website requirements.
        action: Review Criteria
        action_url: https://www.ganttpro.com/startup-program/eligibility
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the startup application form with your company details and
          team information.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.ganttpro.com/startup-program/application
      - name: Receive Credits
        description: >-
          Upon approval, credits will be applied to your account for a 6-month
          subscription.
        action: Get Started
        action_url: https://www.ganttpro.com/startup-program/
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups must be incorporated within the last 3 years, have a
      public website with a unique email domain, employ 30 or fewer team
      members, have raised no more than Series B funding, and have no prior paid
      subscription to GanttPRO.
  - question: What is $3,000 in credits worth?
    answer: >-
      It can cover 6 months of GanttPRO's Business Plan for a team of 25 at
      $19.99 per user per month.
  - question: Can credits be combined with other offers?
    answer: >-
      No, the credits cannot be combined with any other offers, discount codes,
      or shared with third parties.
  - question: How long are the credits valid?
    answer: Credits are valid for 6 months from the date of activation.
