File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/gcp/0-google-for-startups.yaml
================
provider_slug: "gcp"
title: "Google for Startups Cloud Program"
intro: "Accelerate your startup journey with flexible tiers that match your company’s growth stage—providing up to $200,000 USD in Google Cloud credits, technical resources, business support, and more."
description: "This program helps eligible startups build quickly and scale efficiently on Google Cloud. Two primary tiers (Start and Scale) offer incremental credits, technical and business support, Google-wide perks, and training to empower teams as they grow. Acceptance is determined based on specific funding and eligibility criteria."
status: "Active"
url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 200000
tags:
  - "cloud"

tiers:
  - name: "Start Tier"
    intro: "Designed for early-stage startups without equity funding—providing foundational credits and resources."
    max_value: 2000
    url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $2,000 in Google Cloud credits (valid for 1 year)"
      - "$200 Google Cloud Skills Boost credits for training"
      - "Technical support via Customer Care plan (credits can be applied)"
      - "Access to Google Cloud Startup Community"
      - "12 months of free Google Workspace Business Plus (for new signups)"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration: ["1 year"]
    eligibility:
      - "Not yet funded by an institutional investor"
      - "Founded within the last 5 years"
      - "No prior Google Cloud credits beyond the free trial"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Have Billing Account and Business Email"
        description: "Obtain a valid Google Cloud billing account ID and use a domain-based business email"
        action: "Create Billing Account"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com"
      - name: "Check Eligibility"
        description: "Ensure your startup meets the criteria for the Start tier"
        action: "Review Requirements"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup"
      - name: "Complete Application"
        description: "Submit program details about your startup"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup"

  - name: "Scale Tier"
    intro: "For funded startups with equity investments up to (and including) Series A, providing higher credits and deeper support."
    max_value: 200000
    url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $100,000 in credits for Year 1, plus 20% coverage (up to $100,000) for Year 2"
      - "$500 Google Cloud Skills Boost credits"
      - "$12,000 in Enhanced Support credits for 1 year"
      - "Access to Startup Success Manager and co-marketing opportunities"
      - "12 months of free Google Workspace Business Plus (for new signups)"
    benefits_level: 4
    duration: ["2 years"]
    eligibility:
      - "Equity funding from pre-seed to Series A"
      - "Founded within the last 10 years"
      - "No more than $5,000 previously received in Google Cloud credits"
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Verify Funding Stage"
        description: "Prepare documentation of equity funding from pre-seed to Series A"
      - name: "Have Billing Account and Domain Email"
        description: "Obtain a valid Google Cloud billing account ID and domain-based email"
        action: "Register or Log In"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com"
      - name: "Submit Scale Application"
        description: "Include relevant details about your funding and growth plans"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup"

faq:
  - question: "What does the program offer?"
    answer: "Depending on your tier, you can receive up to $200,000 in Google Cloud credits, technical support, training, and access to Google-wide discounts. Both tiers benefit from networking opportunities and business guidance."
  - question: "How do I determine which tier applies to me?"
    answer: "Start Tier is for startups without institutional funding, founded within the last 5 years, while Scale Tier supports equity-funded startups (up to Series A) within the last 10 years. Funding level and prior Google Cloud credits determine eligibility."
  - question: "How long do the credits last?"
    answer: "Start Tier credits are valid for one year. Scale Tier credits are divided across two years, with Year 1 fully covered up to $100,000, and Year 2 at 20% coverage up to an additional $100,000."

Users won’t be charged until they upgrade to a paid account. Over 20 popular GCP services provide free monthly usage tiers, including the option to deploy pre-built solutions (e.g., dynamic websites or load-balanced VMs). Customers who use GCP for business may also be eligible for a few extra credits by verifying their business email in the Billing console."

provider_slug: "gcp"
title: "Google AI Startup Program"
meta_title: "Iterate and Innovate Faster with Google's AI Startup Program"
intro: "Through the Google for Startups Cloud Program, AI startups can access specialized credits and resources to build on Google Cloud’s infrastructure, generative AI products, and foundation models."
description: >
  The Google AI Startup Program offers two distinct tiers—Start and Scale—catering to AI-focused startups from pre-seed through Series A. Qualified participants gain access to significant Google Cloud and Firebase credits, support plans, advanced AI learning resources, architectural guidance, and expert Q&A sessions. To apply, startups must meet specific eligibility requirements around founding date, funding stage, and prior usage of Google Cloud credits. Acceptance is at Google Cloud’s discretion.

status: "Active"
tags: ["cloud", "ai", "ml"]
url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup/ai"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 2000
max_value: 350000

tiers:
  - name: "Start Tier"
    intro: "For pre-seed AI-first startups without institutional funding."
    max_value: 2000
    url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup/ai"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $2,000 USD in Google Cloud credits (valid for one year)"
      - "Apply credits to Customer Care plan for unlimited technical support"
      - "12 months of free Google Workspace Business Plus for new signups"
      - "Access to AI experts via webinars and Q&A sessions"
      - "Free advanced AI learning labs and workshops"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration: ["1 year"]
    eligibility:
      - "Core AI technology for primary product/solution"
      - "No funding from institutional investors or foundations"
      - "Founded within the last 5 years"
      - "Not yet received Google Cloud credits beyond the free trial"
      - "Eligibility at the discretion of Google Cloud"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Obtain Google Cloud Billing ID"
        description: "Sign up for Google Cloud if needed to generate a billing account ID"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/"
      - name: "Set Up Google Workspace"
        description: "Ensure your business email matches your startup’s website domain"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://workspace.google.com/"
      - name: "Complete the AI Startup Application"
        description: "Provide details about your startup’s AI use case and stage"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/startups"
  - name: "Scale Tier"
    intro: "For seed to series A AI-first startups with verified equity funding."
    max_value: 350000
    url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup/ai"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $350,000 USD in Google Cloud & Firebase credits over 2 years"
      - "$12,000 USD in Google Cloud Enhanced Support credits for one year"
      - "12 months of free Google Workspace Business Plus for new signups"
      - "Access to AI experts, including roadmap insights"
      - "Advanced AI labs, architectural guidance, and Trusted Tester early access"
    benefits_level: 4
    duration: ["2 years"]
    eligibility:
      - "Core AI technology for primary product/solution"
      - "Equity funding from seed to Series A (if Series A, raised within last 12 months)"
      - "Founded within the last 10 years"
      - "Not yet received more than $4,000 in Google Cloud credits"
      - "Eligibility at the discretion of Google Cloud"
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Obtain Google Cloud Billing ID"
        description: "Create or confirm your billing account ID under an existing Google Cloud account"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/"
      - name: "Set Up Google Workspace"
        description: "Use a business email from the same domain as your startup’s website"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://workspace.google.com/"
      - name: "Complete the Scale Application"
        description: "Provide funding stage and AI details for Google Cloud’s review"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup/ai"

faq: []

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/gcp/google-cloud-gen-ai-fast-start-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: gcp
title: Google Cloud Gen AI $1000 Fast-Start Program
meta_title: Accelerate Generative AI Adoption with Google Cloud
intro: >-
  Google Cloud's Gen AI fast-start program offers a streamlined path for
  enterprises to harness generative AI through $1,000 trial credits, customized
  workshops, and 1:1 technical support, regardless of their current AI adoption
  stage.
description: >-
  Designed for enterprises exploring generative AI, this program provides $1,000
  trial credits for Vertex AI Agent Builder usage along with personalized
  workshops and technical consultations. Participants benefit from expert
  guidance on use-case prioritization, architecture design, and deployment
  planning. The initiative is part of Google Cloud’s broader AI investments and
  complements other offers like cloud credits for startups and certification
  discounts. Additionally, there is an exclusive early bird offer providing 50%
  off on an annual subscription with comprehensive features, 24/7 customer
  support, regular updates, and community access – valid until December 31,
  2023.
status: Active
tags:
  - ai
  - llm
url: https://cloud.google.com/gen-ai-faststart
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 1000
max_value: 1000
community_notes:
  - title: Early Bird Discount Offer
    body: >-
      In addition to the Gen AI benefits, there is an exclusive early bird offer
      providing a 50% discount on an annual subscription. This offer includes
      premium features, 24/7 customer support, regular updates, and community
      access. To redeem, visit the provider's website and apply the promo code
      EARLYBIRD50 before December 31, 2023.
    source_url: https://www.example.com/earlybird
tiers:
  - name: Gen AI Fast-Start Tier
    intro: >-
      Receive $1,000 trial credits for Vertex AI Agent Builder usage along with
      personalized workshops and 1:1 consultations.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://cloud.google.com/gen-ai-faststart
    benefits:
      - $1,000 trial credits for Vertex AI Agent Builder usage
      - Customized workshops with Google Cloud AI experts
      - 1:1 technical support and consultations
      - Access to training resources for AI implementation
      - Guidance on use-case prioritization and deployment planning
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - According to activation guidelines
    eligibility:
      - Enterprises exploring generative AI adoption
      - Companies identifying first-use AI cases
      - Organizations scaling existing AI implementations
      - Teams requiring technical validation for AI projects
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Contact Form
        description: >-
          Complete the contact form on Google Cloud's Gen AI page to express
          interest.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://cloud.google.com/gen-ai-faststart
      - name: Await Consultation
        description: >-
          Wait for a consultation with a Google Cloud account team for
          eligibility review and next steps.
faq:
  - question: What is the Google Cloud Gen AI Fast-Start Program?
    answer: >-
      It is a program designed to help enterprises adopt generative AI by
      offering $1,000 trial credits, personalized workshops, and 1:1 technical
      consultations.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      The program is open to enterprises exploring generative AI adoption,
      including those identifying first-use AI cases, scaling existing AI
      implementations, or needing technical validation for AI projects.
  - question: How can I activate the benefits?
    answer: >-
      Applicants should submit the contact form on the program page, await a
      consultation, and then follow the guidance to activate credits and
      schedule a workshop.
  - question: Is there an additional discount offer available?
    answer: >-
      Yes, an early bird discount offering 50% off on an annual subscription is
      available. Interested users should visit the provider's website and apply
      the promo code EARLYBIRD50 before December 31, 2023.

provider_slug: "gcp"
title: "Google Cloud Web3 Startup Program"
intro: "Build faster and easier with Google Cloud’s Web3 startup program, giving you the technology, community, and resources to focus on innovation over infrastructure."
description: "This program offers two tiers—Start and Scale—designed for Web3 projects at different funding stages. Participants receive Google Cloud credits, technical support, training resources, and exclusive partner benefits. Eligibility is based on funding stage, company age, prior credits usage, and other factors. Acceptance into this program is at Google Cloud’s discretion, with restrictions for companies that have IPO’d, been acquired, or conflict with regulatory guidance in their jurisdiction. Additional partner grants and offers from Aptos, Celo, Flow, the HBAR Foundation, Near, Solana Foundation, Polygon Ventures, Base Ecosystem, Nansen, Alchemy, and thirdweb can further accelerate growth and innovation."
status: "Active"
url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup/web3"
value_type: "credits"

max_value: 200000

  - "cloud"
  - "web3"
  - "blockchain"

    max_value: 2000

        action_url: "https://cloud.google.com/startup/web3"

    max_value: 200000

    benefits_level: 4

      - "12 months of Workspace"

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/github/github-for-startups.yaml
================
provider_slug: github
title: GitHub for Startups
intro: Receive up to 20 seats of GitHub Enterprise free for 12 months, along with tailored guidance and DevOps best practices.
description: GitHub for Startups supports early-stage companies by providing free GitHub Enterprise seats for a year, personalized onboarding, extensive DevOps automation, and access to the world's largest open source community. Eligible startups can accelerate their software development, manage projects, automate CI/CD workflows, and keep code secure on GitHub's trusted platform.
status: Active
tags:
  - dev tools
  - collaboration
url: https://github.com/enterprise/startups#get-started
value_type: discount
max_value: 100

tiers:
  - name: GitHub for Startups
    intro: Eligible startups get 20 seats of GitHub Enterprise free for 12 months.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://github.com/enterprise/startups#get-started
    benefits:
      - Up to 20 seats of GitHub Enterprise
      - Tailored product guidance and onboarding
      - Built-in CI/CD and security automation
      - Unlimited private repositories
      - Largest open source community registry
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Outside funding (up to Series A)
      - New to GitHub Enterprise
      - Haven't previously received GitHub Enterprise credits
    effort:
      - Complete online application
      - Undergo eligibility review
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Check eligibility
        description: Ensure your startup meets all requirements (outside funding up to Series A, new to GitHub Enterprise).
        action: Review criteria
        action_url: https://github.com/enterprise/startups#get-started
      - name: Submit application
        description: Fill out the GitHub for Startups application form to get started.
        action: Apply now
        action_url: https://github.com/enterprise/startups#get-started

faq:
  - question: What's included in the GitHub for Startups offer?
    answer: All participants receive up to 20 seats of GitHub Enterprise free for 12 months. Startups affiliated with a GitHub for Startups VC or accelerator partner may be eligible for additional discounts and benefits.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: Any early-stage startup with outside funding up to Series A, new to GitHub Enterprise, and without prior GitHub Enterprise credits may apply.
  - question: What if my startup is not eligible for GitHub for Startups?
    answer: Startups not currently eligible can still explore GitHub Enterprise by signing up for a trial version.
  - question: How can my organization become a GitHub for Startups partner?
    answer: Any investor, accelerator, or startup support organization can apply for GitHub for Startups partner status using GitHub's partner application page.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/gitlab/gitlab-for-startups.yaml

provider_slug: "gitlab"
title: "GitLab for Startups"
meta_title: "Scale your Startup with GitLab"
intro: "Build your startup’s future on GitLab, a platform unifying development, security, and operations from day one. Qualifying companies can receive up to 20 free GitLab Ultimate seats for a year, plus discounts in year two."
description: "GitLab for Startups helps early-stage companies accelerate software delivery with AI-driven DevSecOps. Eligible startups get free or discounted GitLab Ultimate seats, enabling them to focus on building and scaling without the overhead of patching toolchains. GitLab also offers collaboration, security automation, and next-step support to ensure smooth growth beyond the initial program year."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "dev tools"
  - "collaboration"
url: "https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/startups/"
value_type: "discount"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 0
max_value: 100
tiers:
  - name: "Seed Stage Startup"
    intro: "Pre-Seed or Seed stage with up to $5M in external funding, new customers only"
    max_value: 100
    url: "https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/startups/"
    benefits:
      - "Free GitLab Ultimate license (up to 20 seats) for 1 year"
      - "No paid support included (self-service resources only)"
      - "Year 2: 50% discount on any tier, up to 20 seats"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "2 years total"
      - "Year 1 free, Year 2 at 50% discount"
    eligibility:
      - "Pre-Seed or Seed funding (≤ $5M external)"
      - "New GitLab customers only"
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Complete Application Form"
        description: "Submit your details, funding proof, and seat requirements"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/startups/"
  - name: "Early Stage Startup"
    intro: "Series A or Series B with up to $20M in external funding, new customers only"
    max_value: 50
    url: "https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/startups/"
    benefits:
      - "Year 1: 50% discount on any tier, up to 20 seats"
      - "Year 2: 25% discount on any tier, up to 20 seats"
      - "Access to GitLab Duo Pro"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - "2 years total"
      - "Year 1 at 50% discount, Year 2 at 25% discount"
    eligibility:
      - "Series A or B (≤ $20M external)"
      - "New GitLab customers only"
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Complete Application Form"
        description: "Submit your details, funding proof, and seat requirements"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/startups/"
faq:
  - question: "Can self-funded startups apply?"
    answer: "Currently, only externally funded companies that meet the specified parameters are eligible. Future iterations may include additional funding profiles."
  - question: "How is the external funding validated?"
    answer: "Applicants must provide a Crunchbase, Pitchbook, or similar profile. If you do not have a public funding link, proof of Accelerator or VC association referencing your current funding is required."
  - question: "What happens after year one?"
    answer: "GitLab will contact you before your first year ends to guide your renewal options and next steps. Seed Stage Startups receive a 50% discount in the second year, and Early Stage Startups receive a 25% discount."
  - question: "What happens after year two?"
    answer: "After two years, you may choose from GitLab’s offerings to fit your needs. Many graduates stay with GitLab and continue scaling their business with the platform."
  - question: "Who gets counted in the subscription?"
    answer: "All active users on your GitLab instance require a license seat. See GitLab’s licensing and subscription FAQ for more details."
  - question: "Are we allowed to increase the number of seats in the future?"
    answer: "Yes. Contact startups@gitlab.com if you need additional seats, and GitLab will prepare an add-on quote."

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/googleads/google-ads-new-advertiser-promotion.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: googleads
title: Google Ads New Advertiser Promotion
meta_title: Google Ads Promotional Offers for New Advertisers
intro: >-
  Google Ads offers new advertisers a selection of promotional offers to
  jumpstart their first campaign with free ad credits tailored to their initial
  spend.
description: >-
  Google Ads currently presents three promotional tiers that provide new
  advertisers with free ad credits upon meeting the required spending within the
  first 60 days. Depending on the selected offer, advertisers can receive $500,
  $750, or $1,000 in ad credit. Credits appear in accounts within 35 days after
  the qualifying spend and expire 60 days after issuance. Eligibility requires a
  new Google Ads account with complete billing setup and adherence to Google Ads
  policies. Note that some users have reported regional variations, with certain
  accounts potentially receiving up to $1,500 in ad credits.
status: Active
tags:
  - advertising
  - marketing
  - b2b
url: https://ads.google.com
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 500
max_value: 1500
community_notes:
  - title: Regional Variations in Credit Tiers
    body: >-
      While standard tiers offer $500, $750, and $1,000 in ad credits, some
      users have reported receiving up to $1,500 based on regional and
      account-specific variations.
    source_url: https://ads.google.com
tiers:
  - name: "Offer A: Starter Tier"
    intro: Receive $500 in ad credit when spending $500 within the first 60 days.
    max_value: 500
    url: https://ads.google.com
    benefits:
      - Receive $500 in ad credits
      - >-
        Access to multiple ad formats including Search, Display, Video,
        Shopping, and App
      - Jumpstart your online marketing efforts
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - Credits expire 60 days after issuance
    eligibility:
      - New advertiser accounts only
      - Complete payment setup
      - Meet minimum spend of $500 within 60 days
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Google Ads Account
        description: Sign up for a new Google Ads account to access the promotional offer.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://ads.google.com
      - name: Complete Billing Setup
        description: >-
          Enter payment information and apply the promo code during billing
          setup.
        action: Apply Offer
        action_url: https://ads.google.com
  - name: "Offer B: Growth Tier"
    intro: Receive $750 in ad credit when spending $1,000 within the first 60 days.
    max_value: 750
    url: https://ads.google.com
    benefits:
      - Receive $750 in ad credits
      - Enhanced access to ad formats and targeting options
      - Boost your campaign's reach and performance
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Credits expire 60 days after issuance
    eligibility:
      - New advertiser accounts only
      - Complete payment setup
      - Meet minimum spend of $1,000 within 60 days
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign up for Google Ads
        description: Register to receive the promotional offer and set up your account.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://ads.google.com
      - name: Enter Billing Info
        description: Provide valid payment details and promo code to unlock the offer.
        action: Apply Offer
        action_url: https://ads.google.com
  - name: "Offer C: Premium Tier"
    intro: Receive $1,000 in ad credit when spending $1,500 within the first 60 days.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://ads.google.com
    benefits:
      - Receive $1,000 in ad credits
      - Priority support from Google Ads Experts
      - Access advanced targeting and analytics tools
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - Credits expire 60 days after issuance
    eligibility:
      - New advertiser accounts only
      - Complete payment setup
      - Meet minimum spend of $1,500 within 60 days
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Google Ads Account
        description: Sign up for a new Google Ads account to claim the promotional offer.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://ads.google.com
      - name: Complete Payment Setup
        description: Enter billing details and redeem the promo code to activate the offer.
        action: Apply Offer
        action_url: https://ads.google.com
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for the Google Ads promotion?
    answer: >-
      Only new advertiser accounts with no recent ad activity (last 14 days) and
      a valid billing setup are eligible.
  - question: How do I claim my promotional credit?
    answer: >-
      Sign up for a new Google Ads account, complete your billing setup, and
      meet the minimum spend requirement within 60 days to claim your ad credit.
  - question: When do the credits appear and expire?
    answer: >-
      Credits typically appear within 35 days after meeting the spending
      requirements and expire 60 days after issuance.

provider_slug: "grafana"
title: "Grafana Labs Startup Program"
meta_title: "Observability Support for Startups"
intro: "Get up to $100,000 in Grafana Cloud credits for 12 months with enterprise plugins and 24/7 support"
description: "Observability program offering cloud credits and technical resources to help startups scale without infrastructure lock-in. Includes post-program discounts and integration support."
status: "Active"
url: "https://grafana.com/blog/2024/09/24/grafana-labs-startup-program/"
min_value: 0
max_value: 100000
tags: ["monitoring", "analytics", "kubernetes", "devops", "data"]
date: 2025-02-25

tiers:
  - name: "Startup Program"
    intro: "12-month observability support package with guaranteed post-program discounts"
    max_value: 100000
    url: "https://grafana.com/blog/2024/09/24/grafana-labs-startup-program/"
    benefits:
      - "$100,000 in Grafana Cloud credits for 12 months"
      - "All Enterprise data source plugins"
      - "24x7 Grafana support"
      - "Guaranteed 20% discount after program completion"
      - "Additional consumption-based discounts available"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration: ["12 months or until next funding round"]
    eligibility:
      - "<$10M funding raised (ideal)"
      - "<25 employees (ideal)"
      - "New Grafana Cloud customers (including Free tier)"
      - "Existing Grafana OSS users moving to managed solution"
    effort_level: 2
    timeline_indication: "Immediate activation upon approval"
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Complete Application"
        description: "Four-question form takes <2 minutes"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://grafana-labs.typeform.com/to/cSI7ohks/?pg=blog&plcmt=body-txt"

faq:
  - question: "What does the Grafana program include?"
    answer: "$100K credits for logs, traces, metrics, performance testing, profiling, incident management, and synthetic monitoring solutions"
  - question: "Can existing Grafana users apply?"
    answer: "Yes - open to Free tier users and Grafana OSS adopters moving to managed solutions"
  - question: "What are post-program benefits?"
    answer: "Guaranteed 20% discount with additional consumption-based discounts available"
  - question: "Is there vendor lock-in?"
    answer: "No - program emphasizes open standards and easy transition capabilities"
  - question: "What marketing commitments exist?"
    answer: "Participants agree to be reference customers and may be asked to participate in marketing activities like guest blogs or speaking events"
  - question: "How to access integration support?"
    answer: "Dedicated integrations team helps strategize creation of plugins/solutions for Grafana ecosystem"

draft: false
provider_slug: gumlet
title: Gumlet Startup Credits Program
meta_title: Gumlet Startup Credits Program - Optimize Your Media Delivery
intro: >-
  Gumlet's SCP enables startups to deliver optimized video and image content
  across platforms at half the cost.
description: >-
  Gumlet's Startup Credits Program (SCP) provides emerging companies with
  advanced media infrastructure at significantly reduced costs. The program
  helps startups optimize video and image delivery with features such as
  state-of-the-art video transcoding, image optimization, video insights, and
  DRM protection. Participants benefit from unmatched bandwidth optimization,
  personalized onboarding and migration support, and a developer-friendly setup
  with comprehensive API and webhook integrations. It is designed for startups
  registered within the last 4 years, with less than $10M in funding, and not
  currently using Gumlet's paid services, including those from partner VC
  portfolios.
status: Active
tags:
  - media
  - cdn
  - cloud
  - ai
url: https://gumlet.com/startup-credits
value_type: discount
currency: USD
min_value: 50
max_value: 50
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Gumlet Startup Credits Program
    intro: >-
      Receive 50% off on all Gumlet services for the first year with unlimited
      usage, complete platform access, and dedicated onboarding support.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://gumlet.com/startup-credits
    benefits:
      - 50% off first year on all services
      - >-
        Access to video transcoding, image optimization, video insights, and DRM
        protection
      - Personalized onboarding and migration support
      - Enhanced security with geo-blocking and signed URLs
      - Comprehensive API and webhook integrations
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Business registered within the last 4 years
      - Total funding under $10M
      - Not a current paying customer of Gumlet
      - Available to partner VC portfolio companies
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply Online
        description: Complete the online application form on Gumlet's startup portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://gumlet.com/startup-credits
      - name: Submit Documents
        description: >-
          Provide the necessary funding and incorporation documents for
          eligibility verification.
        action: Upload Documents
        action_url: https://gumlet.com/startup-credits
faq:
  - question: What is Gumlet's Startup Credits Program?
    answer: >-
      It is a program that offers startups a 50% discount on all Gumlet media
      services for the first year, along with full platform access and dedicated
      support.
  - question: Who is eligible for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups registered within the last 4 years, with less than $10M in
      funding, not currently using Gumlet's paid services, and those within
      partner VC portfolios are eligible.
  - question: How do I apply?
    answer: >-
      Applicants must complete the online application form, provide the
      necessary documents, and choose an integration method on Gumlet's startup
      portal.
  - question: What support is provided?
    answer: >-
      Participants receive personalized onboarding, migration assistance, and
      dedicated technical support via email and chat.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/heroku/heroku-open-source-software-credit-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: heroku
title: Heroku Open Source Software Credit Program
meta_title: Infrastructure Credits for Open Source Projects
intro: >-
  Receive monthly platform credits for 12 months designed to support open source
  software projects hosted on Heroku.
description: >-
  The Heroku Open Source Software Credit Program is designed to support open
  source projects by providing monthly platform credits over a 12-month period.
  Credits, typically ranging from $25 to $500 USD per month, can be applied
  exclusively to core Heroku services such as Dynos, Postgres, and Key-Value
  Store. Any usage beyond the allocated credits is billed at standard rates to
  the verified credit/debit card on file. Projects can reapply annually to
  continue receiving support, ensuring that maintainers can focus on community
  contributions rather than infrastructure concerns.
status: Active
tags:
  - open source
  - cloud
  - hosting
url: https://www.heroku.com/open-source-credit-program
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 25
max_value: 500
community_notes:
  - title: Annual Renewal
    body: >-
      Projects can reapply after completing the 12-month program to continue
      receiving monthly credits.
    source_url: https://www.heroku.com/open-source-credit-program
  - title: Usage Limitation
    body: >-
      Credits can only be used for core Heroku services and do not extend to
      paid third-party add-ons.
    source_url: https://www.heroku.com/open-source-credit-program
tiers:
  - name: Heroku Open Source Software Credit
    intro: >-
      Approved open source projects receive a predetermined monthly credit
      allocation on Heroku for 12 months.
    max_value: 500
    url: https://www.heroku.com/open-source-credit-program
    benefits:
      - Monthly platform credits for 12 months
      - >-
        Applicable on core Heroku services such as Dynos, Postgres, and
        Key-Value Store
      - Excess usage billed at standard rates
      - Renewable annual program based on project needs
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Maintainer of an open source software project
      - Project must run or intend to run on Heroku
      - Active Heroku account with a valid credit/debit card
      - Adherence to a Code of Conduct and standard open source license
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Review Eligibility
        description: >-
          Ensure your project meets all eligibility criteria, including open
          source maintenance, hosting on Heroku, and account verification.
        action: Review
        action_url: https://www.heroku.com/open-source-credit-program
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Complete the application form to receive your monthly credits.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.heroku.com/open-source-credit-program
faq:
  - question: How do I qualify for the Heroku Open Source Software Credit Program?
    answer: >-
      You must be the maintainer of an open source project that runs or intends
      to run on Heroku, and hold an active Heroku account verified with a valid
      credit/debit card. Salesforce employees and government officials are not
      eligible.
  - question: When are applications reviewed?
    answer: >-
      Applications are reviewed on a monthly basis. For submissions after the
      15th (March to December 2023), reviews will occur the following month.
  - question: What happens if I exceed my monthly credit allocation?
    answer: >-
      Any usage exceeding the allocated credits will be charged at standard
      rates to the credit card on file.
  - question: Can I use the credits on a Heroku Teams account?
    answer: Yes, credits can be applied to either personal or team Heroku accounts.
  - question: Do unused credits roll over to the next month?
    answer: No, any unused credits expire at the end of each month.

================
File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/huawei/huawei-cloud-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: huawei
title: Huawei Cloud Startup Program
meta_title: Huawei Cloud Startup Program - Global Startup Initiative
intro: >-
  Huawei Cloud offers a comprehensive startup program that empowers early-stage
  companies with up to USD 150,000 in cloud credits, dedicated migration
  support, entrepreneurial coaching, and global market access.
description: >-
  The Huawei Cloud Startup Program is a global initiative designed to accelerate
  innovation by providing startups with essential cloud resources, technical
  expertise, business enablement, and market opportunities. It supports agile
  cloud migration through dedicated teams, offers entrepreneurial enablement
  including coaching and best practices sharing, and facilitates strategic
  partnerships through co-selling and joint marketing opportunities. Targeted at
  independently operated startups under 5 years old and in pre-seed to Series A
  stages, the program is tailored for ventures focused on AI, SaaS,
  sustainability, and digital transformation, serving regions across
  Asia-Pacific, Europe, and the Middle East.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - ai
  - enterprise
  - saas
  - asia
url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 150000
community_notes:
  - title: FeiLiu Tech Testimonial
    body: >-
      CTO Lu Weicheng from FeiLiu Tech shared how the program helped reduce
      cloud costs and provided reliable, stable cloud services with dedicated
      support during their early startup stages.
    source_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
  - title: Lingcai Tech Experience
    body: >-
      CEO Wang Ze noted that the Huawei Cloud team's personalized engagement and
      emphasis on security made it possible to implement a robust SaaS solution
      for smart finance and taxation.
    source_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
  - title: ARCTIC DATA Success
    body: >-
      CEO Liu Yixin highlighted how the program drove continuous growth through
      technical support, marketing resources, and joint go-to-market
      opportunities, exceeding their expectations.
    source_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
tiers:
  - name: Huawei Cloud Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Provides up to USD 150,000 in cloud credits along with entrepreneurial
      coaching, technical support, and market access opportunities to accelerate
      startup growth.
    max_value: 150000
    url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
    benefits:
      - Up to USD 150,000 cloud credits voucher
      - Dedicated technical teams for agile cloud migration
      - Entrepreneurial coaching and industry best practices
      - Co-selling and joint marketing opportunities
      - Access to Huawei’s global ecosystem
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - Ongoing
    eligibility:
      - Independently operated startups
      - Under 5 years old
      - Pre-seed to Series A stage
      - Focus on AI, SaaS, sustainability, or digital transformation
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Account
        description: Register on the Huawei Cloud startup portal to begin your application.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
      - name: Complete Registration
        description: >-
          Submit business information and complete enterprise certification as
          required.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
      - name: Undergo Audit
        description: >-
          Have your application reviewed by Huawei Cloud within 10 business
          days.
        action: Review Process
        action_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
      - name: Application Processing
        description: Monitor the status of your application as it is processed.
        action: Check Status
        action_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
      - name: Approval
        description: >-
          Upon successful review, gain access to the credits and support
          provided by the program.
        action: Get Started
        action_url: https://startup.huaweicloud.com/intl/center
faq:
  - question: Can non-tech startups apply?
    answer: >-
      Yes, although the program prioritizes ventures leveraging cloud, AI, or
      IoT, non-tech startups may also apply.
  - question: Is the cloud credit renewable?
    answer: >-
      Credits are typically provided as one-time support, but exceptional
      startups may qualify for extended support.
  - question: How long does the audit process take?
    answer: >-
      Huawei Cloud reviews applications within 10 business days as part of the
      audit process.

faq:
  - question: "What does the HubSpot for Startups program include?"
    answer: "Discounted access to HubSpot's CRM platform with AI features, sales automation tools, and customer service solutions, plus fundraising resources and community support."
  - question: "What proof of funding is required?"
    answer: "Startups must provide documentation of investment rounds and partnership verification with approved organizations."
  - question: "Can existing HubSpot users apply?"
    answer: "Discounts apply only to net-new Professional/Enterprise subscriptions, not upgrades or renewals."
  - question: "What happens after the discount period?"
    answer: "After the discount period ends, pricing reverts to standard rates. The website notes that HubSpot for Startups pricing is applicable to net-new Professional or Enterprise level products only."
  - question: "Are non-tech startups eligible?"
    answer: "Program open to all industries but requires partner organization affiliation for verification."
  - question: "How to access fundraising resources?"
    answer: "Approved startups receive benchmark reports, workshop invites, and tech stack guides through the partner portal."

provider_slug: "ibm"
title: "IBM for Startups"
meta_title: "Accelerate and Scale Innovation with IBM AI"
intro: "Partner with IBM for Startups to accelerate innovation with IBM AI, scale globally, and present your solution to enterprises and investors—no cost, no equity required."
description: "IBM for Startups is a program designed to help startups drive innovation and growth through IBM’s AI and cloud offerings. Participants can receive up to $120,000 USD in IBM Cloud credits, gain access to over 170 products and services, engage with mentors and experts, and showcase solutions to potential investors. Startups must meet eligibility criteria regarding revenue, company age, and prior IBM Cloud usage status."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "cloud"
url: "https://www.ibm.com/startups"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 120000
tiers:
  - name: "IBM for Startups"
    intro: "Up to $120,000 IBM Cloud credits, expert mentorship, and global scale opportunities"
    max_value: 120000
    url: "https://www.ibm.com/startups"
    benefits:
      - "Up to $120,000 IBM Cloud credits"
      - "Access to 170+ products (AI, IoT, data, dev, etc.)"
      - "Mentorship from IBM experts and global mentors"
      - "Opportunities to pitch in front of enterprises and investors"
      - "No-cost, no-equity participation"
    benefits_level: 3
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - "Revenue below $15M in last 12 months"
      - "Privately held and under 10 years old"
      - "Not a paying IBM Cloud customer"
      - "Verifiable entity with website and dedicated email domain"
    effort: []
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Check Eligibility"
        description: "Ensure your startup meets the revenue, age, and verifiable entity criteria"
        action: "View Requirements"
        action_url: "https://www.ibm.com/startups"
      - name: "Register Online"
        description: "Create your profile on the IBM for Startups portal"
        action: "Register"
        action_url: "https://www.ibm.com/startups"

faq:
  - question: "Who can apply for the program?"
    answer: "IBM for Startups is open to all—from students with an idea to established startups with software-based solutions. Specific eligibility criteria include revenue under USD 15 million, private ownership for under 10 years, and no prior paid IBM Cloud usage."
  - question: "Does it cost anything to join the program?"
    answer: "No. IBM for Startups is offered at no cost and requires no equity from participants."
  - question: "What are the next steps to getting started?"
    answer: "Begin by confirming your eligibility, then register on the IBM for Startups web portal to access credits, resources, and mentorship opportunities."
  - question: "How can IBM help me scale and promote my solution?"
    answer: "IBM for Startups provides opportunities to present your solution to global enterprises and investors, plus co-marketing and community support via events and partner networks."
  - question: "Does the IBM for Startups program have a specific time frame?"
    answer: "No fixed time frame is mentioned for this program. Once admitted, you can leverage IBM resources, credits, and mentorship at your own pace."

provider_slug: influxdata
title: InfluxDB $250 Trial
meta_title: InfluxDB Cloud Serverless - Get $250 Credit for 30 Days
intro: >-
  Enjoy a $250 credit for 30 days to explore InfluxDB Cloud Serverless, a
  fully-managed, elastic, and pay-as-you-go time-series database optimized for
  smaller workloads.
description: >-
  InfluxData provides InfluxDB Cloud Serverless, a versatile time-series
  database solution designed for startups and SMBs. This plan offers a free
  30-day trial with a $250 credit, allowing users to experience flexible
  scaling, real-time analytics, and usage-based pricing without long-term
  commitments. With efficient data ingestion at $0.0025/MB written and
  competitive rates for data out, organizations can benefit from a
  high-performance architecture while controlling costs.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - database
  - serverless
  - data
url: https://www.influxdata.com/products/influxdb-cloud-serverless/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 250
max_value: 250
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: InfluxDB Cloud Serverless
    intro: >-
      Designed for startups and SMBs, this tier offers a $250 credit for 30 days
      to explore a fully-managed, elastic, multi-tenant time-series database
      with pay-as-you-go pricing.
    max_value: 250
    url: https://www.influxdata.com/products/influxdb-cloud-serverless/
    benefits:
      - $250 credit for 30 days
      - Flexible, pay-as-you-go pricing
      - Fully-managed cloud service
      - No minimums or long-term commitments
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 30 days
    eligibility:
      - New users
      - Startups
      - SMBs
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign Up
        description: >-
          Register on the InfluxData website to start your free trial and
          receive a $250 credit upon upgrade.
        action: Start for Free
        action_url: https://www.influxdata.com/products/influxdb-cloud-serverless/
faq:
  - question: What does the $250 credit cover?
    answer: >-
      The credit can be used towards data ingestion, query execution, and
      storage costs during the first 30 days on the Usage-Based Plan.
  - question: Is there a commitment required to use this offer?
    answer: >-
      No long-term commitment is required. The Cloud Serverless tier allows
      users to start for free and only pay for what they use after the trial.
  - question: How do I get started?
    answer: >-
      Simply sign up on the InfluxData website, begin your free 30-day trial,
      and the $250 credit will be applied upon upgrade.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/intercom/intercom-early-stage-program-for-startups.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: intercom
title: Intercom Early Stage Program for Startups
meta_title: Intercom Early Stage Program for Startups
intro: >-
  Startups receive a 90% discount on Intercom's AI-first customer service
  platform, enabling businesses to maximize efficiency and savings, and start
  more valuable conversations with customers.
description: >-
  Intercom's Early Stage Program offers substantial benefits for qualifying
  startups by providing tiered discounts on its Advanced customer service plan.
  In Year 1, startups receive a 90% discount, in Year 2 a 50% discount, and in
  Year 3 a 25% discount. The program includes access to powerful features such
  as an AI-enhanced Inbox with integrated ticketing, a Fin AI Agent that
  provides 10 free resolutions per month (with additional resolutions at $0.99
  each), and Proactive Support Plus for automated messaging. Additional
  resources include the Early Stage Academy, a Startup Dealbook with over $100K
  in credits, and access to a vibrant Intercom community. This initiative is
  tailored for early-stage startups with up to $10M in funding, fewer than 15
  employees, and who are new to using Intercom.
status: Active
tags:
  - customer support
  - ai
  - agents
url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
value_type: discount
min_value: 25
max_value: 90
community_notes:
  - title: G2 Recognition
    body: >-
      Intercom's Fin AI is rated highest in user satisfaction for customer
      service, showcasing its excellence in AI-driven support solutions.
    source_url: https://www.g2.com
tiers:
  - name: Year 1 Discount
    intro: >-
      90% discount on Intercom's Advanced plan for the first year, including
      access to AI-enhanced Inbox, Fin AI Agent, and Proactive Support Plus.
    max_value: 90
    url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
    benefits:
      - 90% discount on Advanced plan base fee
      - Access to AI-enhanced Inbox and integrated ticketing
      - 10 Fin AI Agent resolutions per month
      - Proactive Support Plus with 500 messages/month
      - "Bundled seats: 6 Full, 6 Copilot, and 20 Lite"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Up to $10M in funding
      - Fewer than 15 employees
      - New Intercom customer
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply Online
        description: Submit your application through Intercom's Early Stage portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
  - name: Year 2 Discount
    intro: >-
      50% discount on Intercom's Advanced plan for the second year, maintaining
      core features and support.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
    benefits:
      - 50% discount on Advanced plan base fee
      - Access to AI-enhanced Inbox
      - Continuation of Fin AI Agent resolutions
      - Proactive Support Plus included
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Up to $10M in funding
      - Fewer than 15 employees
      - New Intercom customer
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply Online
        description: Submit your application through Intercom's Early Stage portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
  - name: Year 3 Discount
    intro: >-
      25% discount on Intercom's Advanced plan for the third year, ensuring
      continued service with standard pricing on usage-based channels.
    max_value: 25
    url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
    benefits:
      - 25% discount on Advanced plan base fee
      - Ongoing access to core features such as AI-enhanced Inbox
      - 10 Fin AI Agent resolutions per month remain included
      - Access to Proactive Support Plus
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Up to $10M in funding
      - Fewer than 15 employees
      - New Intercom customer
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply Online
        description: Submit your application through Intercom's Early Stage portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.intercom.com/early-stage
faq:
  - question: What does the program cover?
    answer: >-
      The program covers access to advanced Intercom features with tiered
      discounts—90% off in Year 1, 50% in Year 2, and 25% in Year 3—along with
      bundled seat allocations and support tools.
  - question: Fin AI Agent pricing?
    answer: >-
      Participants receive 10 Fin AI resolutions per month for free, with
      additional resolutions available at $0.99 each.
  - question: What happens after the first year?
    answer: >-
      In Year 2, the discount reduces to 50%, and in Year 3, to 25%.
      Alternatively, startups may switch to the Essential plan starting at
      $39/month.
  - question: Are companies with more than 15 employees eligible?
    answer: >-
      No, the program is designed for startups with fewer than 15 employees.
      Larger companies should consider other options or contact Sales.
  - question: How can I become a partner?
    answer: >-
      Interested companies can apply via the partner application link:
      https://airtable.com/appd4joJjSv2FiadY/pagJTjpvc6xkeWCrq/form.
  - question: Can I switch to a cheaper plan later?
    answer: Yes, after Year 1, startups can downgrade to the Essential plan.
  - question: What if my team grows beyond 15 employees?
    answer: >-
      Discounts remain active for the 3-year term, but additional hires beyond
      15 will be charged at standard rates.
  - question: How is the discount calculated for usage-based services?
    answer: >-
      Discounts apply to base plan fees and certain usage-based services (e.g.,
      Email and Messages Sent over a threshold), while services like Fin AI,
      SMS, WhatsApp, and Phone are charged at list price.
  - question: Does the program include phone support?
    answer: >-
      Yes, phone support is available, though calls are billed at standard list
      prices.

================
File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/ionq/ionq-research-credits-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: ionq
title: IonQ Research Credits Program
meta_title: IonQ Research Credits Program for Academic Innovation
intro: >-
  The IonQ Research Credits Program offers up to $10,000 in free credits for
  time on their quantum computers to qualified academics, supporting the future
  of quantum information science.
description: >-
  IonQ's Research Credits Program supports academic and research institutions by
  providing access to up to $10,000 in quantum computing credits. These credits
  help defray the cost of accessing IonQ's advanced quantum systems—including
  Harmony, Aria, Forte, and upcoming models—and come with technical support and
  direct feedback from IonQ's experts. With a fast review process (typically
  within three business days) and flexible usage for research and educational
  projects, the program is ideal for initiatives in quantum computing research,
  algorithm development, curriculum design, and open-source tool creation.
  Credits cannot be used for commercial or personal projects.
status: Active
tags:
  - quantum
  - research
  - education
url: https://ionq.com/programs/research-credits
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 10000
community_notes:
  - title: Credit Validity
    body: Compute credits are valid for 12 months after activation.
    source_url: https://ionq.com/docs
  - title: Activation Deadline
    body: Credits must be activated within 60 days from the project start date.
    source_url: https://ionq.com/docs
tiers:
  - name: Research Credits Tier
    intro: >-
      Provides up to $10,000 in compute credits for approved proposals from
      qualified academic researchers.
    max_value: 10000
    url: https://ionq.com/programs/research-credits/application
    benefits:
      - Up to $10,000 in compute credits for quantum computing research
      - Technical support and feedback from IonQ experts
      - Access to advanced quantum systems including Harmony, Aria, and Forte
      - Fast review process with decisions typically within three business days
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Graduate students
      - Faculty members
      - Academic researchers
      - Undergraduates with faculty supervision
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Proposal
        description: >-
          Complete the online application form with project details including
          research goals, required resources, and team qualifications.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://ionq.com/programs/research-credits/application
faq:
  - question: What projects qualify for the program?
    answer: >-
      Eligible projects include quantum computing research, algorithm
      development, curriculum design, and open-source tool creation.
  - question: What are the credit limitations?
    answer: >-
      Credits cannot be transferred, sold, or used for commercial or personal
      projects, and must align with the approved proposal.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Graduate students, faculty members, and academic researchers from
      accredited institutions are eligible; undergraduates may participate under
      faculty supervision.
  - question: How long are the credits valid?
    answer: >-
      Compute credits remain valid for 12 months after activation and must be
      activated within 60 days of the project start date.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/jetbrains/jetbrains-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: jetbrains
title: JetBrains Startup Program
meta_title: >-
  JetBrains Startup Program - Empowering Startups with Discounted Developer
  Tools
intro: >-
  JetBrains offers startups an exclusive 50% discount on its suite of developer
  tools, providing long-term access and support to accelerate innovation.
description: >-
  JetBrains supports startups through two primary programs. The Startup Program
  provides a 50% discount on JetBrains IDEs, team tools, and AI Assistant Pro
  licenses for up to 10 users over 5 years, available to privately held
  companies founded within the last 5 years with a verifiable online presence.
  Additionally, the Incubators and Accelerators Program offers incubator-led
  startups 6 months of free access to JetBrains tools and Space paid plan
  upgrades, followed by the standard 50% discount, along with 24/7 priority
  support.
status: Active
tags:
  - dev tools
url: https://www.jetbrains.com/startups/
value_type: discount
currency: USD
min_value: 50
max_value: 100
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: JetBrains Startup Program
    intro: >-
      Provides a 50% discount on JetBrains IDEs, team tools, and AI Assistant
      Pro licenses for up to 10 users over 5 years.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://www.jetbrains.com/startups/
    benefits:
      - 50% discount on JetBrains IDEs and team tools
      - Access for up to 10 users
      - Long-term discount available for 5 years
      - Global availability in 113 countries
      - Dedicated technical support and networking events
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 5 years
    eligibility:
      - Privately held company
      - Founded within the last 5 years
      - Verifiable online presence
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Apply via the JetBrains Startup page using the online application
          form.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.jetbrains.com/startups/
  - name: Incubators and Accelerators Program
    intro: >-
      Offers incubator-led startups 6 months of free access to JetBrains tools
      and Space plan upgrades, followed by a standard 50% discount.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://www.jetbrains.com/company/incubators/apply/
    benefits:
      - 6 months free access to JetBrains tools
      - Free upgrades to Space paid plans
      - 24/7 priority technical support
      - Standard 50% discount after free period
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 6 months free, then 5 years discount
    eligibility:
      - Affiliated with a partnering incubator or accelerator
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Apply via Partner Portal
        description: >-
          Incubators or accelerators can submit their application using the
          JetBrains partner portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.jetbrains.com/company/incubators/apply/
faq:
  - question: What is the JetBrains Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      It provides eligible startups with a 50% discount on JetBrains IDEs, team
      tools, and AI Assistant Pro licenses for up to 10 users over 5 years along
      with dedicated support.
  - question: Who qualifies for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be privately held, founded within the last 5 years, and have
      a verifiable online presence.
  - question: How do incubator-affiliated startups benefit?
    answer: >-
      They receive 6 months of free access to JetBrains tools and Space plan
      upgrades, after which they enjoy the standard 50% discount.
  - question: How long does the application process take?
    answer: Applications typically process within 2-3 business days.

provider_slug: koyeb
title: >-
  Koyeb Startup Program: Accelerate with Credits for High-Performance
  Infrastructure
meta_title: Koyeb Startup Program - Accelerate with High-Performance Cloud Credits
intro: >-
  Get up to $30k of compute credits and specialized support to accelerate
  go-to-market for early-stage startups. The program offers high-performance
  cloud infrastructure with a seamless developer experience.
description: >-
  The Koyeb Startup Program provides early-stage startups with up to $30,000 in
  compute credits applicable to both Standard and GPU instances. It features
  dedicated onboarding with a solutions engineer, white-glove migration
  assistance, and priority 24/7 support via a dedicated Slack channel.
  Additionally, participants gain early access to beta features and exclusive
  platform resources, enabling them to deploy full-stack applications, AI
  workloads, APIs, and databases on a globally scalable infrastructure.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - ai
  - gpu
url: https://tally.so/r/w4kzad
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 30000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Koyeb Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Early-stage startups receive up to $30k in compute credits, dedicated
      onboarding, and premium support to deploy and scale applications.
    max_value: 30000
    url: https://tally.so/r/w4kzad
    benefits:
      - Up to $30k compute credits for Standard and GPU instances
      - Dedicated solutions engineer for onboarding
      - White-glove migration assistance
      - Priority support via a dedicated Slack channel
      - Early access to beta features and exclusive resources
    benefits_level: 3
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - Seed-stage startups
      - Raised between $1M and $5M in funding
      - Part of an approved partner accelerator
    effort_level: 4
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the online application form. The program team will review
          your application within one week.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://tally.so/r/w4kzad
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for the Koyeb Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      The program is designed for seed-stage startups that have raised between
      $1M and $5M from VCs or are part of a partner accelerator. Promising
      bootstrapped startups may also qualify on a case-by-case basis.
  - question: What benefits does the program offer?
    answer: >-
      It offers up to $30k in compute credits for Standard and GPU instances,
      along with dedicated onboarding, white-glove migration assistance,
      priority support, and early access to new features.
  - question: How long does it take to receive a response after applying?
    answer: Koyeb’s team typically reviews applications and responds within one week.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/linear/linear-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: linear
title: Linear Startup Program
meta_title: Linear Startup Program - Free Access for Early-Stage Startups
intro: >-
  The Linear Startup Program offers early-stage startups up to 6 months of free
  access to Linear’s premium project management tools, designed to streamline
  product development workflows.
description: >-
  This program provides eligible startups with free access for 6 months to
  Linear’s Basic and Business plans. It includes advanced project management
  features such as Cycles for sprint planning, Projects for roadmap management,
  custom workflows, and integrations with GitHub, Figma, and Slack, alongside
  real-time collaboration tools. The program is intended for startups with fewer
  than 50 employees that are new to Linear’s paid plans. Applicants must obtain
  a partner code from an affiliated accelerator, investor, or incubator and
  submit it via the program page while logged into an admin account. After the
  free period, standard pricing applies starting at $10 per user per month.
status: Active
tags:
  - project management
  - collaboration
  - workflow
  - free trial
url: https://linear.app/startups
value_type: discount
currency: USD
max_value: 100
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Linear Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Eligible startups receive up to 6 months free access to Linear’s premium
      project management tools, available on their Basic or Business plans.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://linear.app/startups
    benefits:
      - 6 months free access to either Basic or Business plans
      - >-
        Advanced features including Cycles for sprint planning and Projects for
        roadmap management
      - Custom workflows and integrations with GitHub, Figma, and Slack
      - Real-time collaboration and a lightweight, fast interface
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Startups with fewer than 50 employees
      - Must be new to Linear’s paid plans
      - >-
        Affiliated with an official Linear partner (accelerators, investors, or
        incubators)
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Obtain Partner Code
        description: >-
          Obtain a partner code from your affiliated accelerator, investor, or
          incubator.
      - name: Submit Code
        description: >-
          Submit the partner code via Linear’s startup program page while logged
          into an admin account.
        action: Submit Code
        action_url: https://linear.app/startups
      - name: Upgrade Workspace
        description: >-
          Upgrade your workspace to a paid plan to have the credits applied
          automatically.
        action: Upgrade Now
        action_url: https://linear.app/startups
faq:
  - question: What if my investor isn’t a Linear partner?
    answer: >-
      If an investor is not recognized as a Linear partner, they should apply
      through Linear’s partner application form.
  - question: What alternatives are available if my startup is ineligible?
    answer: >-
      Startups that do not qualify for the program can continue using Linear’s
      free plan, which includes unlimited users and 250 active issues.
  - question: What happens after the 6-month free period?
    answer: >-
      After 6 months, startups will transition to standard pricing, starting at
      $10 per user per month.

provider_slug: make
title: Make Startup Program
meta_title: Empower Your Startup with Automation Credits
intro: >-
  Unlock your startup's potential with free access to Make's visual no-code
  automation engine and operational credits tailored to your growth stage.
description: >-
  The Make Startup Program offers tailored support for early-stage startups to
  scale their operations through automation. Participants gain free access to
  Make’s powerful visual automation platform to build and automate business
  processes. The program provides two tiers: one offering 480,000 operations for
  startups affiliated with approved accelerators, incubators, or VCs, and
  another with 240,000 operations for bootstrapped startups. Additionally, it
  includes priority technical support, collaboration tools, and integration into
  Make’s network of mentors and investors.
status: Active
tags:
  - automation
  - no-code
  - workflow
url: https://www.make.com/startup-program
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 500
max_value: 1000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Partnered Startups
    intro: >-
      For startups affiliated with an approved accelerator, incubator, or VC,
      offering enhanced operational credits.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://www.make.com/startup-program/apply
    benefits:
      - 480,000 operations on Make Teams plan
      - Free access to the no-code visual automation platform
      - Priority technical support
      - Access to Make’s network of investors and mentors
      - Collaboration and team management tools
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Until credits are exhausted
    eligibility:
      - Affiliated with an approved accelerator, incubator, or VC
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Verify Investor Affiliation
        description: >-
          Provide details of your investor to confirm affiliation with Make's
          approved partners.
        action: Verify
        action_url: https://www.make.com/startup-program/apply
  - name: Bootstrapped Startups
    intro: >-
      For self-funded startups, offering essential operational credits with
      access to core automation capabilities.
    max_value: 500
    url: https://www.make.com/startup-program/apply
    benefits:
      - 240,000 operations on Make Teams plan
      - Free access to the no-code visual automation platform
      - Priority technical support
      - Basic collaboration tools
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Until credits are exhausted
    eligibility:
      - Self-funded or bootstrapped startups
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the short eligibility form to qualify for operational
          credits.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.make.com/startup-program/apply
faq:
  - question: What if my investor isn’t part of Make’s network?
    answer: >-
      Bootstrapped startups still qualify for the 240k operations tier.
      Additionally, startups affiliated with non-network investors may request
      their investor to join Make’s network.
  - question: How long do the credits last?
    answer: >-
      Credits are tied to the Teams plan and can be used until they are
      exhausted.
  - question: Is there ongoing support after application?
    answer: >-
      Yes, the program provides priority technical support and access to partner
      resources throughout the startup’s journey.
  - question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
    answer: >-
      Yes, startups can transition to higher-tier plans (Pro, Teams, or
      Enterprise) as their automation needs grow.

provider_slug: mathworks
title: MATLAB and Simulink for Startups Program
meta_title: MathWorks Startup Program - Affordable Licensing for Startups
intro: >-
  Provides early-stage companies with affordable access to MATLAB, Simulink, and
  specialized toolboxes, enabling rapid prototyping and production development
  with technical support and training benefits.
description: >-
  The MathWorks Startup Program offers early-stage companies access to MATLAB
  and Simulink solutions at competitive startup pricing. The program features
  two main licensing options: the MATLAB Suite with 40+ add-on products and the
  comprehensive MATLAB & Simulink Suite with 90+ add-ons. Benefits include free
  access to an online training suite, technical mentorship from application
  engineers, 50% off training credits, and co-marketing opportunities.
  Additionally, startups affiliated with one of over 500 accelerators can
  receive 12 months of free licensing for up to 10 users, with renewal available
  upon requalification. Eligibility requires being founded within the last 5
  years, having fewer than 15 engineers, and generating less than $1M in annual
  revenue, with no restrictions on funding stage.
status: Active
tags:
  - engineering
  - design
  - manufacturing
  - research
url: https://www.mathworks.com/products/startups.html
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 3650
community_notes:

    body: >-
      Startups affiliated with over 500 accelerators, such as Y Combinator and
      Greentown Labs, can enjoy 12 months of free licensing for up to 10 users.
    source_url: https://www.mathworks.com/products/startups.html
  - title: Training and Support
    body: >-
      Participants receive free access to an online training suite, 50% off
      training credits, and technical support from application engineers.
    source_url: https://www.mathworks.com/products/startups.html

    benefits_level: 2

      - 12 months

      - Affiliated with one of 500+ accelerators

      - Annual revenue under $1M USD
    effort_level: 2

      - name: Apply via Accelerator
        description: >-
          Submit your application through your accelerator partner or directly
          via the MathWorks Startup portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.mathworks.com/products/startups.html

      Gain access to MATLAB Suite with 40+ add-on products at competitive
      startup pricing, including free online training for license holders.
    max_value: 1500

      and free online training, available at $3,650 per year.
    max_value: 3650

faq:
  - question: What is the duration of the license?
    answer: >-
      Licenses are provided for 12 months. Accelerator-affiliated startups
      receive 12 months of free licensing, renewable upon requalification.
  - question: How do I apply for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups can apply directly via the MathWorks website or through an
      affiliated accelerator. Eligibility is based on founding year, team size,
      and annual revenue.
  - question: What training resources are included?
    answer: >-
      The program offers free access to an Online Training Suite with on-demand
      courses and 50% off additional training credits.
