provider_slug: memberstack
title: Memberstack Discount Programs – Memberstack 2.0
meta_title: Memberstack Discount Programs
intro: >-
  Memberstack supports innovative startups, non-profits, young professionals,
  and community projects with exclusive discount programs that reduce upfront
  costs on their membership-management platform.
description: >-
  Memberstack offers several official discount programs designed to support
  startups, non-profits, young professionals, and community-focused projects.
  The offerings include a 100% discount on the Basic Plan for young
  professionals, 50% off for non-profits, discounted pricing for startups with
  0% transaction fees and 10,000 included members, a free Basic Plan for Webflow
  community projects, and a special 200 Customer Plan for high-ticket/low-volume
  businesses. Each program requires an application process with proper
  documentation and periodic renewal.
status: Active
tags:
  - dev tools
  - web design
  - no-code
  - saas
url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
value_type: discount
currency: USD
max_value: 100
community_notes:
  - title: Application Process Details
    body: >-
      Each discount program requires submission of an application form along
      with the necessary documentation for verification. Once approved, the
      discounts are manually applied, typically within a few business days.
    source_url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
tiers:
  - name: Young Professionals (18–22 years)
    intro: >-
      100% off the Basic Plan for 12 months for young professionals. Applicants
      must provide proof of age for personal or educational projects.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
    benefits:
      - 100% discount on the Basic Plan for 12 months
      - Access for personal or educational projects
      - Renewal requires reapplication after 12 months
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Proof of age (e.g., government ID)
      - Age between 18 and 22
      - Personal or educational project use
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Fill out the application form with proof of age
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
  - name: Non-Profits
    intro: >-
      50% off all plans for 12 months exclusively for registered non-profits
      with the required documentation.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
    benefits:
      - 50% discount on all plans for 12 months
      - Accessible to registered non-profits globally
      - Annual reapplication with updated non-profit tax documentation
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Recent non-profit tax documentation
      - Registered non-profit organization
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Provide recent non-profit tax documentation with the application form
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
  - name: Startups
    intro: >-
      Discounted pricing for startups: $249/month ($199 if paid yearly) with 0%
      transaction fees and 10,000 included members.
    max_value: 249
    url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
    benefits:
      - Discounted rate of $249/month, or $199/month if paid yearly
      - 0% transaction fees on membership transactions
      - 10,000 included members
      - Priority onboarding support
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - >-
        Participation in startup programs such as Y Combinator, 500 Startups, or
        Launch
      - Less than $1 million in funding
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Fill out the form with startup proof and relevant documentation
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
  - name: Webflow Community Projects
    intro: >-
      Free Basic Plan ($0/month) for projects specifically serving the Webflow
      community, subject to approval.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
    benefits:
      - Access to the Basic Plan at no cost
      - Designed for projects serving the Webflow community
      - Supports both free and paid membership models
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - Varies
    eligibility:
      - Project must serve the Webflow community
      - Approval required via application
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Apply with project details and proof of serving the Webflow community
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
  - name: 200 Customer Plan
    intro: >-
      Special pricing at $99/month with 0% transaction fees for businesses with
      up to 200 members, ideal for high-ticket/low-volume models like coaching
      or agencies.
    max_value: 99
    url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
    benefits:
      - Special rate of $99/month
      - 0% transaction fees
      - Tailored for high-ticket/low-volume businesses
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - Monthly
    eligibility:
      - Businesses expecting up to 200 members
      - High-ticket/low-volume business models such as coaching or agencies
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Fill out the application form with your business details
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.memberstack.com/discount-programs
faq:
  - question: What happens when my discount expires?
    answer: >-
      Applicants must reapply for eligibility once the discount period ends as
      plans revert to standard pricing.
  - question: Can discounts be combined?
    answer: No, discounts are mutually exclusive and cannot be combined.
  - question: Do discounts apply to transaction fees?
    answer: >-
      For startups, the discount includes 0% transaction fees, while other plans
      follow the standard fee structure.
  - question: Can I switch plans mid-term?
    answer: >-
      Plan upgrades or downgrades are prorated, and refunds are available within
      30–45 days of payment.

draft: false
provider_slug: miro
title: Miro Startup Program
meta_title: Miro Startup Program – Accelerate Your Startup's Growth
intro: >-
  Miro's Startup Program offers early-stage companies a comprehensive suite of
  collaboration and innovation tools to scale and succeed at speed.
description: >-
  Miro's Startup Program provides startups with $1,000–$1,500 in credits to
  access paid plans along with 2,000+ pre-built templates, advanced design and
  collaboration tools, and exclusive community events. The program also features
  training resources via Miro Academy and integrations with tools like Jira,
  Slack, and Figma. Eligible startups must be incorporated within the last 7
  years, have raised no more than $10M, employ 30 or fewer people, and not
  operate primarily as a service or consulting firm. Applicants must apply
  before initiating any Miro trial subscription.
status: Active
tags:
  - collaboration
  - design
  - project management
url: https://miro.com/startups
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 1000
max_value: 1500
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Independent Startups
    intro: >-
      For startups not affiliated with an accelerator, offering $1,000 in
      credits for Miro's paid plans such as Starter or Business.
    max_value: 1000
    url: https://miro.com/startups
    benefits:
      - Access to 2,000+ pre-built templates
      - Advanced collaboration and design tools
      - Training resources via Miro Academy
      - Exclusive community networking events
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Incorporated within the last 7 years
      - Total funding ≤ $10M
      - Employee count ≤ 30
      - Not a service/consulting firm
      - Apply before starting a Miro trial
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Confirm Eligibility
        description: >-
          Verify your startup meets the incorporation, funding, and team size
          criteria.
        action: Review Criteria
        action_url: https://miro.com/startups
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Complete the online application form through Miro's partner portal.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://miro.com/startups
  - name: Partner Startups
    intro: >-
      For startups affiliated with accelerators like Techstars or Microsoft
      Founders Hub, offering $1,500 in credits.
    max_value: 1500
    url: https://miro.com/startups
    benefits:
      - Higher credit allocation
      - Access to premium templates and integrations
      - Priority support and onboarding
      - Exclusive events with industry experts
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 6 months
    eligibility:
      - Affiliated with an approved accelerator or incubator
      - Incorporated within the last 7 years
      - Total funding ≤ $10M
      - Employee count ≤ 30
      - Apply before starting a Miro trial
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Confirm Eligibility
        description: >-
          Verify your startup meets the partner affiliation and eligibility
          criteria.
        action: Review Requirements
        action_url: https://miro.com/startups
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Apply via Miro's partner portal to access higher credits and priority
          review.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://miro.com/startups
faq:
  - question: How long are the credits valid?
    answer: >-
      Unused credits expire after 6 months; additional charges apply if
      subscription costs exceed the allotted credits.
  - question: How many users can benefit from the credits?
    answer: >-
      The credits cover up to 20 users initially, with scalable options
      available for growing teams.
  - question: What happens after the credits are used?
    answer: >-
      Startups can transition to free-tier features or negotiate extended
      startup rates with Miro.

  Analytics, Web Analytics, Session Replay, and premium add-ons. The program
  also features fast setup via Autocapture and pre-built templates, world-class
  support, and access to a community of over 11k peers. Valued at over $150,000,

    answer: >-
      Startups must be incorporated for less than 5 years, have total funding of
      $8M USD or less, have never used Mixpanel paid plans, and must not have
      previously redeemed a Mixpanel offer.
  - question: How do I join?
    answer: >-
      Apply directly through the Mixpanel startup application page at
      https://mixpanel.com/startups-apply for instant eligibility verification.
  - question: Do I need to be associated with a VC or accelerator to join?
    answer: >-
      No, the program eligibility is based solely on the company's age, funding,
      and prior usage of Mixpanel.
  - question: What’s included in the Startup Plan?
    answer: >-
      The plan includes full access to Mixpanel’s analytics suite, premium
      add-ons, free event ingestion up to 1 billion events for one year, and
      world-class support.
  - question: What is the implementation requirement?
    answer: >-
      Accepted startups must begin sending data within a 90-day activation
      window.
  - question: Will I receive help getting started with Mixpanel?
    answer: >-
      Yes, the program offers dedicated support with expert guidance, pre-built
      templates, and access to a large community for peer support.
  - question: What happens if my usage exceeds 1 billion events?
    answer: >-
      Additional events will be charged at a rate of $0.00028 per event without
      overage penalties.
  - question: What happens after my year in the startup program?
    answer: >-
      After the first year, companies can continue on the Free Plan, upgrade to
      a Growth or Enterprise Plan, or downgrade based on their usage.
  - question: What happens if I misrepresent my eligibility status?
    answer: >-
      Mixpanel reserves the right to permanently remove a startup from the
      program if eligibility requirements are misrepresented.

================

provider_slug: "mongodb"
title: "MongoDB for Startups"

intro: "Scale your startup from ideation to growth with free MongoDB Atlas credits, one-on-one technical guidance, co-marketing opportunities, and more."
description: "MongoDB for Startups helps early-stage companies build faster and scale further with their developer data platform. Eligible startups receive up to $5,000 in credits for MongoDB Atlas Database and data services, personal onboarding support, technical consultations, hands-on training via MongoDB University, and a variety of go-to-market opportunities."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "database"
url: "https://www.mongodb.com/solutions/startups"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 5000

community_notes: []

tiers:
  - name: "General Track"
    intro: "Offers up to $5,000 in credits for MongoDB Atlas and related data services, with technical support and co-marketing opportunities."

      - "Flexible multi-cloud deployment with Atlas to scale globally"

      - "12 months to use credits once activated"
    eligibility:

      - "Await acceptance email"

        action: "Apply"

    max_value: 5000

      - "Opportunity to connect with MongoDB's 45,000+ customers"

        action: "Book Session"
        action_url: "https://www.mongodb.com/solutions/startups"

faq:
  - question: "What are the eligibility requirements for MongoDB for Startups?"
    answer: "Eligible startups must be early-stage (Series A or earlier), building a product or service (not dev shops, consultants, or agencies), first-time participants in the program, have a live website, and a valid company LinkedIn profile with direct association to the applicant."
  - question: "How do I apply to MongoDB for Startups?"
    answer: "You can apply directly through the MongoDB for Startups webpage. If you're associated with a VC, accelerator, or incubator that partners with MongoDB, you can ask them for a referral."
  - question: "Can I apply if I'm already using MongoDB?"
    answer: "Yes, both new and existing MongoDB Atlas users are eligible to apply for the program."
  - question: "When and how do I receive my promo code?"
    answer: "Once accepted into the program, you'll receive a unique promo code in your welcome email."
  - question: "How long do I have to use my credits?"
    answer: "You have 12 months to activate your promo code, and once activated, you have 12 months to use your Atlas credits."
  - question: "Where can I get technical support?"
    answer: "MongoDB recommends signing up for the Developer Support plan, which provides 24/7 support, in-app chat, and support portal access. The first 30 days are free, and you can use your Atlas credits to pay beyond that period. The program also includes exclusive access to a one-on-one session with a MongoDB expert."

success_stories: []

      Startups receive a minimum of $500 in video credits, free access to Mux
      Data analytics, dedicated onboarding support from video experts, and
      optional consultations with Mux co-founders.

    answer: >-
      Credits expire one year after activation and must be used within 12
      months.

      previously received credits.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/n8n/n8n-startup-plan.yaml
================
provider_slug: "n8n"
title: "n8n Startup Plan"
intro: "Give smaller companies access to enterprise-level workflow automation features at an affordable monthly price."
description: "The n8n Startup Plan is designed for companies with fewer than 20 employees and under 3 years old. It offers enterprise plan features, including the option to self-host, a usage limit of 200 active workflows, and unrestricted workflow executions. Priced at $400 per month, the plan also comes with a 14-day free trial and monthly billing via credit card. Startups can cancel anytime if they no longer need it or no longer meet the eligibility criteria."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - automation
  - dev tools
  - no-code
  - low-code
  - workflow
url: "https://n8n.io/pricing/"
value_type: "discount"
currency: "USD"
max_value: 50

tiers:
  - name: "n8n Startup Plan"
    intro: "Affordable self-hosted plan granting full enterprise features to eligible early-stage startups"
    max_value: 50
    url: "https://n8n.io/pricing/"
    benefits:
      - "All features of the n8n Enterprise plan"
      - "Self-hosting option for full control"
      - "Up to 200 active workflows with unlimited executions"
      - "Monthly pricing starting at $400"
      - "14-day free trial"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "Minimum 1 year or until eligibility no longer applies"
    eligibility:
      - "Fewer than 20 employees"
      - "Less than 3 years old"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Sign up for Startup Plan"
        description: "Begin a 14-day trial of the startup plan for full enterprise features"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://plans.n8n.io/"
      - name: "Activate License"
        description: "Obtain and enter your license key from the Settings menu in your self-hosted n8n instance"
        action: "Activate Plan"
        action_url: "https://docs.n8n.io/enterprise-key/"

faq:
  - question: "How do I activate my startup plan?"
    answer: "Startup plans are only available on the self-hosted version of n8n. After signing up for the 14-day trial, you receive a license key. Enter your license key through the Settings in your n8n instance to activate enterprise features. For more details, refer to the self-hosting docs."
  - question: "How do I cancel my startup plan?"
    answer: "In your self-hosted n8n instance, go to Settings > Usage and plan. Enter your license key if you haven’t yet. Then click on Manage Plan and follow the link at the bottom of the page to cancel."
  - question: "I can’t activate my license with an error 'Activation Failed: Activation key has already been used on this instance'"
    answer: "Try clearing your existing license by running 'n8n license:clear' before activating. If issues persist, contact support at help@n8n.io with the information from running 'n8n license:info'."

================

provider_slug: nebius
title: Nebius for Startups
meta_title: Accelerate Your AI Development with Nebius Cloud

  thriving AI community.
description: >-
  The Nebius for Startups program offers AI-focused companies enterprise-grade
  cloud credits alongside priority access to NVIDIA H100 GPUs, managed services,
  and dedicated ML support. Designed for startups from bootstrapped ventures to
  pre-Series B funded companies, the program is structured into three tiers – AI
  Explorer, AI Builder, and AI Scaler – each tailored to different stages and
  needs. Applicants benefit from a streamlined, single application process with
  decisions within 7-10 business days and are expected to participate in
  co-branding initiatives such as logo exchanges and case studies.

        action: Apply Now

          Provide additional information and participate in interviews if
          necessary.
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for the Nebius for Startups program?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups include bootstrapped, angel, or early-funded companies
      in the AI and ML space, from pre-seed to pre-Series B stages, based on
      tier-specific criteria.
  - question: How does the application process work?
    answer: >-
      Startups submit a single application for both cloud and inference credits,
      with a verification process and a decision provided within 7-10 business
      days.
  - question: What are the co-marketing requirements?
    answer: >-
      Participants are expected to exchange logos and may be featured in case
      studies or social media, although co-marketing is optional.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/neo4j/neo4j-startup-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: neo4j
title: Neo4j Startup Program
meta_title: Neo4j Startup Program - Empowering Startups with Graph Database Technology
intro: >-
  The Neo4j Startup Program supports innovative startups by providing access to
  the world’s leading graph database and advanced graph technology tools,
  enabling startups to build and grow scalable, data-driven applications.
description: >-
  The program offers two main benefits. First, Neo4j Aura™ for Startups provides
  a cloud-based graph database service with affordable pricing at 9 cents per
  GB-hour, complete with monitoring, upgrades, backups, Neo4j Bloom, and the
  APOC library. Second, eligible startups receive a free Neo4j Enterprise
  License that enables mission-critical applications with support for multiple
  production, test/staging, and development machines. Eligibility requires 50 or
  fewer employees, less than $3MM USD annual revenue, and a willingness to share
  startup success stories. This program is designed for venture-backed,
  angel-backed, or self-funded startups that use Neo4j to directly support their
  business operations.
status: Active
tags:
  - database
  - cloud
  - enterprise
url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 0
max_value: 0
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Neo4j Aura™ for Startups
    intro: >-
      Access a fully managed, cloud-based graph database service with advanced
      features and affordable pay-as-you-go pricing at 9 cents per GB-hour.
    max_value: 0
    url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
    benefits:
      - Cloud-based graph database service
      - Affordable pricing at 9 cents per GB-hour
      - Includes monitoring, upgrades, backups, Neo4j Bloom, and APOC library
      - Scales with startup needs
      - Compatible with official drivers and bolt protocol support
    benefits_level: 2
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - 50 or fewer employees
      - Less than $3MM USD annual revenue
      - Venture-backed, angel-backed, or self-funded startups
      - Must use Neo4j to support business operations
      - Willing to share startup success stories with the Neo4j community
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Account
        description: Login or create an account to sign up for the Neo4j Startup Program
        action: Register
        action_url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Provide details on how the startup will use Neo4j
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
  - name: Free Neo4j Enterprise License for Startups
    intro: >-
      Receive a free Neo4j Enterprise License to run mission-critical, clustered
      graph database applications on-premises or in the cloud.
    max_value: 0
    url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
    benefits:
      - Free license of Neo4j Enterprise
      - Supports mission-critical applications
      - Includes 3 production, 3 test/staging, and 6 development machines
      - Each machine supports up to 256GB RAM and 24 cores
    benefits_level: 3
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - 50 or fewer employees
      - Less than $3MM USD annual revenue
      - Venture-backed, angel-backed, or self-funded startups
      - Must use Neo4j to support business operations
      - Willing to share startup success stories with the Neo4j community
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Account
        description: Login or create an account to sign up for the Neo4j Startup Program
        action: Register
        action_url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Provide details on how the startup will utilize Neo4j Enterprise
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://neo4j.com/neo-startup-program/
faq:
  - question: Can startups use Neo4j Bloom?
    answer: >-
      Yes, through the Startup Program’s Enterprise License; Neo4j Bloom is
      available as part of the offering and is not included in the Community
      Edition.
  - question: What if AuraDB isn’t suitable?
    answer: >-
      Startups can request a free self-hosted Neo4j Enterprise License by
      emailing startups@neo4j.com and explaining their needs.
  - question: Is enterprise support included?
    answer: >-
      No, enterprise-class support is not included; participants are encouraged
      to use community forums, with discounted support plans available
      separately.
  - question: How long does application approval take?
    answer: It typically takes a few days, with status updates provided via email.

provider_slug: neon

  providing $100k in cloud credits for the first year. The program also includes
  a guarantee to match any competing offer, ensuring that startups always
  receive the best deal. Leveraging its serverless database platform, Neon
  delivers rapid provisioning, effortless branch management, and integrated
  CI/CD support for testing schema migrations—features that help startups
  accelerate development velocity. Success stories like Topo.io (W24)
  demonstrate the platform’s potential to drive innovation and efficiency.

    answer: >-
      Only Y Combinator startups are eligible to claim $100k worth of Neon
      credits for the first year.

    answer: >-
      Neon will match any competitor's offer to ensure the best deal for
      eligible startups.

    answer: >-
      Simply submit your email via the application form available on the Neon
      website.

  and expert consulting to deliver industry-specific AI solutions such as

      program.

      The program currently focuses on fintech, healthcare, and IoT, but is
      adaptable to any sector.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/notion/notion-for-startups.yaml
================
provider_slug: "notion"
title: "Notion for Startups"
meta_title: "Up to 6 months free with unlimited AI - Over $6,000 in savings"
intro: "Notion helps startups stay organized and scale faster by offering up to 6 months of free usage, including unlimited AI features, for eligible teams under 50 employees with under $10M in funding."
description: "Notion for Startups gives early-stage companies a powerful workspace to manage knowledge, docs, projects, and more. Qualified startups can access an extended free period on Notion’s Plus plan with unlimited AI, valued at up to $6,600 for 50 employees. Additional benefits include exclusive software discounts, the Notion Champions Community, video-based learning via Notion Academy, and curated template libraries to support every phase of a startup’s journey. Eligibility requires being a non-paying Notion customer with fewer than 50 employees and under $10M in funding from an accredited investor."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "collaboration"
  - "productivity"
  - "docs"
  - "project management"
  - "saas"
url: "https://www.notion.so/startups-apply"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 3300
max_value: 6600
community_notes: []

tiers:
  - name: "6 Months Free with Unlimited AI"
    intro: "For affiliated early-stage startups with fewer than 50 employees and under $10 million in accredited funding."
    max_value: 6600
    url: "https://www.notion.so/startups-apply"
    benefits:
      - "Free Notion usage for up to 6 months"
      - "Unlimited Notion AI add-on"
      - "Up to $6,600 in value"
      - "Access to exclusive software discounts"
      - "Invitation to the Champions Community"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "6 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Affiliated with a Notion partner"
      - "Under 50 employees"
      - "Non-paying Notion customer"
      - "Raised under $10M in funding"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Complete Application"
        description: "Fill out the online form verifying your eligibility and partner affiliation"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://www.notion.so/startups-apply"

  - name: "3 Months Free with Unlimited AI"
    intro: "For early-stage startups with fewer than 50 employees and under $10 million in accredited funding, but no partner affiliation."
    max_value: 3300
    url: "https://www.notion.so/startups-apply"
    benefits:
      - "Free Notion usage for up to 3 months"
      - "Unlimited Notion AI add-on"
      - "Up to $3,300 in value"
      - "Access to exclusive software discounts"
      - "Invitation to the Champions Community"
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - "3 months"
    eligibility:
      - "Under 50 employees"
      - "Non-paying Notion customer"
      - "Raised under $10M in funding"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Complete Application"
        description: "Fill out the online form verifying your eligibility"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://www.notion.so/startups-apply"

faq:
  - question: "Who is eligible?"
    answer: "You must be a non-paying Notion customer with fewer than 50 employees and under $10M in funding from an accredited investor. Additional criteria apply if you wish to receive 6 months free through a Notion partner."
  - question: "Why is Notion offering a discount for startups?"
    answer: "Notion has seen thousands of early-stage companies use their workspace to streamline operations from day one. They want to help more teams lay a strong foundation that can expand as they grow."
  - question: "How do I apply to receive the discount?"
    answer: "Complete the application form on the Notion for Startups page. Once approved, you’ll receive an email with instructions on how to redeem the free period."
  - question: "What is the offer worth?"
    answer: "The combined value of Notion Plus Plan and AI add-on for 50 employees over 6 months can total up to $6,600."
  - question: "How do I suggest a partner that Notion should work with?"
    answer: "You can submit partner suggestions via the application form or by emailing startups-help@makenotion.com. Tag them on social media using #NotionForStartups to encourage them to join."
  - question: "How can VCs or accelerators become partners?"
    answer: "They can apply to become a partner and offer this discount to their startup portfolios by filling out the partner application. Notion is especially interested in expanding globally."

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/oracle/oracle-cloud-free-tier.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: oracle
title: Oracle Cloud Free Tier
meta_title: Oracle Cloud Free Tier - US$300 Free Trial & Always Free Cloud Services
intro: >-
  Oracle Cloud Free Tier enables users to build, test, and deploy applications
  on Oracle Cloud for free, starting with a US$300 free trial and continuing
  with a suite of Always Free services.
description: >-
  Oracle Cloud Free Tier combines a 30-day trial with US$300 cloud credits and a
  range of Always Free services. It offers access to comprehensive OCI services
  including compute, storage, databases, networking, and more. After the trial,
  users can seamlessly switch to a Pay As You Go model, only paying for usage
  beyond the free tier limits. This program is designed for developers and
  businesses looking to explore Oracle's robust cloud platform.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - free trial
url: https://www.oracle.com/cloud/free/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 300
max_value: 300
community_notes:
  - title: Developer and Architecture Resources
    body: >-
      Oracle provides extensive documentation, training, and reference
      architectures through its Developer Resource Center and Oracle
      Architecture Center.
    source_url: https://www.oracle.com/cloud/free/
  - title: Seamless Transition
    body: >-
      After the free trial, users can easily switch to a Pay As You Go model,
      ensuring continuous access to cloud services.
    source_url: https://www.oracle.com/cloud/free/
tiers:
  - name: Free Trial
    intro: >-
      Receive US$300 cloud credits valid for 30 days to access all eligible
      Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services and explore Oracle's cloud platform.
    max_value: 300
    url: https://www.oracle.com/cloud/free/
    benefits:
      - US$300 cloud credits
      - Access to all OCI services
      - 30-day trial period
      - Build, test, and deploy applications
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 30 days
    eligibility:
      - One account per individual
      - Valid credit/debit card required
      - Mobile phone verification for 2FA
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Oracle Cloud Account
        description: >-
          Sign up using your email, valid credit/debit card, and mobile phone at
          Oracle Cloud Free Tier page.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://www.oracle.com/cloud/free/
      - name: Verify Account
        description: >-
          Complete the identity verification process by verifying your
          credit/debit card and mobile phone.
        action: Verify
        action_url: https://www.oracle.com/cloud/free/
faq:
  - question: What is Oracle Cloud Free Tier?
    answer: >-
      It provides a free trial with US$300 in cloud credits for 30 days along
      with a suite of Always Free services to build, test, and deploy
      applications on Oracle Cloud.
  - question: What are Always Free Services?
    answer: >-
      These are a set of Oracle Cloud services available indefinitely at no
      charge, even after the trial expires, with some usage limitations.
  - question: Who is eligible for the Free Tier?
    answer: >-
      Only one Oracle Cloud Free Tier account is permitted per person, and a
      valid credit/debit card along with mobile phone verification is required.
  - question: Why is payment information required?
    answer: >-
      Payment information is needed for identity verification and account setup
      to ensure legitimate usage of the free trial.
  - question: What happens after the trial period?
    answer: >-
      After the 30-day trial, users can switch to a Pay As You Go account and
      will only be charged for usage that exceeds the free Always Free limits.
  - question: How can usage be monitored?
    answer: >-
      Usage and potential charges can be monitored via Oracle Cloud Console and
      through cost estimator tools available on Oracle's website.

provider_slug: otc
title: Open Telekom Cloud TechBoost Program
meta_title: Get up to €100,000 in Open Telekom Cloud credits
intro: >-
  Accelerate your cloud-based startup with Deutsche Telekom's TechBoost program,
  offering up to €100,000 in Open Telekom Cloud credits, access to a vast B2B
  network, and strategic support for sustained growth.
description: >-
  Telekom TechBoost is a comprehensive startup initiative by Deutsche Telekom
  that supports cloud-based startups with market-ready solutions. The program
  provides up to €100,000 in free credits for the GDPR-compliant Open Telekom
  Cloud, ensuring secure and sustainable scalability. Startups gain access to a
  large customer network, dedicated partnership managers, and the TechBoost
  Connect matchmaking platform to connect with corporate challenges and
  partners. Designed for both early-stage and scaling startups, the program
  features dedicated tracks offering tailored benefits, mentorship, and
  technical guidance.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - networking
  - europe
url: https://techboost.telekom.com/?lang=en
value_type: credits
currency: EUR
min_value: 0
max_value: 100000
community_notes:
  - title: Sustainable Infrastructure
    body: >-
      The Open Telekom Cloud operates from energy-efficient, geo-redundant data
      centers that reduce energy usage by 30% and are powered by 100% renewable
      energy.
    source_url: https://techboost.telekom.com/?lang=en
  - title: GDPR Compliance
    body: >-
      TechBoost leverages the GDPR-compliant Open Telekom Cloud to ensure high
      standards of data protection and privacy.
    source_url: >-
      https://www.telekom.de/ueber-das-unternehmen/datenschutz#fragen-und-antworten

        action: Apply Now

      For later-stage startups aiming to scale with enhanced sales support and
      advanced cloud infrastructure benefits.
    max_value: 100000

      success.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/ovh/ovhcloud-startup-program.yaml

provider_slug: "ovh"
title: "OVHcloud Startup Program"
meta_title: "Cloud Support for Startups & Scaleups"
intro: "Accelerate development with up to €100,000 free cloud credits"
description: "12-month program offering cloud credits, engineering support, and ecosystem access for tech startups at different growth stages. Provides a concierge journey onto OVHcloud with personalized technical and business support."
status: "Active"
url: "https://startup.ovhcloud.com/en/"
min_value: 10000
max_value: 100000
tags:
  - cloud
  - europe
  - gpu
date: 2025-03-02

tiers:
  - name: "For Startups"
    intro: "12-month foundational support for early-stage startups"
    url: https://startup.ovhcloud.com/en/startups/
    benefits_level: 2
    effort_level: 2
    max_value: 10000
    benefits:
      - "€10,000 free cloud credits"
      - "6 hours of 1-on-1 time with an engineer (free)"
      - "Visibility for your startup"
      - "Access to market and funding"
    duration: ["12 months"]
    eligibility:
      - "Registered tech startup"
      - "MVP development stage"
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create OVHcloud Account"
        description: "Sign up for an OVHcloud account if you don't have one"
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: "https://ca.ovh.com/auth/?onsuccess=https%3A%2F%2Fca.ovh.com%2Fauth%2Fsso%2Ftoken%2F%3FovhSubsidiary%3DWE%26return_to%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fstartup.ovhcloud.com%252Fen%252Flogin%252F&ovhSubsidiary=WE"
      - name: "Program Application"
        description: "Submit startup details through program portal"
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: "https://startup.ovhcloud.com/en/"

  - name: "For Scaleups"
    intro: "Advanced support for growth-stage scaleups"
    url: https://startup.ovhcloud.com/en/scaleups/
    max_value: 100000
    benefits_level: 3
    effort_level: 3
    benefits:
      - "Up to €100,000 free cloud credits"
      - "Up to 20 hours of 1-on-1 time with an engineer (free)"
      - "Personal visibility for your scaleup"
      - "Access to market and funding"
    duration: ["12 months"]
    eligibility:
      - "Post-revenue tech company"
      - "Demonstrated growth metrics"
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create OVHcloud Account"
        description: "Sign up for an OVHcloud account if you don't have one"
        action_url: "https://ca.ovh.com/auth/?onsuccess=https%3A%2F%2Fca.ovh.com%2Fauth%2Fsso%2Ftoken%2F%3FovhSubsidiary%3DWE%26return_to%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fstartup.ovhcloud.com%252Fen%252Flogin%252F&ovhSubsidiary=WE"
      - name: "Scaleup Validation"
        description: "Business review with program team"
        action_url: "https://startup.ovhcloud.com/en/"

  - name: "For Enablers"

        description: "Sign up for an OVHcloud account if you don't have one"
        action_url: "https://ca.ovh.com/auth/?onsuccess=https%3A%2F%2Fca.ovh.com%2Fauth%2Fsso%2Ftoken%2F%3FovhSubsidiary%3DWE%26return_to%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fstartup.ovhcloud.com%252Fen%252Flogin%252F&ovhSubsidiary=WE"
      - name: "Enabler Application"
        description: "Submit organization details through program portal"
        action_url: "https://startup.ovhcloud.com/en/"

faq:
  - question: "How do I submit an application?"
    answer: 'To submit an application, simply apply online by clicking the "Apply" button available on our homepage. Verify that you are on the right country website, based on your business address by selecting the correct country flag in the top right corner of the page, before clicking on "Apply". Next, enter the customer account you would like to link to the program or create a new one. Then answer some basic questions about your business. Once you have submitted your application, you will receive a response within 7 days.'

  - question: "Which OVHcloud account should I enter to sign up?"
    answer: "The OVHcloud account that you choose will be the account with which your Startup Program vouchers will be associated. If you are an existing customer, this is the account that you use for the billing of your current services. Note that, once you associate an application with a customer account, you will not be able to switch to another OVHcloud account. For this reason, we strongly suggest that you do not enter your personal OVHcloud account under any circumstances."

  - question: "I don't have an OVHcloud account, can I still sign up?"
    answer: "If you do not have an OVHcloud account, you can create one via the sign-up form for the OVHcloud Startup Program. You will be prompted to do this in the first step."

  - question: "The application form asks me to provide an 'event code'? How can I get one?"
    answer: "This code is not mandatory and does not carry any specific advantages. It is used to identify your application when one of our employees or partners meets you at an event. However, it is necessary for startups with support structures managed by a Premium partner with the OVHcloud Startup Program. In this case, please contact the service in advance, or the person responsible for the partnership within your structure."

  - question: "What are the advantages for startups when they join the OVHcloud Startup Program?"
    answer: "If you join our Startup Program, we will provide you with Startup Program vouchers. These vouchers can be up to €100,000, depending on your stage of development and server requirements, and can be used to deploy a solution built on OVHcloud platforms. By taking part in this program, you will also receive up to 20 hours of free technical support, depending on your stage of development, from our expert engineers throughout your time in the Startup Program. Our objective is to respond to the needs of all startups with powerful solutions that can be used to set up a flexible, high-availability service. In addition to the vouchers and technical support, the Startup Program also offers personal visibility and access to the market and funding for our members. See the Startup Program homepage for more details on the specific offerings for startups and scaleups."

  - question: "What are the advantages of choosing OVHcloud over other competitors?"
    answer: "OVHcloud offers true data sovereignty to European customers and customers in other parts of the world as well. For example, OVHcloud implements technical and organizational measures that aim to protect the data hosted by its EU-based customers against interference from authorities outside of the European Union. We also have an excellent and very competitive price-to-performance ratio (according to reports by Cloud Spectator). This means you get the best hardware at an affordable price. We value transparency, so we will always indicate a monthly or hourly price on the hardware you are using. There are no hidden costs or over-charging for egress bandwidth. OVHcloud does not charge bandwidth costs in general which provides greater price transparency. OVHcloud takes open-source technology and interoperability very seriously with its services. This means that you are not locked in by our technology and can migrate your infrastructure at any time, should you choose to do so. However, by delivering a high-quality service, we trust that you will want to work with OVHcloud for the long term."

  - question: "Is the OVHcloud Startup Program different from other startup support programs?"
    answer: "Most major cloud players are too large to provide a personalized service that meets the individual needs and ambitions of all the startups in their programs. A personal touch is what makes us unique and is at the heart of what we offer. We offer 1-on-1 time with a manager in your region to help you maximize the benefits of the Startup Program and OVHcloud's secure, open standards-based, and data-sovereign cloud. OVHcloud goes further by offering support from our technical experts – including advice on creating and scaling your infrastructure. In this way, the program responds to your long-term goals and allows you more time to focus on business priorities. In addition, the Fast Forward Accelerator builds on the accompanied journey onto OVHcloud that is provided by the Startup Program with business acceleration support. This includes dedicated access to the market, funding events, visibility on social media, and 1-on-1 mentoring and access to our Content Hub."

  - question: "Is the OVHcloud Startup Program voucher allocation lower than other startup programs?"
    answer: "No, the sums provided are equivalent to most other startup programs. They take into account the value of the euro against the dollar, as well as the price-to-performance ratio of OVHcloud solutions, which is generally better than most on the cloud market (according to reports by Cloud Spectator). The technical support hours also help startups to better utilize their voucher usage by managing the scaling of their infrastructure. This helps startups avoid any unnecessary costs that may be unmanageable once the Startup Program is completed."

  - question: "How can I improve our chances of admission?"
    answer: "If you meet the following criteria, your application is more likely to be successful: The fields in the sign-up form are completed diligently and on-time; The project proposed has been launched; Support within a support structure e.g., incubator or accelerator; A functional website explaining the concept behind your solution; A detailed outline of the solution is provided in the form; A business model detailed in the form; A description of technical requirements provided in the form and the ways in which OVHcloud can help (solutions, quantity of resources, technologies, etc.); At least one successful fundraising."

  - question: "I am already part of a support program with a competitor. Can I still join the OVHcloud Startup Program?"
    answer: "Yes, the OVHcloud Startup Program does not impose any form of exclusivity to OVHcloud services. This is an opportunity to test and compare our solutions with other alternatives on the market."

  - question: "Is my startup eligible for the €100,000 vouchers offered by the Scale level of the OVHcloud Startup Program?"
    answer: "Scale level allows selected series-A (and beyond) funded startups and scaleups 12 months to activate their products or solutions on our cloud for free. Accepted startups and scaleups will be assessed to understand what their infrastructure spend will be over the 12 months and allocated vouchers up to €100,000 based on that assessment."

  - question: "What are your eligibility criteria?"
    answer: "We support any startup that proposes innovative, technical projects that have growth potential, as long as they at least have a Proof of Concept (POC) or Minimum Viable Product (MVP) that can be implemented on our cloud. These companies may or may not be OVHcloud customers; they could be a small team that wants to test a POC or MVP on the cloud; they might already be generating revenue. It is important that the startup requires cloud infrastructure soon. This is because the vouchers allocated following program admission must be used within the program's set time limit, or the vouchers will be lost. However, the OVHcloud Startup Program does not support: Projects that are not linked to a professional startup or activity (NGOs, associations, etc.); Companies that have already signed up to or taken part in an OVHcloud Startup Program (previously Digital Launch Pad); Projects with false, incomplete, or vague information included in the form; Any activity or behavior that is contentious such as traffic exchanges (Hitleap, Jingling, etc.), Black Hat SEO (Download, Re-upload of videos on online video platforms, etc.), cryptocurrency mining, video game bots, etc. Some applications may also be declined if they are a better match for the OVHcloud Partner Program. The OVHcloud Partner Program is better suited to the following profiles: Companies whose goal is to resell OVHcloud products as an integrator or white-label product; Companies offering digital services, consulting businesses, or competing services."

  - question: "Does the Startup Program include any hidden, contractual obligations?"
    answer: "No. The OVHcloud Startup Program is completely free for the companies it supports. We do not request any form of compensation and will not take any shares in your startup. We provide you with the means to succeed, so you can focus on achieving your goals."

  - question: "Will I need to repay the Startup Program vouchers I use or do not use?"
    answer: "No, the allocated Startup Program vouchers are completely at your disposal. OVHcloud will not request any compensation from you. You will only be charged for products and solutions that are not covered by the vouchers."

  - question: "How long can I participate in the OVHcloud Startup Program and at what point does it start?"
    answer: "Your participation will last for a maximum of 12 months for each of our levels, Start and Scale. It will start once the contracts are signed that you receive after your application is accepted. Immediately, you will have access to the benefits provided by the OVHcloud Startup Program."

  - question: "Are the OVHcloud Startup Program vouchers valid for OVHcloud services that I already own?"
    answer: "Yes. Once your Startup Program vouchers have been allocated, eligible OVHcloud solutions that you already use (and the ones you order) will be automatically debited using this credit (provided that there is a sufficient amount of credit)."

  - question: "What pricing applies to the services I use during and after my participation in the program?"
    answer: "Whether you are participating in the program or not, you are always billed as per the pricing on our website."

  - question: "How much time will it take to process my application?"
    answer: "Once your application has been sent, the team responsible for selecting startups will let you know whether it has been accepted or not within 7 days."

  - question: "Why was my application declined?"
    answer: "We receive a high volume of applications. In an effort to maintain the highest quality of service, a selection committee meets daily to determine which startups should be supported by OVHcloud. Priority is given to projects deemed to be the most innovative, and where it is clear that OVHcloud's expertise, infrastructure support, and financial support are necessary. If the OVHcloud Startup Program has declined your application, it may be for one of the following reasons: Your project is not linked to a professional startup or activity (NGOs, associations, etc.); Your company has already signed up for or taken part in an OVHcloud Startup Program (previously Digital Launch Pad); Your application contained false, incomplete, or vague information; Your project is linked to activity or behavior that is contentious such as traffic exchanges (Hitleap, Jingling, etc.), Black Hat SEO (Download, Reupload of videos on online video platforms, etc.), cryptocurrency mining, video game bots, etc. Some applications may be declined if we deem a project is better suited for the OVHcloud Partner Program. Entry to the OVHcloud Partner Program or our Marketplace is better suited for the following profiles: Companies looking to resell OVHcloud products as an integrator or white-label products; Companies offering digital services, consulting businesses, and companies looking to compete with OVHcloud. If you have further questions regarding your application, please contact us via email on startup@ovhcloud.com."

  - question: "My application has been accepted. What are the next steps?"
    answer: "Congratulations! A Startup Program Manager will contact you soon and you'll receive an acceptance email outlining the following steps:\n\nStep 1 (ESSENTIAL): Sign the contract. The link to the contract is included in the acceptance email or you can access the contract from your OVHcloud Control Panel:\n• Log in to the OVHcloud Manager;\n• Click on your name in the top right of the page;\n• On the next page click \"My services\" in the left menu;\n• Click on the \"Contracts\" tab in the middle of the screen near the top;\n• You should see the Startup Program contract there.\n\nStep 2: Wait for your Startup Program vouchers to be issued (available within 48 hours). To verify if your vouchers have been issued, follow these steps:\n• Log in to the OVHcloud Manager;\n• Click \"Payment method\" under your name in the top right of the page;\n• On the next page click \"My Startup Program vouchers\" in the second menu from the top.\n\nStep 3: Check out our FAQ and Guides, if necessary.\n• The Startup Program vouchers cover only Public Cloud and Hosted Private Cloud solutions (for example, Bare Metal Cloud products will not be paid by the vouchers);\n• As a new customer, you will quickly hit quota limits on Public Cloud products. Don't use the \"Increase My Quota\" button but rather create a Support ticket via the Manager, asking for a quota increase and indicate that you are part of the Startup Program.\n\nStep 4: Follow us on Twitter.\n\nStep 5: If you have performed these steps, you can start your tech development. Remember that you won't be alone. In fact, the Startup Program Manager for your region will personally contact you very soon and onboard you to explain our added benefits in detail. You can contact the Startup Program Manager in your region via the following email addresses:\n• Africa & Middle East: africa-me-startup@ovh.com\n• Americas excluding Brazil & USA: america-startup@ovh.com\n• APAC: apac-startup@ovh.com\n• Central & Eastern Europe: cee-startup@ovh.com\n• DACH: dach-startup@ovh.com\n• France & Benelux: frbenelux-startup@ovh.com\n• Southern Europe & Brazil: se-startup@ovh.com\n• UK, Ireland & Northern Europe: ne-startup@ovh.com"

  - question: "Where can I find my OVHcloud Startup Program contract?"
    answer: "The link to the contract is included in the acceptance email or you can also follow these steps to find your contract:\n• Log in to the OVHcloud Manager;\n• Click on your name in the top right of the page;\n• On the next page click \"My services\" in the left menu;\n• Click on the \"Contracts\" tab in the middle of the screen near the top;\n• You should see the Startup Program contract there."

  - question: "How do I check if my Startup Program vouchers have been issued?"
    answer: "To check whether your vouchers have been issued, follow these steps:\n• Log in to the OVHcloud Manager;\n• Click \"Payment method\" under your name in the top right of the page;\n• On the next page click \"My Startup Program vouchers\" in the second menu from the top.\n\nIf nothing appears, it may be that the OVHcloud Startup Program contracts sent by email have not been signed, or that the customer account used is not the one provided at the time of registration. If this is the case, please refer to the earlier question: \"Where can I view the welcome email for the OVHcloud Startup Program?\" or log in using the correct customer account."

  - question: "How can I increase my infrastructure quotas as a Startup Program member?"
    answer: 'As a new customer, you will quickly reach quota limits on Public Cloud products. DO NOT use the "Increase My Quota" button! Create a Support ticket through your OVHcloud Control Panel and request that your quota be increased, stating that you are part of the Startup Program.'

  - question: "How are the Startup Program vouchers used with invoices?"
    answer: "Invoices for eligible products will be automatically paid with Startup Program vouchers. If the invoice exceeds the remaining voucher balance, the invoice will not automatically be paid by vouchers. You can request a manual part-payment from the Startup Program manager in your region:\n• Africa & Middle East: africa-me-startup@ovh.com\n• Americas excluding Brazil & USA: america-startup@ovh.com\n• APAC: apac-startup@ovh.com\n• Central & Eastern Europe: cee-startup@ovh.com\n• DACH: dach-startup@ovh.com\n• France & Benelux: frbenelux-startup@ovh.com\n• Southern Europe & Brazil: se-startup@ovh.com\n• UK, Ireland & Northern Europe: ne-startup@ovh.com"

  - question: "Where can I check my remaining Startup Program voucher balance?"
    answer: 'You can check your remaining Startup Program voucher balance at any time via the OVHcloud Control Panel. Simply click on "My account", then "My payment methods" and then "My Startup Program vouchers". If nothing appears, it may be that the OVHcloud Startup Program contracts sent by email have not been signed, or that the customer account used is not the one provided at the time of registration. If this is the case, please refer to the earlier question: "Where can I view the welcome email for the OVHcloud Startup Program?" or log in using the correct customer account.'

  - question: "What can I spend my Startup Program vouchers on?"
    answer: "Startup Program vouchers are only redeemable for Public Cloud (excluding instances with A100, H100, L4 and L40s GPUs) and Hosted Private Cloud solutions. In general, Bare Metal Cloud and Web Cloud products cannot be paid with vouchers. Contact the Startup Program manager in your region to get more details on exactly what is covered by Startup Program vouchers:\n• Africa & Middle East: africa-me-startup@ovh.com\n• Americas excluding Brazil & USA: america-startup@ovh.com\n• APAC: apac-startup@ovh.com\n• Central & Eastern Europe: cee-startup@ovh.com\n• DACH: dach-startup@ovh.com\n• France & Benelux: frbenelux-startup@ovh.com\n• Southern Europe & Brazil: se-startup@ovh.com\n• UK, Ireland & Northern Europe: ne-startup@ovh.com"

  - question: "I have a question about OVHcloud solutions, an order, or an ongoing incident affecting one of my services. Who should I contact?"
    answer: "You can get in touch with our sales and technical support teams via https://help.ovhcloud.com/"

  - question: "How can I request a meeting to discuss infrastructure challenges, or contact a member of the OVHcloud Startup Program team?"
    answer: "Please follow the options available on the FAQs and Support page of the Startup Program website."

  - question: "Does the OVHcloud Startup Program only offer cloud services?"
    answer: "The Startup Program vouchers only cover Public Cloud and Hosted Private Cloud solutions. For example, Bare Metal Cloud products will not be paid with vouchers but can still be purchased. This program is focused on cloud-based solutions. The cloud offers the most innovative solutions for building scalable, high-availability infrastructure with backup and security options (like vRack). You can ensure that your users have a service capable of managing traffic spikes, without experiencing any hardware failures."

  - question: "The level of support I have been given does not reflect the maturity of my business or project. Can I change it?"
    answer: "If you join our Startup Program, we will provide you with Startup Program vouchers. These vouchers can total up to €100,000, depending on your stage of development and server requirements, and can be used to deploy a solution built on OVHcloud platforms. By taking part in this program, you will also receive up to 20 hours of free technical support from our expert engineers throughout your time in the Startup Program. You will also be eligible for a certain level of support from our support team based on your stage of development. See the Startup Program homepage for more details on the specific offerings for startups and scaleups. Startup Program members can contact the Startup Program Manager in their region at the following email addresses to ask about increasing their support level:\n• Africa & Middle East: africa-me-startup@ovh.com\n• Americas excluding Brazil & USA: america-startup@ovh.com\n• APAC: apac-startup@ovh.com\n• Central & Eastern Europe: cee-startup@ovh.com\n• DACH: dach-startup@ovh.com\n• France & Benelux: frbenelux-startup@ovh.com\n• Southern Europe & Brazil: se-startup@ovh.com\n• UK, Ireland & Northern Europe: ne-startup@ovh.com"

  - question: "What is the duration of the OVHcloud Startup Program? What happens afterward?"
    answer: "Your participation will last for a maximum of 12 months for each of our levels, Start and Scale. After this period, any remaining Startup Program vouchers will be invalid and you will be responsible for making full payment for all your OVHcloud solutions. However, as an OVHcloud customer, our sales team is always available to discuss your requirements. You can also get in touch with our support team regarding any technical issues or incidents. You will remain part of the Startup Program alumnus and will have access to the community platform and any events we host for alumni. Please follow the options available on the FAQs and Support page of the Startup Program website."

  - question: "What is the OVHcloud Startup Program community platform?"
    answer: "This community platform is hosted on Whaller. In this space, you can: View premium content (tips, technical training, webinars, etc.), get the latest news on our program, get access to a Startup Program member networking space, and subscribe to receive notifications about our events (meetups, webinars, etc.). You can access the community platform from the relevant link on the OVHcloud Startup Program website."

================

provider_slug: posthog
title: PostHog for Startups
meta_title: PostHog for Startups - $50K Credits & Exclusive Benefits
intro: >-
  Access $50,000 in platform credits for 12 months, plus additional DigitalOcean
  credits, exclusive startup merchandise, and growth opportunities to help you
  reach product-market fit.
description: >-
  PostHog for Startups is designed for early-stage companies to scale their
  analytics infrastructure without heavy upfront costs. Eligible startups must
  be less than 2 years old and have raised under $5 million, with sign-ups after
  January 1, 2023. The program provides $50,000 in platform credits valid for
  one year, a $25,000 DigitalOcean credit through the Hatch program, exclusive
  merchandise, and opportunities such as startup spotlights and office hours.
  After the credit period, startups transition to standard plans while
  continuing to enjoy community benefits.
status: Active
tags:
  - analytics
  - dev tools
url: https://posthog.com/startups
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 50000
community_notes:
  - title: YC Endorsement
    body: >-
      Cat Li, Product & Engineering Lead at Y Combinator, highlights how PostHog
      is central to making data-driven product improvements.
    source_url: https://posthog.com/startups
  - title: Concept Ventures Praise
    body: >-
      Oliver Kicks from Concept Ventures emphasizes the value of PostHog for
      optimizing product analytics for startups.
    source_url: https://posthog.com/startups
tiers:
  - name: PostHog Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Receive $50,000 in platform credits, $25,000 DigitalOcean credit, and
      exclusive startup merchandise for a 12-month period.
    max_value: 50000
    url: https://posthog.com/startups
    benefits:
      - $50K platform credits valid for 12 months
      - $25K DigitalOcean Hatch credit
      - Exclusive startup merchandise
      - Access to startup spotlights and office hours
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Company age <2 years
      - Funding < $5M
      - Sign-up after January 1, 2023
      - Separate program for YC-affiliated startups
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Sign up for a paid plan
        description: >-
          Register for a PostHog paid plan on a pay-as-you-go basis to qualify
          for the program.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://posthog.com/pricing
      - name: Complete startup application
        description: >-
          Fill out the startup application form to apply for the program credits
          and benefits.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://posthog.com/startups
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for PostHog for Startups?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be less than 2 years old with under $5 million in funding,
      and must sign up after January 1, 2023. Accounts created before this date
      may receive other program benefits but not the credits.
  - question: What does the $50K platform credit cover?
    answer: >-
      The credit can be used for events, session replays, API calls, and survey
      responses over a 12-month period on PostHog's analytics platform.
  - question: How do I claim the DigitalOcean credit?
    answer: >-
      After enrolling in the program, startups can join the DigitalOcean Hatch
      program and cite PostHog as their partner to receive a $25K credit.
  - question: What happens after the 12-month credit period?
    answer: >-
      Startups will transition to standard PostHog plans with continued access
      to community events and support, ensuring a smooth transition.

provider_slug: postmark
title: Postmark Bootstrapper Offer
meta_title: Reliable Email Delivery for Bootstrapped Startups
intro: >-
  Get $75 to help offset email costs with Postmark's reliable transactional
  email delivery, designed specifically for bootstrapped startups.
description: >-
  Postmark's Bootstrapper Offer provides tailored financial assistance for
  self-funded startups. The program includes a $75 account credit to cover email
  costs, high-speed transactional email delivery, developer-first integration
  via API and SMTP, as well as 45 days of email history (extendable to 365 days)
  and a rich library of email templates. Eligible startups must have launched a
  product, be actively charging customers, and operate without external
  investment. Additional technical features include dedicated SMTP endpoints
  across 6 AWS regions, message streams, real-time webhooks, and
  enterprise-grade security with TLS encryption and GDPR compliance.
status: Active
tags:
  - email
url: https://postmarkapp.com/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 75
max_value: 75
community_notes:
  - title: Improved Email Metrics
    body: >-
      Bootstrapped startups report 11% higher open rates and fewer support
      tickets compared to other providers.
    source_url: https://postmarkapp.com/status
tiers:

    intro: >-
      Eligible bootstrapped startups receive a one-time $75 account credit to
      lower email costs along with access to Postmark’s premium transactional
      email features.
    max_value: 75
    url: https://postmarkapp.com/start-free
    benefits:
      - $75 account credit
      - High-speed transactional email delivery
      - Developer-first API and SMTP integration
      - 45 days of email history (extendable to 365 days)
      - Access to a library of email templates
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - One-time credit
    eligibility:
      - Launched product or service
      - Actively charging customers
      - No external funding
    effort_level: 2

        description: >-
          Reach out to Postmark with proof of product traction to verify
          eligibility.
        action: Contact Support
        action_url: https://postmarkapp.com/contact
      - name: Apply for Credit
        description: >-
          Complete the application process to receive API credentials and the
          $75 credit.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://postmarkapp.com/start-free

    answer: >-
      It provides a $75 account credit and access to reliable, high-speed
      transactional email services to help bootstrapped startups lower their
      operational costs.
  - question: Who is eligible for this offer?
    answer: >-
      Startups must have a launched product, be actively charging customers, and
      operate without external funding.
  - question: How do I apply for the credit?
    answer: >-
      Start by contacting Postmark support with proof of your product's traction
      and then complete the application to receive API credentials and the $75
      credit.

provider_slug: pulumi

  early-stage companies streamline cloud infrastructure management while
  minimizing costs. It offers up to $10,000 in Pulumi Credits valid for 12
  months on any Pulumi Cloud plan, multi-language Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
  support using JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, .NET, Java, and Go, and
  exclusive technical support including office hours, guided workshops, and
  pre-built 'Startup in a Box' templates. This program is tailored for
  pre-Series A startups with under $1M in annual revenue.

        TypeScript, Python, .NET, Java, Go)

      revenue and teams of 1-10 members.

      infrastructure over a one-year period.

draft: false
provider_slug: quicknode
title: QuickNode Startup Program
meta_title: QuickNode Startup Program for Blockchain Startups
intro: >-
  QuickNode's Startup Program empowers blockchain startups with exclusive
  product credits, discounts, technical support, and community networking to
  accelerate Web3 innovation.
description: >-
  The QuickNode Startup Program is designed for early-stage blockchain ventures
  seeking comprehensive support in building and scaling their Web3 applications.
  It offers up to $200K in RaaS credits for API usage across 24+ blockchains,
  along with free tiers providing 10M–80M API credits, and partner discounts
  such as $200K AWS credits and $150K Dune Analytics access. In addition to
  infrastructure credits, participants benefit from dedicated technical support
  including one-on-one architecture reviews, priority troubleshooting via Slack,
  and workshops on tokenomics and Web3 security. The program also provides
  growth resources like investor introductions, co-marketing opportunities, and
  networking events. Eligibility is limited to pre-seed to Series A companies
  with less than $5M in funding and building on QuickNode-supported chains, with
  exclusions for existing enterprise customers and startups beyond Series A.
status: Active
tags:
  - blockchain
  - web3
url: https://www.quicknode.com/startup
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 50000
max_value: 200000
community_notes:
  - title: Testimonial from CUBE3 AI
    body: >-
      QuickNode has been instrumental in helping CUBE3.AI's mission to secure
      Web3 builders.
    source_url: https://www.quicknode.com/startup
  - title: Testimonial from Oamo
    body: >-
      QuickNode enabled us to handle major traffic during our launch, providing
      one of the most stable layers at a reasonable cost.
    source_url: https://www.quicknode.com/startup
  - title: Testimonial from Lore
    body: >-
      QuickNode has been a phenomenal partner by offering reliable RPC
      infrastructure to keep indexers in sync.
    source_url: https://www.quicknode.com/startup
tiers:
  - name: QuickNode Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Provides blockchain startups with comprehensive credits, technical
      support, and growth resources, including RaaS credits and partner
      discounts.
    max_value: 200000
    url: https://www.quicknode.com/startup
    benefits:
      - Up to $200K in RaaS credits for API usage across 24+ blockchains
      - 10M–80M API credits through free QuickNode tiers
      - >-
        Partner discounts including $200K AWS credits and $150K Dune Analytics
        access
      - >-
        1:1 architecture reviews and priority troubleshooting via dedicated
        Slack channels
      - >-
        Access to investor introductions, workshops, and co-marketing
        opportunities
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - Flexible usage period until credits are fully utilized
    eligibility:
      - Pre-seed to Series A companies with less than $5M in funding
      - Teams building on one or more QuickNode-supported chains
      - >-
        New startups; previous credit users and existing enterprise customers
        are not eligible
    effort_level: 2

      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Apply through the QuickNode Startup Portal with your pitch deck and
          technical roadmap.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.quicknode.com/startup
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible for the QuickNode Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      It is designed for pre-seed to Series A blockchain startups with less than
      $5M in funding and building on QuickNode-supported chains. Existing
      enterprise customers and post-Series A startups are not eligible.
  - question: What benefits does the program offer?
    answer: >-
      Participants receive up to $200K in RaaS credits, free tiers with 10M–80M
      API credits, partner discounts, dedicated technical support, and growth
      resources such as investor introductions and co-marketing opportunities.
  - question: How quickly can approved startups begin using their credits?
    answer: >-
      Approved teams typically get activated within 72 hours after applying
      through the QuickNode Startup Portal.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/reclaim/reclaim-startup-discount-program.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: reclaim
title: Reclaim Startup Discount Program
meta_title: 20% Off Reclaim Plans for Startups
intro: >-
  Eligible startups receive 20% off any paid Reclaim plan (Starter and Business)
  for 3 years, providing long-term cost savings and enhanced team scheduling.
description: >-
  Reclaim.ai offers a startup discount program that provides a 20% discount on
  paid Reclaim plans for 3 consecutive years. This offer applies to both monthly
  and annual subscriptions for Starter and Business plans, while Enterprise
  plans are excluded and require separate negotiation. Eligible startups must
  have a minimum of 2 user seats, be under 100 employees, have raised less than
  $10M, and be founded within the last 5 years. Additionally, startups must
  enable domain capture so that all employees auto-join their Reclaim team. The
  application process involves submitting eligibility documentation via the
  Startup Program application page, with responses typically provided within 2
  business days.
status: Active
tags:
  - scheduling
  - productivity
  - collaboration
  - project management
  - ai
url: https://reclaim.ai/pricing/startup-discount
value_type: discount
max_value: 20
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Startup Discount Tier
    intro: >-
      Provides a flat 20% discount on Reclaim's Starter and Business plans for 3
      years.
    max_value: 20
    url: https://reclaim.ai/pricing/startup-discount
    benefits:
      - 20% off on paid plans for 3 years
      - Applies to both monthly and annual subscriptions
      - Discount extends to all current and new team members
      - Long-term cost savings
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 3 years
    eligibility:
      - Minimum 2 user seats
      - Under 100 employees
      - Raised less than $10M
      - Founded within last 5 years
      - Must enable domain capture for automatic team enrollment
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Visit Application Page
        description: >-
          Navigate to the Reclaim Startup Program application page to begin your
          application.
        action: Visit
        action_url: https://reclaim.ai/pricing/startup-discount
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the application form with documentation verifying eligibility
          criteria and submit it.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://reclaim.ai/pricing/startup-discount
faq:
  - question: What are the eligibility requirements?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups must have at least 2 user seats, be under 100 employees,
      have raised less than $10M, and be founded within the last 5 years.
      Additionally, domain capture must be enabled to auto-add team members.
  - question: How do I apply for the discount program?
    answer: >-
      Startups can apply by visiting the Startup Program application page,
      submitting the required eligibility documentation, and waiting for the
      review response, which is typically provided within 2 business days.
  - question: Does the discount apply to existing subscriptions?
    answer: >-
      Yes, both new and existing Reclaim users are eligible. Once the discount
      code is applied, it covers all current and future team members on the
      account for 3 years.

provider_slug: redis
title: Redis Startup Program
meta_title: Scale Your Startup Faster
intro: >-
  The program offers early-stage startups free Redis Cloud access for 12 months
  along with technical support, early feature access, and go-to-market
  opportunities to build fast, real-time applications.
description: >-
  Redis for Startups is a comprehensive program designed to help early-stage
  companies build and scale real-time applications using Redis' high-performance
  data platform. It provides free Redis Cloud access for 12 months with usage
  limits, $10,000 in Redis credits, and accelerated development resources
  including pre-configured templates and hands-on workshops. Additionally, the
  program offers dedicated technical support with monthly expert office hours,
  co-marketing opportunities, and access to a broad partner network including VC
  introductions and cloud provider partnerships. The program is structured in
  phases – Discovery, Scale, and Growth – to optimize architecture, performance
  tuning, and enterprise readiness, ensuring that startups can leverage Redis to
  achieve significant performance improvements and cost reductions.
status: Active
tags:
  - database

      at scale.
    source_url: https://redis.com/customer-stories#docugami

      Flowdesk processes 1 million daily orders with low latency and zero
      downtime using Redis.
    source_url: https://redis.com/customer-stories#flowdesk
tiers:

      $10,000 in credits, early access to new features, comprehensive technical
      support, and growth opportunities through co-marketing and networking.
    max_value: 10000
    url: https://redis.com/startup-program

      - Priority early access to new Redis features and products
      - Dedicated customer support with monthly expert office hours
      - $10,000 in Redis credits for qualifying startups
      - Co-marketing and networking opportunities
    benefits_level: 3

      - 12 months

faq:
