    answer: >-
      It provides early-stage startups with free Redis Cloud access for 12
      months, $10,000 in Redis credits, dedicated technical support, early
      feature access, and co-marketing opportunities to scale their
      applications.
  - question: Who is eligible for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be privately-held, have less than $5M in funding, and be
      focused on building real-time applications using Redis' core capabilities.
  - question: How long does the program last and what is the application process?
    answer: >-
      The program runs for 12 months and is structured in phases including
      Discovery, Scale, and Growth. Applications are reviewed within 7-10
      business days through the Redis partner portal.

provider_slug: remote
title: Remote For Startups Program
meta_title: Global HR & Payroll Solutions for Startups
intro: >-
  Remote enables startups to streamline international hiring, compliance, and
  payroll management through its tailored Remote For Startups Program, allowing
  them to focus on growth and innovation.
description: >-
  Remote’s For Startups program offers comprehensive global HR solutions
  designed to simplify international hiring, legal compliance, and payroll
  management. The program provides a 15% discount on all Remote services for
  eligible startups, with an additional 5% discount available for those whose
  investors or partners join Remote’s partner network, bringing the total
  discount up to 20%. It features full legal compliance in over 85 countries,
  automated tax withholding and benefits administration, expert guidance on
  equity and stock options, and scalable tools for contract management and
  employee onboarding.
status: Active
tags:
  - hr
  - compliance
  - payroll
url: https://remote.com/for-startups
value_type: discount
currency: USD
min_value: 15
max_value: 20
community_notes:

    body: >-
      Detailed information on program benefits, eligibility, and the application
      process is available on Remote's official website.
    source_url: https://remote.com/for-startups
tiers:
  - name: 15% Discount Tier
    intro: >-
      Eligible startups with pre-seed, seed, or Series A funding receive a 15%
      discount on all Remote services for 12 months using promo code RFS15OFF.
    max_value: 15
    url: https://remote.com/for-startups
    benefits:
      - 15% discount on Remote services
      - Access to a comprehensive global HR platform
      - Streamlined international hiring and compliance support
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Startups with pre-seed, seed, or Series A funding
      - Companies must be pre-Series C
      - Must meet Remote’s partnership criteria
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Apply via Remote’s website with proof of funding.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://remote.com/for-startups
      - name: Enter Promo Code
        description: >-
          Use the promo code RFS15OFF during the application to receive the
          discount.
        action: Apply Promo Code
        action_url: https://remote.com/for-startups
  - name: Partner Discount Tier
    intro: >-
      For startups whose investors or partners join Remote's partner network, an
      additional 5% discount is applied, totaling up to 20% off on Remote
      services.
    max_value: 20
    url: https://remote.com/for-startups
    benefits:
      - Up to 20% total discount on Remote services
      - Enhanced global HR support
      - Access to premium partner network benefits
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Startups with pre-seed, seed, or Series A funding
      - Companies must be pre-Series C
      - Investors or partners must join Remote’s partner network
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Apply via Remote’s website with proof of funding and partner
          affiliation.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://remote.com/for-startups
faq:
  - question: How long is the discount valid?
    answer: >-
      The 15% discount applies for 12 months and is available on both monthly
      and annual payment plans.
  - question: Does company location affect eligibility?
    answer: >-
      No, startups worldwide can join provided they meet the funding
      requirements.
  - question: Can post-Series A startups qualify?
    answer: >-
      Yes, though discounts beyond Series A depend on partnership status. Remote
      offers custom pricing for later-stage companies.
  - question: How can I apply?
    answer: >-
      Submit an application via Remote’s website with proof of funding and use
      the promo code RFS15OFF to secure your discount.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/retool/retool-for-startups.yaml
================
draft: false
provider_slug: retool
title: Retool for Startups
meta_title: Retool for Startups Program
intro: >-
  Retool for Startups offers early-stage companies free access to Retool’s
  platform for 12 months, empowering them to automate manual tasks, build custom
  internal tools, and create customer portals while unlocking over $200,000 in
  partner deals.
description: >-
  Retool’s Startup Program provides a comprehensive package for early-stage
  startups by offering a 100% off coupon for one year on monthly Team or
  Business plans. Eligible startups—those bootstrapped, angel-funded,
  debt-funded, pre-seed, seed, or Series A with less than $10M raised and
  founded within the last 10 years—must upgrade their plan and apply. Upon
  approval, the discount is automatically applied to the first invoice. In
  addition to free access, participants gain access to significant partner deals
  including credits and discounts from AWS, Brex, Twilio Segment, Zendesk, and
  DigitalOcean. After the free period, a 25% discount is offered for continued
  access.
status: Active
tags:
  - dev tools
  - database
  - ai
  - workflow
  - low-code
url: https://retool.com/startups
value_type: discount
min_value: 25
max_value: 100
community_notes:
  - title: Partner Deals Highlight
    body: >-
      The program offers over $200,000 in partner deals, including benefits from
      AWS, Brex, Twilio Segment, Zendesk, and DigitalOcean.
    source_url: https://retool.com/startups
tiers:
  - name: Free Access
    intro: >-
      Eligible startups receive a 100% off coupon for one year on Retool's
      monthly Team or Business plan, enabling them to automate processes and
      build custom tools.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://retool.com/startups
    benefits:
      - 100% off for 12 months
      - Automate manual tasks with custom internal tools
      - Build customer portals
      - Access to over $200,000 in partner deals
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Bootstrapped, angel-funded, debt-funded, pre-seed, seed, or Series A
      - Raised less than $10M in total funding
      - Founded within the last 10 years
      - New customers on the monthly Team or Business plan
      - Offer cannot be combined with other discounts
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Upgrade Account
        description: >-
          Upgrade to the appropriate monthly Team or Business plan with a valid
          payment method.
        action: Upgrade
        action_url: https://retool.com/startups
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the Startup Program Application form to claim the free access
          offer.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://retool.typeform.com/to/qGcaOOHW
  - name: Extended Discount
    intro: >-
      After the free period, startups receive a 25% discount on the subscription
      to continue accessing Retool’s platform.
    max_value: 25
    url: https://retool.com/startups
    benefits:
      - 25% discount on second-year subscription
      - Continued access to Retool's platform
      - Ongoing support
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Must have participated in the initial free access program
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply: []
faq:
  - question: Who is eligible?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups include those that are bootstrapped, angel-funded,
      debt-funded, pre-seed, seed, or Series A, having raised less than $10M in
      total funding, founded within the last 10 years, and who are new customers
      on the monthly Team or Business plan.
  - question: How does it work?
    answer: >-
      Startups receive a 100% off coupon for one year after upgrading their plan
      and submitting an application. Upon approval, the discount is applied to
      the first invoice, and a 25% discount is offered the following year.
  - question: Will the offer expire?
    answer: >-
      Yes, the 100% off discount expires after one year, though a 25% discount
      is available for the subsequent year.
  - question: Am I eligible if I'm already a Retool customer?
    answer: >-
      No, the program is exclusively for new customers on the monthly Team or
      Business plan.
  - question: How do I become a Retool for Startups partner?
    answer: >-
      Interested partners should contact startups@retool.com to inquire about
      adding Retool to their deal book.

      and early feature access.

      affiliation and describe their TTS use case. Credits are applied within 5
      business days upon approval.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/scalegrid/scalegrid-startup-program.yaml

draft: false
provider_slug: scalegrid
title: ScaleGrid Startup Program
meta_title: 50% Off Managed Database Hosting for Startups
intro: >-
  Get started with the ScaleGrid Startup Program and enjoy a 50% discount on
  fully managed, BYOC hosting plans for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis™, and MongoDB
  for 12 months.
description: >-
  ScaleGrid's Startup Program delivers substantial cost-saving benefits for
  early-stage companies by offering a 50% discount on Bring Your Own Cloud
  (BYOC) hosting plans. Designed for startups new to ScaleGrid with revenue and
  funding below $1.5M, the program supports major databases across multiple
  cloud providers, including AWS, Azure, GCP, Digital Ocean, OCI, and Linode.
  Start with a free 7-day trial, set up your cloud account, create your BYOC
  database cluster, and activate your discount, allowing you to focus on growth
  and innovation without the burden of managing database infrastructure.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - database
  - hosting
  - serverless
url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
value_type: discount
min_value: 50
max_value: 50
community_notes:
  - title: Potential Cost Savings
    body: >-
      Eligible startups can save up to $50,000 over 12 months by leveraging a
      50% discount on ScaleGrid's managed hosting BYOC plans.
    source_url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
tiers:
  - name: ScaleGrid Startup Tier
    intro: >-
      Startups receive a 50% discount on medium or larger BYOC hosting plans
      applicable for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis™, and MongoDB.
    max_value: 50
    url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
    benefits:
      - 50% discount on managed BYOC hosting plans
      - Applicable for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis™, and MongoDB
      - Includes a free 7-day trial
      - >-
        Eligibility for startups new to ScaleGrid with revenue and funding under
        $1.5M
      - Utilize existing cloud credits with multiple providers
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Must be new to ScaleGrid
      - Generated less than $1.5M in revenue
      - Raised less than $1.5M in investment
      - "Eligible plan size: Medium or larger"
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Start Free Trial
        description: Begin with a free 7-day trial to evaluate the service.
        action: Start Trial
        action_url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
      - name: Create Cloud Profile
        description: >-
          Connect your cloud account via AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI, Digital Ocean, or
          Linode.
        action: Setup Cloud
        action_url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
      - name: Create Database Cluster
        description: Set up your BYOC cluster for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis™, or MongoDB.
        action: Create Cluster
        action_url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
      - name: Activate Discount
        description: >-
          Click 'Activate' and enter your credit card details to secure the 50%
          discount for 12 months.
        action: Activate
        action_url: https://scalegrid.com/startup-program
faq:
  - question: Why should I use ScaleGrid vs. managing my databases internally?
    answer: >-
      ScaleGrid allows startups to keep their development teams focused on
      product by automating time-consuming database management tasks and
      eliminating the need for costly database experts.
  - question: Can I use my free startup hosting credits?
    answer: >-
      Yes, startups can utilize their free AWS, Azure, GCP, or OCI credits when
      using ScaleGrid's BYOC plans.
  - question: Can I get a discount on more than one database type?
    answer: >-
      Yes, the 50% discount applies to all eligible BYOC clusters, provided they
      are set up under the Startup Program.
  - question: Do I have to be a part of an accelerator or incubator program to apply?
    answer: >-
      No, the only eligibility requirements are being new to ScaleGrid and
      having generated less than $1.5M in revenue and raised less than $1.5M in
      investment.
  - question: How much will ScaleGrid cost?
    answer: >-
      The cost is based on your selected plan's data size and replica setup,
      with a 50% discount applied on eligible BYOC plans.
  - question: How do I get started with the Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      Apply on the Startup Program page and follow the steps to begin the free
      trial, connect your cloud account, and create your database cluster.

        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://www.scaleway.com/en/startup-program/"
  - name: "Early Stage"
    intro: "Six-month program for pre-seed to seed stage startups"
    max_value: 9000
    url: "https://www.scaleway.com/en/startup-program/"
    benefits:
      - "€9,000 credits over 6 months"
      - "Infrastructure optimization guidance"
      - "Customer Success Manager support"
      - "Eligibility for case studies and webinars"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration: ["6 months"]
    eligibility:
      - "Pre-seed to seed stage"
      - "Registered startup"
    effort_level: 2

  - name: "Growth Stage"
    intro: "For scaling startups from seed to series A"
    max_value: 36000
    url: "https://www.scaleway.com/en/startup-program/"
    benefits:
      - "€36,000 annual credits"
      - "24/7 technical support"
      - "Partner offers (€250k+ value)"
      - "Trade show access and beta product early access"
      - "Technical masterclasses and startup events"
    benefits_level: 3
    duration: ["1 year"]
    eligibility:
      - "Seed to Series A"
      - "Scaling infrastructure needs"
    effort_level: 2

faq:
  - question: "What is the Scaleway Startup Program?"
    answer: "A time-limited cloud partnership program providing infrastructure credits and technical assistance. Participants leverage Scaleway's public cloud infrastructure along with advisory resources and community support."
  - question: "Who can apply to the program?"
    answer: "Scaleway accepts applications from startups at any stage. The admission committee prioritizes projects demonstrating innovative use of cloud infrastructure."
  - question: "How long does the program last?"
    answer: "The program end date is scheduled exactly 6 or 12 months after Scaleway invites you in, depending on your stage. For instance, if you submit your application before June 15th and get selected, then the Program runs from July 1st to January 1st or June 30th of the following year. Periodically, they will sit together with you and review your consumption and plan all necessary adjustments ahead of time."
  - question: "How can I benefit most from the program?"
    answer: "Beyond cloud credits, Scaleway provides architecture guidance from their technical engineers, access to a global startup community, and visibility opportunities through case studies and events."
  - question: "Are there any costs to join?"
    answer: "No participation fees. Scaleway covers the cloud credits, with users responsible only for usage beyond allocated credits."
  - question: "Where can I get more information?"
    answer: "Interested startups should contact Scaleway's program team at startup-program@scaleway.com."

provider_slug: scraperapi
title: ScraperAPI Free Plan and Trial

intro: >-
  ScraperAPI offers a comprehensive free plan and trial designed for testing and
  small-scale web scraping projects.
description: >-
  The program includes a 7-day trial that provides 5,000 API credits with full
  access to features such as geotargeting, JS rendering, proxy rotation, and
  CAPTCHA handling, all without requiring a credit card. After the trial, users
  benefit from a permanent free tier offering 1,000 API credits monthly with up
  to 5 concurrent connections. Email support and detailed usage metrics are
  available during the trial period, with options to request additional credits
  for testing via support.

  - scraping
  - api
  - free trial

      including geotargeting, JS rendering, proxy rotation, and CAPTCHA
      handling.

      of 5 connections for small-scale web scraping projects.

      ScraperAPI support for assistance.

provider_slug: segment
title: Twilio Segment Startup Program
meta_title: Twilio Segment Startup Program - Free Analytics Credits & Resources
intro: >-
  Early-stage startups gain free access to Segment for up to two years,
  including up to $50,000 in credits, additional partner software deals, and
  comprehensive educational resources.
description: >-
  The Twilio Segment Startup Program equips early-stage startups with a robust
  analytics platform to accelerate growth and achieve product-market fit. The
  program offers up to $50,000 in credits on Segment's Team Plan for two years,
  over $1 million in additional partner credits for integrations with tools like
  AWS, Google Analytics, Amplitude, and Intercom, as well as access to Segment
  University, Analytics Academy, and priority support. Eligibility requires
  startups to be less than 24 months old, with under $5 million in total funding
  and not currently under a Segment sales contract. After the initial two-year
  period, qualifying startups can benefit from a 50% discount in the third year
  and a 25% discount in the fourth year.

      10x loan volume growth and saving borrowers over $100M.
    source_url: https://segment.com/startups/earnest
  - title: Retool Case Study
    body: >-
      Retool saved over 1,000 engineering hours through streamlined integrations
      using Segment.
    source_url: https://segment.com/startups/retool

    max_value: 50000

    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 2 years

      - Incorporated less than 24 months ago

    max_value: 50

faq:
  - question: What is the Twilio Segment Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      It is a program that offers early-stage startups free access to Segment
      for up to two years, including up to $50,000 in credits, additional
      partner credits, and comprehensive educational resources to drive
      product-market fit.
  - question: Who is eligible to apply?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be incorporated less than 24 months ago, have raised less
      than $5 million in total funding, and not be under an existing Segment
      sales contract or using competing discounts.
  - question: How do I apply?
    answer: >-
      Applications can be submitted through the Segment website or partner
      platforms like Gust Launch, Blockchain Founders Group, or Inc42. Approval
      typically takes 1–2 weeks.
  - question: What benefits are available after the initial two years?
    answer: >-
      Qualifying startups receive a 50% discount in the third year and 25% off
      in the fourth year on Segment's services.

provider_slug: sentry
title: Sentry Startup Program

  discounts for eligible companies.
description: >-
  Sentry's Startup Program supports early-stage companies by offering discounted
  plans and sponsorships. Eligible startups qualify if they are not using
  Sentry, are using Sentry's open-source/self-hosted product, or are on a
  free/developer plan without previous paid usage. Benefits may include up to 6
  months free access on the Teams plan (valued at $29/user/month), custom
  pricing based on usage needs, and priority consideration for extended
  partnerships. For startups requiring advanced monitoring, paid plans starting
  at $26/month come with a 10% annual discount. All participants must adhere to
  Sentry's terms of service, and approval is granted at Sentry's discretion.

      Eligible startups must either not be using Sentry, use the
      open-source/self-hosted version, or be on a free/developer plan without
      previous paid usage. Applicants must also comply with Sentry's terms of
      service.

      startups may receive benefits such as 6 months free access and a 10%
      annual discount on paid plans.

faq:

    answer: >-
      For just $1/month for three months, you get full access to Shopify's platform including
      store setup, customizable templates, inventory management, and multi-channel selling tools.
  - question: Can I sell products during the promotional period?
    answer: >-
      Yes, unlike the free trial, the $1/month offer allows you to fully set up your store
      and process orders right away.
  - question: How do I cancel after the promotional period?
    answer: >-
      Navigate to Settings > Plan and permissions > Cancel subscription before the
      promotional period ends to avoid full-price charges. Data is retained for 90 days
      post-cancellation.
  - question: Can I use my own domain name?
    answer: Yes, users can connect an existing domain or purchase one through Shopify.
  - question: Do I need technical skills?
    answer: >-
      No, Shopify's prebuilt themes and drag-and-drop builder require no coding
      or design expertise.

draft: false
provider_slug: shotstack
title: Shotstack Startup Program
meta_title: Build Your Startup with Shotstack
intro: >-
  Empower your startup with Shotstack's advanced video editing API. Qualifying
  startups receive an 80% discount on Professional plans and $5,000 in credits
  for 12 months, along with robust developer support and access to a global
  community.
description: >-
  The Shotstack Startup Program helps early-stage startups integrate scalable,
  cloud-based video editing capabilities into their applications. Using
  Shotstack Studio—a full-featured browser-based video editor—and a powerful API
  that supports dynamic merge fields and JSON-based workflows, startups can
  create, launch, and scale innovative video products rapidly. The program
  offers an 80% discount on Professional plans and adds $5,000 in credits to
  offset monthly usage, valid for 12 months. Eligibility requires startups to be
  incorporated for less than 3 years and to have raised up to Series A funding.
status: Active
tags:
  - media
  - ai
url: https://shotstack.io/startup
value_type: discount
currency: USD
max_value: 80
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Shotstack Startup Offer
    intro: >-
      Qualifying early-stage startups receive an 80% discount on Professional
      plans and $5,000 in credits for 12 months, with full developer support and
      community access.
    max_value: 80
    url: https://shotstack.io/startup
    benefits:
      - 80% discount on Professional plans for 12 months
      - $5,000 in Shotstack credits applied to monthly bills
      - Access to a full-featured browser-based video editor (Shotstack Studio)
      - >-
        Extensive developer support including documentation, tutorials, and
        sample code
      - Join a community of 10,000+ developers and 20,000+ businesses
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - Incorporated less than 3 years ago
      - Up to Series A funding
      - Not direct competitors of Shotstack
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: >-
          Fill out the Shotstack Startup Program application form to receive the
          discount and credits.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://shotstack.io/startup
faq:
  - question: How do I redeem the Shotstack credits?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups can apply for the program by submitting the application
      form. Once approved, $5,000 in Shotstack credits will be added to the
      fixed plan account.
  - question: How are the Shotstack credits applied?
    answer: >-
      The credits are applied to the monthly bill, covering up to $5,000 in
      total usage.
  - question: Where can I see my credits applied?
    answer: The credits will appear on the monthly billing statement.
  - question: When do my Shotstack credits expire?
    answer: Credits are valid for one year from the activation date.
  - question: What happens if I go over my credit limit?
    answer: Any usage beyond the $5,000 credit limit will be billed at standard rates.
  - question: >-
      How do I know if my accelerator/incubator/VC firm is already partnered
      with Shotstack?
    answer: >-
      Check with your investor or accelerator for partnership status. They can
      also apply to become a partner if not already affiliated.
  - question: How does doubling your Shotstack credits work?
    answer: >-
      If your partner (VC/accelerator) gets approved as a Shotstack partner, you
      can email the team to receive an additional $5,000 in credits.
  - question: Is this program only for new Shotstack customers?
    answer: Yes, the program is exclusively for new Shotstack customers.

draft: false
provider_slug: squarespace
title: Free Google Workspace Business Starter Offer
meta_title: Free Year of Google Workspace Business Starter Plan – Squarespace
intro: >-
  Squarespace offers a free year of the Google Workspace Business Starter plan
  for eligible users, providing professional email, collaboration tools, and
  cloud storage.
description: >-
  This program provides eligible Squarespace users with one free custom email
  address under the Google Workspace Business Starter plan for 12 months. The
  offer is available to users on eligible Squarespace plans (Core, Plus,
  Advanced, Business, Commerce Basic, or Commerce Advanced) and excludes Mobile
  start and Personal website plans. Eligibility is confirmed via the Google
  Workspace panel where a 'Free Google Workspace Inbox' indicator appears. After
  the free year, the plan renews at standard rates ($6/month for annual billing
  or $8.40/month for monthly billing) unless auto-renew is disabled. Additional
  users may be added at full price. Users should follow the guided steps in
  their Squarespace dashboard to upgrade their plan and sign up for the offer.
status: Active
tags:
  - email
  - productivity
  - collaboration
url: >-
  https://support.squarespace.com/hc/en-us/articles/206537337-Free-Google-Workspace-offer
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 72
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Business Starter
    intro: >-
      Receive one free custom email address with Google Workspace Business
      Starter features for 12 months.
    max_value: 72
    url: >-
      https://support.squarespace.com/hc/en-us/articles/206537337-Free-Google-Workspace-offer
    benefits:
      - One free custom email address
      - Access to professional email and collaboration tools
      - Includes 30 GB cloud storage and spam protection
      - Admin controls via Google Admin Console
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 12 months
    eligibility:
      - >-
        Squarespace plans: Core, Plus, Advanced, Business, Commerce Basic, or
        Commerce Advanced
      - Domain must be hosted or connected via Squarespace
      - >-
        Not eligible if previously linked to Google Workspace or on
        Mobile/Personal plans
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Check Eligibility
        description: >-
          Confirm your website is on an eligible Squarespace plan and verify the
          'Free Google Workspace Inbox' appears in the checkout.
        action: Review Requirements
        action_url: >-
          https://support.squarespace.com/hc/en-us/articles/206537337-Free-Google-Workspace-offer
      - name: Sign Up
        description: >-
          Navigate to Settings → Google Workspace, select the Business Starter
          plan with your preferred billing cycle, and complete the signup
          process.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: >-
          https://support.squarespace.com/hc/en-us/articles/206537337-Free-Google-Workspace-offer
faq:
  - question: What happens after the free year?
    answer: >-
      After the first year, the account renews at standard rates ($6/month for
      annual billing or $8.40/month for monthly billing) unless auto-renew is
      disabled.
  - question: How do I check if I'm eligible?
    answer: >-
      Eligibility can be confirmed in the Squarespace dashboard by checking the
      Google Workspace panel for the 'Free Google Workspace Inbox' indicator.
  - question: Can additional users be added?
    answer: >-
      The offer includes one free email address per website; additional users
      are charged at the full price.

  approved founders through the Perks tab on the Atlas Dashboard. The program
  aggregates offers from industry-leading providers, including free processing,
  cashback bonuses, cloud credits, and discounted productivity tools. Each
  partner may have its own eligibility criteria or compliance requirements, and
  offers are subject to change. This comprehensive program empowers startups
  with the tools needed to scale without incurring upfront equity costs.
status: Active
tags: []

faq:
  - question: How do I access perks?
    answer: >-
      All approved founders can access partner offers through the Perks tab on
      the Atlas Dashboard once their Atlas application is approved.
  - question: Are offers guaranteed?
    answer: >-
      Offers are subject to partner compliance checks and may vary, as each
      partner has its own eligibility or compliance requirements.
  - question: Do credits or discounts expire?
    answer: >-
      Many offers have specific activation periods and expiration windows,
      typically ranging from 12 to 24 months from the activation date.
  - question: Can I combine these offers with other discounts?
    answer: >-
      Offer terms vary by partner, so founders should review individual offer
      details available on the Atlas Dashboard.

draft: false
provider_slug: stytch
title: Stytch Startup Program
meta_title: Stytch Startup Program - Free Authentication for Startups
intro: >-
  Venture-backed startups get free, unlimited access to Stytch’s authentication
  and fraud prevention platform until they reach Series A funding or three years
  post-incorporation.
description: >-
  The Stytch Startup Program offers venture-backed startups free access to
  Stytch’s complete platform for authentication, authorization, and fraud
  prevention until Series A funding or three years post-incorporation, whichever
  comes first. It includes full access to B2B and B2C auth tools—featuring
  custom email domains, full HTML email control, SMS provider failover,
  unlimited monthly active users (MAUs), unlimited organizations, and
  enterprise-level SSO/SCIM integrations—along with developer support via Slack
  and email. After reaching the milestone, startups transition to Stytch’s
  transparent, usage-based pricing model.
status: Active
tags:
  - dev tools
  - enterprise
  - api
  - saas
url: https://stytch.com/credits
value_type: discount
currency: USD
max_value: 100
min_value: 100
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Stytch Startup Program
    intro: >-
      Provides venture-backed startups unlimited access to the complete
      authentication and fraud prevention platform until Series A funding or
      three years post-incorporation.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://stytch.com/credits
    benefits:
      - Complete access to B2B and B2C authentication tools
      - Unlimited MAUs and organizations
      - Enterprise SSO/SCIM integrations
      - Developer support via Slack and email
      - >-
        Custom email domains and full HTML email control with SMS provider
        failover
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - Until Series A funding or 3 years post-incorporation
    eligibility:
      - Venture-backed startups
      - Have not raised a Series A funding round
      - Incorporated ≤3 years ago
      - Not an existing enterprise contracted customer
      - No prior redemption of a startup deal
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit Application
        description: Visit the Stytch credits page and complete the application form.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://stytch.com/credits
faq:
  - question: What’s included in the Stytch Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      The program offers free access to the complete Stytch authentication and
      fraud prevention platform, including B2B and B2C auth tools, custom email
      domains, full HTML email control, SMS provider failover, unlimited MAUs,
      unlimited organizations, and enterprise SSO/SCIM integrations.
  - question: Is developer support included?
    answer: >-
      Yes, participants receive developer support via Slack and email to help
      with technical questions and implementation.
  - question: Is device fingerprinting part of the program?
    answer: >-
      Yes, device fingerprinting is included as part of the advanced security
      features alongside MFA, SSO, and RBAC.
  - question: How does billing work after Series A or three years?
    answer: >-
      After reaching Series A funding or three years post-incorporation,
      startups transition to Stytch’s transparent, usage-based pricing model.
  - question: How do I apply to the Stytch Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      Visit the Stytch credits page at https://stytch.com/credits and complete
      the application form. For any questions, contact startups@stytch.com.

provider_slug: synadia
title: Synadia Free Trial
meta_title: 60-Day Free Trial of Synadia Platform
intro: >-
  The Synadia Evaluation Agreement provides a 60-day trial of the Synadia
  Platform for internal evaluation purposes.
description: >-
  This evaluation program offers free access to the Synadia Platform, enabling
  organizations to test enterprise messaging capabilities including high
  availability, extended protocol support, and pre-release features.
  Participants can evaluate the platform without any financial commitment while
  providing direct feedback that helps shape its future development. The trial
  is governed by strict confidentiality and usage restrictions as detailed in
  the evaluation agreement.
status: Active
tags:
  - free trial
  - kubernetes
  - dev tools
url: https://synadia.com/evaluation
value_type: discount
max_value: 100

    body: >-
      Historical data indicates 200% YoY adoption growth among trial
      participants converting to paid services.
    source_url: https://synadia.com/press

      Gain 60-day access to the full Synadia Platform for internal evaluation
      with enterprise-grade messaging capabilities.
    max_value: 100
    url: https://synadia.com/evaluation
    benefits:
      - >-
        Enterprise Features Access including high availability and extended
        protocol support
      - No financial commitment with a free trial period
      - Direct product feedback opportunities to shape future development
      - >-
        Strict confidentiality and usage restrictions to protect intellectual
        property
    benefits_level: 1

      - 60 days
    eligibility:
      - Must be an authorized organizational representative
      - For internal evaluation purposes only
      - Must comply with U.S. export control and anti-corruption laws
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:

        description: >-
          Review and consent to the evaluation agreement terms to activate the
          trial.
        action: I Accept
        action_url: https://synadia.com/evaluation
      - name: Start Free Trial
        description: Click the free trial button to begin your 60-day evaluation period.
        action: Start Trial
        action_url: https://synadia.com/evaluation
faq:
  - question: Can trial configurations migrate to production?
    answer: >-
      No, trial configurations cannot be migrated to production; a separate
      commercial agreement is required.
  - question: Is benchmarking data shareable?
    answer: >-
      All performance data during the trial is considered Confidential
      Information and must not be shared without written consent.
  - question: Are third-party integrations permitted?
    answer: >-
      Third-party integrations require prior authorization from Synadia, and
      unauthorized integrations may void liability protections.
  - question: What happens to custom developments during the trial?
    answer: >-
      All intellectual property rights for any custom developments created
      during the trial automatically vest in Synadia.

File: /Users/xi/Desktop/github/cloudcredits.io/src/content/programs/temporal/temporal-cloud-for-startups.yaml
================
provider_slug: "temporal"
title: "Temporal Cloud for Startups"
meta_title: "Durable execution platform for startups"
intro: "This startup program offers $6,000 in free Temporal Cloud credits to startups with less than $30M in funding."
description: "Temporal provides a reliable and code-centric platform for building and running distributed applications. Startups in the program receive $6,000 in credits, dedicated onboarding and design review assistance, plus ongoing support for production readiness and performance tuning. By offloading complex error-handling logic to Temporal, teams can focus on delivering core business value and ship faster with peace of mind."
status: "Active"
tags:
  - "dev tools"
url: "https://www.temporal.io/startups"
value_type: "credits"
currency: "USD"
min_value: 0
max_value: 6000
community_notes: []

tiers:
  - name: "Startup Program"
    intro: "Single-tier program providing $6,000 in free credits for startups with less than $30M in funding."
    max_value: 6000
    url: "https://www.temporal.io/startups"
    benefits:
      - "$6,000 in free Temporal Cloud credits"
      - "Full access to the Temporal Cloud platform"
      - "Expert onboarding & design reviews"
      - "Production readiness & worker tuning guidance"
      - "Best practices from distributed systems experts"
    benefits_level: 2
    duration:
      - "Up to 10-12 months usage (typical)"
    eligibility:
      - "Raised $30M or less in funding"
      - "Not currently using Temporal Cloud"
    effort_level: 1
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: "Create Temporal Cloud Account"
        description: "Sign up for a free account to get started"
        action: "Sign Up"
        action_url: "https://cloud.temporal.io"
      - name: "Submit Startup Program Application"
        description: "Complete the form to request your $6,000 credits"
        action: "Apply Now"
        action_url: "https://www.temporal.io/startups"

faq:
  - question: "Who is eligible for Temporal Cloud for Startups?"
    answer: "Startups that have raised $30M or less in funding and are not currently using Temporal Cloud."
  - question: "How do I apply for the program?"
    answer: "Apply to join the Startup Program via the provided link and set up your Temporal Cloud account."
  - question: "What happens when I get approved for the program?"
    answer: "Temporal will credit your account with $6,000 and reach out to set up an onboarding and welcome call."
  - question: "How much usage will $6,000 provide for my application?"
    answer: "It depends on your use case, but $6,000 of credits could provide up to 10-12 months of usage."
  - question: "What happens when I use all my credits?"
    answer: "Once you consume all your credits, Temporal will begin billing for your monthly usage and services."
  - question: "Can I migrate if I'm already using Temporal (self-hosted)?"
    answer: "Absolutely! Just mention it in your initial call, and the team will assist with migration."
  - question: "Can I transfer these credits to another company?"
    answer: "No, credits are non-transferable. Other companies should apply directly for their own credits."
  - question: "I'm part of an educational institution. Can I apply for the program?"
    answer: "Yes. Temporal supports educators, faculty, and researchers at accredited institutions. Reach out at incubator@temporal.io."
  - question: "Am I eligible if I'm already using Temporal Cloud?"
    answer: "No, the program is only open to new Temporal Cloud users who meet the funding requirement."
  - question: "I have more questions; who should I talk to?"
    answer: "Send any additional questions to incubator@temporal.io."

draft: false
provider_slug: tencent
title: Tencent Cloud Startup Program
meta_title: Cloud Support and Credits for Startups
intro: >-
  Empower startups to build and grow with the full force of Tencent Cloud. The
  program offers comprehensive support including financial vouchers, service
  discounts, training resources, and marketing opportunities.
description: >-
  Tencent Cloud Startup Program is designed to support both VC-backed and
  self-funded startups to build, grow, and scale. Leveraging Tencent Cloud's
  extensive resources, the program provides up to $100,000 USD in cloud service
  vouchers, exclusive discounts on Tencent Cloud products, technical workshops,
  dedicated customer engineering support, and co-marketing initiatives. Eligible
  startups must be operational with a founding date within the last 5 years
  (extended to 10 years for Web3 startups) and have not previously received
  substantial Tencent Cloud credits. The application process involves account
  registration and identity verification, submission of the application form
  with company and funding details, a 2-week review period, and onboarding upon
  approval.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud
  - asia
  - finance
url: https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/developer/startup
value_type: credits
currency: USD
max_value: 100000
community_notes: []
tiers:
  - name: Core Startup Benefits
    intro: >-
      Receive comprehensive support including up to $100,000 in cloud service
      vouchers, exclusive service discounts, technical workshops, and marketing
      opportunities.
    max_value: 100000
    url: https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/developer/startup
    benefits:
      - Up to $100,000 USD in cloud service vouchers
      - Exclusive service discounts on Tencent Cloud products
      - Technical workshops and dedicated customer engineering support
      - Co-marketing and exposure through Tencent's partner network
      - Complimentary access to 100+ products for prototyping and testing
    benefits_level: 3
    duration: []
    eligibility:
      - VC-backed or self-funded startups with operational viability
      - Founded within the last 5 years (extended to 10 years for Web3 startups)
      - No prior substantial Tencent Cloud credits received
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Tencent Cloud Account
        description: Register and complete identity verification on Tencent Cloud.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/
      - name: Fill Application Form
        description: >-
          Submit the official application form with company registration and
          funding details.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/developer/startup
      - name: Await Approval
        description: >-
          Tencent Cloud reviews the application within two weeks and notifies
          successful applicants via email.
faq:
  - question: What is the application review timeline?
    answer: >-
      Applications are processed within two weeks. Successful applicants will be
      notified via email; if no response is received within two weeks, the
      application may be considered unsuccessful.
  - question: Who is eligible for the Tencent Cloud Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups are either VC-backed or self-funded with proven
      operational viability, founded within the last 5 years (or 10 years for
      Web3 startups), and have not received substantial Tencent Cloud credits
      previously.

provider_slug: tidb
title: TiDB Cloud Serverless Credits for Open-Source Heroes

  contributors to build scalable, innovative applications.

  support developers who actively contribute to open source. Eligible GitHub
  users can claim up to $2,000 in credits to build everything from personal
  websites and blogs to enterprise-grade applications. The program includes a
  free tier baseline of 25 GiB storage and 250 million monthly Request Units,
  along with advanced features like vector search, HTAP architecture, and
  automatic scaling. Benefits also include cost control through pay-as-you-go
  pricing, making it ideal for projects of any scale. Credits are valid for 1
  year.

provider_slug: tiktok
title: TikTok Ads Manager Welcome Gift
meta_title: TikTok Ads Manager Welcome Gift - Unlock Matching Ad Credits
intro: >-
  New advertisers using TikTok Ads Manager can receive a matching ad credit
  welcome gift of up to $1,500 by spending the corresponding amount on their
  first ad campaign within a 30-day window.
description: >-
  TikTok's Ads Manager Welcome Gift program offers new advertisers a lucrative
  opportunity to kickstart their campaigns with dollar-for-dollar matched
  credits. Unlock benefits through tiered spending thresholds: spend $100 to
  receive $100, $500 to receive $500, and $1,500 to receive $1,500. After a new
  account registration, participants have a 30-day redemption period to reach
  their desired tier, with credits applied 1-7 days after meeting spending
  requirements. The program integrates organic and paid strategies, such as
  Spark Ads, to maximize campaign impact. Eligibility is limited to new TikTok
  Ads Manager accounts in selected regions, and all credits expire on February
  28, 2025.
status: Active
tags:
  - advertising
  - social
  - marketing
url: https://ads.tiktok.com

    body: >-

      Canada, Australia, Japan, and EU nations for new TikTok Ads Manager users.
    source_url: https://www.tiktok.com/business/en

        action_url: https://ads.tiktok.com
faq:
  - question: Can I combine this welcome gift with other offers?
    answer: >-
      No, this is a standalone welcome offer exclusively for new TikTok Ads
      Manager accounts.
  - question: What happens if I don't use all the credits?
    answer: >-
      Unused credits expire on February 28, 2025, regardless of account
      activity.
  - question: Is there a minimum spend requirement after claiming the credits?
    answer: Yes, you must maintain an active campaign to retain the ad credits.

  dedicated mentorship. This program is designed for early-stage projects with

  API credits for three months of testing and integration, paired with
  personalized pricing starting at just a couple of dollars per month. Designed
  for early-stage ventures in sectors such as fintech, e-commerce, and SaaS, the
  program features a rolling application process, rapid onboarding (under 3
  weeks), and dedicated technical support to ensure seamless API integration and
  data-driven decision-making.

faq:
  - question: What is the Veridion Startup Program?
    answer: >-
      It offers startups access to rich datasets and APIs that enable
      data-driven decision-making through enterprise-grade business intelligence
      tools.
  - question: Who is eligible to join the program?
    answer: >-
      Eligible startups are those incorporated within the last 5 years, with
      annual revenue under €1M, and a team size of less than 20, operating in
      sectors like fintech, e-commerce, and SaaS.
  - question: How can startups benefit from Veridion's data?
    answer: >-
      Startups can leverage Veridion’s data for customer profiling, market trend
      analysis, supplier vetting, and to gain competitive insights for informed
      decision-making.
  - question: How do I integrate Veridion's APIs into my platform?
    answer: >-
      Detailed documentation and dedicated support are provided to ensure
      seamless integration of the APIs into your business processes.
  - question: Is the data provided by Veridion GDPR compliant?
    answer: >-
      Yes, Veridion adheres to GDPR and other data protection standards,
      ensuring secure and compliant access to data.
  - question: What sectors does Veridion's data cover?
    answer: >-
      It covers a wide range of sectors including fintech, e-commerce, SaaS,
      healthcare, education, and more, along with specialized verticals.

    answer: >-
      Interested startups should contact Vultr’s sales team or engage through
      partnered startup events and complete the required verification process.
  - question: Can credits be used across all services?
    answer: >-
      Yes, the free credits apply to Cloud Compute, GPU instances, storage, and
      managed Kubernetes.

    answer: >-

      your migration process.

      Yes, while emphasizing Latin America, the program is available globally
      with access to all 32 Vultr data centers.
  - question: What post-credit options exist?
    answer: >-
      Participants retain up to 35% long-term discounts and can access
      additional ecosystem partnerships for sustained growth.

provider_slug: vultr
title: Vultr $250 Free Credit Program

  infrastructure, including advanced GPU capabilities and flexible compute
  options.
description: >-
  Vultr offers a $250 free credit program targeting new users, including
  developers, startups, and enterprises. This program enables participants to
  test a full range of cloud compute services across 32 data centers worldwide.
  Benefits include advanced GPU instances powered by the NVIDIA GH200 Grace
  Hopper Superchip optimized for AI, ML, and HPC workloads, as well as flexible
  compute options such as High Frequency Cloud Compute, Optimized Compute, Bare
  Metal, and Cloud GPU. Additional enterprise-grade features such as automated
  backups, snapshots, firewalls, flexible networking, and DDoS protection
  further enhance the offering. Credits expire 365 days after account creation,
  and post-credit usage is billed on an hourly basis.
status: Active
tags:
  - cloud

value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 250
max_value: 250

      access and regulatory compliance across multiple regions.
    source_url: https://www.vultr.com

    intro: >-
      New users receive $250 in free credits to explore Vultr's cloud computing
      services, including advanced GPU and flexible compute options.
    max_value: 250
    url: https://www.vultr.com
    benefits:
      - Access to 32 global cloud data center regions
      - >-
        Advanced GPU instances powered by NVIDIA GH200 Grace Hopper Superchip
        for AI/ML
      - >-
        Flexible compute options: High Frequency, Optimized, Bare Metal, and
        Cloud GPU
      - >-
        Enterprise-grade features like backups, snapshots, firewalls, and DDoS
        protection
    benefits_level: 1

      - 365 days

      - New customers only
      - Valid email and phone number required
    effort_level: 1

      - name: Create Free Account
        description: >-
          Register a new Vultr account to claim the $250 free credits.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://www.vultr.com
faq:
  - question: What is the credit validity period?
    answer: Credits expire after 365 days from account creation.
  - question: What services are covered by the credits?
    answer: >-
      The credits can be applied to most services including Compute, GPU,
      Storage, and Databases, but exclude Windows licenses and certain
      third-party add-ons.
  - question: What happens after the credits are depleted?
    answer: >-
      Users must add a payment method and any usage beyond the allocated credits
      will be billed on an hourly basis.
  - question: What compliance standards does Vultr support?
    answer: >-
      Vultr supports HIPAA, GDPR, and SOC2 compliance, making it suitable for
      regulated industries.

  customers, have raised fewer than $15M, employ fewer than 50 people, and be

    answer: >-
      Typically, approval is received within 3-4 business days after submitting
      the application form.
  - question: What does the CMS plan include?
    answer: >-
      The CMS plan includes 2,000 CMS items, 200GB bandwidth, and access for 3
      content editors, with full pricing resuming after 12 months.

    answer: >-
      After 12 months, the discount ends and standard pricing applies without
      auto-renewal of benefits.

  - question: What’s included in the free credits?
    answer: >-
      Qualifying startups receive monthly credits covering access for up to 50
      agents across Zendesk’s products, including Support, Chat, Talk, Guide,
      Explore, and Sell, excluding add-ons and consulting services.
  - question: How long does the free access last?
    answer: >-
      The program offers 6 months of free access, after which startups can
      choose from flexible pricing plans starting at $55 per month.
  - question: What are the eligibility criteria for the program?
    answer: >-
      Startups must be new Zendesk customers, have fewer than 50 employees, and
      have raised funding up to Series A.
  - question: How do I activate the program?
    answer: >-
      After applying with a startup email, Zendesk will review the application
      and contact you via email with further instructions.

================

================
draft: false
provider_slug: zenduty
title: Zenduty Early Stage Program
meta_title: Discounted Incident Management for Early Stage Startups
intro: >-
  Receive up to 60% off your first-year subscription and 30% off your
  second-year subscription on Growth and Enterprise plans to enhance incident
  response and uptime.
description: >-
  Zenduty's Early Stage Program offers early-stage startups discounted access to
  its robust incident management platform. Designed for startups under 3 years
  old with up to $2M in funding and 20 or fewer employees, the program delivers
  up to 60% off in Year 1 and 30% off in Year 2 on Growth and Enterprise plans.
  Participants gain full access to 60+ premium features including unlimited
  SMS/Phone call alerts, advanced alert routing, on-call scheduling, mobile app,
  API access, and over 100 integrations. This comprehensive solution helps
  reduce MTTA and MTTR, ensuring higher system reliability during critical
  growth phases.
status: Active
tags:
  - incident management
  - monitoring
  - project management
url: https://www.zenduty.com/early-stage-program
value_type: discount
currency: USD
min_value: 30
max_value: 60
community_notes:
  - title: IndiaMart Success Story
    body: >-
      IndiaMart leverages Zenduty to maintain website uptime, which is critical
      for its 152,000+ subscribers and 95% revenue dependency.
    source_url: https://www.zenduty.com/customers
tiers:
  - name: 60% Off - Year One
    intro: >-
      Eligible startups get a 60% discount on their first-year subscription for
      Growth and Enterprise plans.
    max_value: 60
    url: https://www.zenduty.com/early-stage-program
    benefits:
      - 60% discount on first-year subscription
      - Access to 60+ premium incident management features
      - Unlimited SMS and phone alerts
      - Advanced alert routing and on-call scheduling
      - 100+ integrations with monitoring tools
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Must be a new Zenduty customer
      - Startup under 3 years old with ≤$2M in funding
      - Team of 20 employees or less
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Register for the Program
        description: >-
          Complete the online registration form on Zenduty's website to verify
          eligibility and get started.
        action: Sign Up
        action_url: https://www.zenduty.com/early-stage-program
  - name: 30% Off - Year Two
    intro: >-
      After the first year, eligible startups benefit from a 30% discount on the
      second-year subscription for Growth and Enterprise plans.
    max_value: 30
    url: https://www.zenduty.com/early-stage-program
    benefits:
      - 30% discount on second-year subscription
      - Continued access to premium incident management tools
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 1 year
    eligibility:
      - Must be a new Zenduty customer
      - Startup under 3 years old with ≤$2M in funding
      - Team of 20 employees or less
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Renewal Process
        description: >-
          Eligible startups will be transitioned to the second-year discount
          upon renewal.
        action: Confirm Renewal
        action_url: https://www.zenduty.com/early-stage-program
faq:
  - question: What happens after Year 2?
    answer: >-
      After Year 2, startups transition to standard pricing (e.g.,
      $24/user/month for Growth plans or custom pricing for Enterprise plans).
  - question: How can I apply for the Zenduty Early Stage Program?
    answer: >-
      Applications can be submitted through Zenduty's website by completing the
      online registration form and verifying eligibility requirements.
  - question: What support is provided as part of the program?
    answer: >-
      The program includes 24-hour response support for Enterprise plans and
      48-hour support for Growth plans, along with comprehensive incident
      management features.

draft: false
provider_slug: zoho
title: Zoho for Startups Program
meta_title: Zoho for Startups - Accelerate Your Growth
intro: >-
  Access a full range of Zoho software solutions with flexible credit benefits
  and expert support, tailored for new startups aiming to streamline operations
  and scale efficiently.
description: >-
  Zoho for Startups Program offers startups up to $1,200 USD in Zoho Wallet
  Credits to explore 55+ integrated applications including CRM, accounting, and
  project management tools. Eligible startups can also earn additional credits
  by hosting their domain with Zoho within 15 days, and DPIIT-recognized
  startups may qualify for special benefits totaling up to $3,600 USD credits.
  The program includes free weekday email support, expert consultations, and
  access to partner-led training sessions, providing a comprehensive foundation
  for business growth.
status: Active
tags:
  - saas
  - crm
  - project management
  - collaboration
  - enterprise
url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
value_type: credits
currency: USD
min_value: 1200
max_value: 3600
community_notes:
  - title: Founder's Insight
    body: >-
      Sridhar Vembu, Co-founder and Chief Scientist, emphasizes the importance
      of building a strong foundation with Zoho's scalable software solutions
      for sustainable startup growth.
    source_url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
  - title: Startup Success Stories
    body: >-
      Entrepreneurs like Ayush Jain and Aastha Grover have praised the program
      for its effective blend of financial credits and operational support.
    source_url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
tiers:
  - name: Zoho Base Credits
    intro: >-
      Receive Stage 1 Zoho Wallet Credits of up to $1,200 USD to explore Zoho's
      comprehensive suite of apps.
    max_value: 1200
    url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
    benefits:
      - Access to 55+ integrated Zoho applications
      - Valid for 360 days
      - Use credits for subscriptions, upgrades, and add-ons
      - Streamline operations from setup to scale
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 360 days
    eligibility:
      - Must be a new user of Zoho
      - Registered with an approved ecosystem enabler
      - Aligned with Startup India definition
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Create Zoho Account
        description: Register using your organization's primary email on Zoho.
        action: Register
        action_url: https://www.zoho.com/signup/
      - name: Apply via Enabler
        description: Submit your application through your startup enabler or collaborator.
        action: Apply Now
        action_url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
  - name: Zoho Additional Credits
    intro: >-
      Earn additional credits by hosting your domain with Zoho within 15 days of
      receiving Stage 1 credits.
    max_value: 1030
    url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
    benefits:
      - Additional credits for domain hosting
      - Boosts early operational capacity
      - Supplementary benefit to Stage 1 credits
    benefits_level: 1
    duration:
      - 15 days
    eligibility:
      - Domain hosting must be set up within 15 days
      - Applicable only after Stage 1 validation
    effort_level: 2
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Link Domain
        description: >-
          Set up and verify your domain hosting with Zoho to qualify for extra
          credits.
        action: Verify Now
        action_url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
  - name: Zoho DPIIT Special Credits
    intro: >-
      For DPIIT-recognized or tax-exempt startups, receive up to $3,600 USD
      credits combining base and promotional benefits.
    max_value: 3600
    url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
    benefits:
      - Higher credit allocation up to $3,600 USD
      - Promotional credits based on usage
      - Full access to Zoho's suite of applications
    benefits_level: 3
    duration:
      - 360 days
    eligibility:
      - Proof of DPIIT recognition or tax exemption required
      - Must be a new user with no prior paid subscriptions
      - Registered with an approved ecosystem enabler
    effort_level: 3
    steps_to_apply:
      - name: Submit DPIIT Certificate
        description: Upload the required documentation to verify your DPIIT status.
        action: Submit
        action_url: https://www.zoho.com/startups/
faq:
  - question: How can I apply for the Zoho for Startups program?
    answer: >-
      Create a Zoho account using your organization's primary email and then
      apply for credits via your approved startup enabler or directly through
      the Zoho for Startups portal.
  - question: Am I eligible if I have previously used Zoho One benefits?
    answer: >-
      No, the program is only available to new or free users with no active or
      previous paid subscriptions or credit benefits from Zoho.
  - question: Which countries are accepted for the program?
    answer: >-
      The program is currently live in select regions including India,
      Indonesia, Brazil, the UK, and several other countries, with plans for
      further expansion.
  - question: How can I receive additional credits?
    answer: >-
      After Stage 1 approval, host your domain with Zoho within 15 days to
      qualify for additional credits.
  - question: What happens if I delete my Zoho account?
    answer: >-
      Deleting your account will reset your Zoho Wallet balance to zero, and
      credits cannot be transferred or recovered.
